jp: .元日にかわいや遍路門に立
ro: ganjitsu ni kawai ya henro kado ni tatsu
en:
on New Year's Day
a cute little pilgrim
at the gate

jp: .元日や日本ばかりの花の娑婆
ro: ganjitsu ya nihon bakari no hana no shaba
en:
New Year's Day
this world of Japan's
blossoms

jp: .元日の日向ぼこする屑家かな
ro: ganjitsu no hinata bokosuru kuzuya kana
en:
basking
in the New Year's sun...
my trashy hut

jp: .昼頃に元日になる庵かな
ro: hiru-goro ni ganjitsu ni naru iori kana
en:
around noon
New Year's Day begins...
little hut

jp: .人並の正月もせぬしだら哉
ro: hito nami no shôgatsu mo senu shidara kana
en:
no run-of-the-mill
New Year's Day
for the slob

jp: .正月が二日有ても皺手哉
ro: shôgatsu ga futsuka arite mo shiwade kana
en:
First Month, second day--
my wrinkled
hands

jp: .正月や現金酒の通ひ帳
ro: shôgatsu ya genkin sake no kayoichô
en:
First Month--
recording the cash spent
on sake

jp: .猫塚に正月させるごまめ哉
ro: neko tsuka [ni] shôgatsu saseru gomame kana
en:
on the cat's grave
in First Month...
dried sardines

jp: .行灯のかたぴらよりけさの春
ro: andon no katappira yori kesa no haru
en:
to one side
of my paper lantern...
spring's first dawn

jp: .草の戸やいづち支舞の今朝の春
ro: kusa no to ya izuchi shimai no kesa no haru
en:
at my hut
what will come of it?
spring's first dawn

jp: .けさ春と掃まねしたりひとり坊
ro: kesa haru to haku mane shitari hitori-bô
en:
spring's first dawn--
the priest pretending
to sweep

jp: .ふしぎ也生れた家でけさの春
ro: fushigi nari umareta ie de kesa no haru
en:
amazing--
in the house I was born
spring's first morning

jp: .ふしぎ也生れた家でけふの春
ro: fushigi nari umareta ie de kyô no haru
en:
amazing--
in the house I was born
spring begins today

jp: .塵の身も拾ふ神あり花の春
ro: chiri no mi mo hirou kami ari hana no haru
en:
even for this body of dust
a guardian god!
blossoming spring

jp: .とてもならみろくの御代を松の春
ro: totemo nara miroku no miyo wo matsu no haru
en:
now begins
the Future Buddha's reign...
spring pines

jp: .庵の春寝そべる程は霞なり
ro: io no haru nesoberu hodo wa kasumu nari
en:
spring at my hut--
tall as a sleeping man
the mist

jp: .初春や千代のためしに立給ふ
ro: hatsu haru ya chiyo no tameshi ni tatsu tamau
en:
spring begins
as it has deigned to do
for a thousand ages

jp: .我国はけぶりも千代のためし哉
ro: waga kuni wa keburi mo chiyo no tameshi kana
en:
my province--
even the smoke
an ancient thing

jp: .はる立や門の雀もまめなかほ
ro: haru tatsu ya kado no suzume mo mamena kao
en:
spring begins--
sparrows at my gate
with healthy faces

jp: .神とおもふかたより三輪の日の出哉
ro: kami to omou kata yori miwa no hi no de kana
en:
from where the gods live
Miwa's
sunrise

jp: .よその蔵からすじかひに初日哉
ro: yoso no kura kara sujikai ni hatsu hi kana
en:
from a neighbor's storehouse
shining slantwise...
year's first sun

jp: .初空のもやうに立や茶の煙
ro: hatsu-zora no moyô ni tatsu ya cha no keburi
en:
rising into
the year's first sky...
tea smoke

jp: .雨のない日が初空ぞ翌も旅
ro: ame no nai hi ga hatsu-zora zo asu mo tabi
en:
if it's not raining
it's the year's first sky!
tomorrow too, travel

jp: .はつ空を拵へる也茶のけぶり
ro: hatsuzora wo koshiraeru nari cha no keburi
en:
forming the year's
first sky...
tea smoke

jp: .御降りをたんといただく屑屋哉
ro: o-sagari wo tan to itadaku kuzuya kana
en:
welcoming in loads
of new year's rain...
trashy house

jp: .大原や恵方に出し杖の穴
ro: ôhara ya ehô ni ideshi tsue no ana
en:
big field--
my New Year's walk
follows holes made by canes

jp: .とし神やことしも御世話下さるる
ro: toshi-gami ya kotoshi mo o-sewa kudasaruru
en:
O New Year's god
this year too
send help!

jp: .梅の花まけにこぼすや畚下し
ro: ume no hana mage ni kobosu ya fugo oroshi
en:
plum blossoms fall
in the hairdo...
lowering the basket

jp: .三日月や畚引上る木末から
ro: mikazuki ya fugo hiki-ageru kozue kara
en:
sickle moon--
hauling up the basket
through branches

jp: .斎日やぞめき出されて上野迄
ro: sainichi ya zomeki desarete ueno made
en:
a fast day--
drawn by the uproar
to Ueno

jp: .やぶ入やきのふ過たる山祭り
ro: yabuiri ya kinou sugitaru yama matsuri
en:
servant on holiday--
the mountain festival
ended yesterday

jp: .やぶ入の顔にもつけよ桃の花
ro: yabuiri no kao ni mo tsuke yo momo no hana
en:
on the homecoming servant's
face too...
peach blossoms

jp: .薮入りや二人並んで思案橋
ro: yabuiri ya futari narande shian-bashi
en:
Servants' Holiday--
two in a row
on Meditation Bridge

jp: .小松引人とて人をながむかな
ro: ko matsu hiku hito tote hito wo nagamu kana
en:
yanking up a little pine
he watches
the watchers

jp: .袴着て芝にころりと子の日哉
ro: hakama kite shiba ni gorori to ne no hi kana
en:
in formal trousers
curled asleep on the lawn...
first day of Rat

jp: .かま獅子があごではらひぬ門の松
ro: kamashishi ga ago de harainu kado no matsu
en:
pruned by the antelope's
jaws...
New Year's pine

jp: .ひよいひよいと藪にかけるや余り注連
ro: hiyo[i] hiyo[i] to yabu ni kakeru ya amari shime
en:
here and there
hanging in the thicket...
New Year's ropes

jp: .外ならば梅がとび込福茶哉
ro: soto naraba ume ga tobikomu fukucha kana
en:
going outside
plum blossoms dive in...
my lucky tea

jp: .影法師もまめ息災で御慶かな
ro: kageboshi mo mame sokusai de gyokei kana
en:
my shadow too
in good health...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .つぶれ家の其身其まま御慶哉
ro: tsubure ya no sono mi sono mama gyokei kana
en:
my ramshackle hut
just as it is...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .いく廻り目だぞとし玉扇又もどる
ro: iku meguri me da zo toshidama ôgi mata modoru
en:
how many times
a New Year's gift?
the fan returns

jp: .草の戸やけさのとし玉とりに来る
ro: kusa no to ya kesa no toshidama tori ni kuru
en:
my humble hut--
all morning they come
for New Year's gifts

jp: .とし玉茶どこを廻って又もどる
ro: toshidama cha doko wo megutte mata modoru
en:
New Year's gift of tea--
where did you go
on your journey back to me?

jp: .わんぱくや先試みに筆はじめ
ro: wanpaku ya mazu kokoromi ni fude hajime
en:
the naughty child
attempts first...
year's first writing

jp: .子宝や棒をひくのも吉書始
ro: ko-dakara ya bô wo hiku no mo kissho hajime
en:
treasured child--
his cane dragging
the year's first writing

jp: .人の世は此山陰も若湯哉
ro: hito no yo wa kono yama kage mo waka yu kana
en:
world of man--
even in mountain shade
New Year's water

jp: .浴みして旅のしらみを罪始め
ro: yuami shite tabi no shirami wo tsumi hajime
en:
first hot bath--
for my journey's lice
first sin

jp: .若水やそうとつき込む梅の花
ro: wakamizu ya souto tsukiko[mu] ume no hana
en:
into the year's first
water softly...
plum blossoms

jp: .鳴く猫に赤ン目をして手まり哉
ro: naku neko ni akambe wo shite temari kana
en:
making a face
at the whining cat...
bouncing her ball

jp: .切凧のくるくる舞やお茶の水
ro: kire tako no kuru-kuru mau ya ocha no mizu
en:
broken kite dancing
'round and 'round...
Ocha-no-Mizu

jp: .凧抱て直ぐにすやすや寝る子哉
ro: tako daite sugu ni suya-suya neru ko kana
en:
hugging her kite
soon she's sound asleep...
the child

jp: .門獅子やししが口から梅の花
ro: kado shishi ya shishi ga kuchi kara ume no hana
en:
lion puppet at the gate--
from his mouth
plum blossoms

jp: .かたむべき歯は一本もなかりけり
ro: katamubeki ha wa ippon mo nakari keri
en:
teeth to harden
this New Year's meal...
not even one

jp: .歯固は猫に勝れて笑ひけり
ro: hagatame wa neko ni katarete warai keri
en:
New Year's tooth-hardening
meal...the cat wins
and laughs

jp: .長閑さや垣間を覗く山の僧
ro: nodokasa ya kakima wo nozoku yama no sô
en:
spring peace--
a mountain monk peeks
through the hedge

jp: .草麦のひょろひょろのびる日ざし哉
ro: kusa mugi hyoro-hyoro nobiru hizashi kana
en:
the grass and wheat
tottering...
sunlight stretches on

jp: .舞々や翌なき春を笑ひ顔
ro: mai-mai ya asu naki haru wo warai kao
en:
water spider
on spring's last day...
laughing face

jp: .行春や我を見たをす古着買
ro: yuku haru ya ware wo mitaosu furugigai
en:
spring departs--
the old clothes buyer
ignores me

jp: .淡雪や犬の土ほる通のはた
ro: awayuki ya inu no tsuchi horu michi no hata
en:
light snow--
a dog digs a hole
by the road

jp: .小烏や巧者にすべる春の雨
ro: ko-garasu ya kôsha ni suberu haru no ame
en:
the little crow
slips so cleverly...
spring rain

jp: .安堵して鼠も寝るよ春の雨
ro: ando shite nezumi mo neru yo haru no ame
en:
taking it easy
the mouse sleeps too...
spring rain

jp: .たびら雪半分交ぜや春の雨
ro: tabira yuki hambun maze ya haru no ame
en:
half of it
is flitting snowflakes...
spring rain

jp: .入道が綻ぬふや春の雨
ro: nyûdô ga hokorobi nuu ya haru no ame
en:
the priest is mending
a rip...
spring rain

jp: .春雨や相に相生の松の声
ro: harusame ya ai ni aioi no matsu no koe
en:
spring rain--
growing side by side
the talking pines

jp: .春雨や夜も愛するまっち山
ro: harusame ya yoru mo ai [su]ru matchi yama
en:
spring rain--
at night, too, making love
on Mount Matchi

jp: .夜談義やばくちくづれや春の雨
ro: yo dangi ya bakuchi kuzure ya haru no ame
en:
night sermon
backsliding gamblers...
spring rain

jp: .ぼた餅や辻の仏も春の風
ro: botamochi ya tsuji no hotoke mo haru no kaze
en:
rice cake with bean paste
for the crossroads Buddha...
spring breeze

jp: .春風や供の女の小脇差
ro: harukaze ya tomo no onna no ko wakizashi
en:
spring breeze--
a female servant's
short sword

jp: .鬼の面狐の面や春の風
ro: oni no men kitsune no men ya haru no kaze
en:
faces of devils
faces of foxes...
spring breeze

jp: .笠うらの大神宮や春の風
ro: kasa ura no daijingû ya haru no kaze
en:
inside my umbrella-hat
a charm from Ise Shrine...
spring breeze

jp: .春風に吹れた形や女坂
ro: haru kaze ni fukarete nari ya onnazaka
en:
the spring breeze pushes
somebody
down the slope

jp: .春風に吹れ序の湯治哉
ro: haru kaze ni fukare tsuide no toji kana
en:
while the spring breeze blows
a healing
bath

jp: .春風や芦の丸屋の一つ口
ro: harukaze ya ashi no maruya no hitotsu-guchi
en:
spring breeze--
the round reed hut's
one door

jp: .春風や歩行ながらの御法談
ro: haru kaze ya aruki nagara no ôhôdan
en:
spring breeze--
the priest gives his sermon
walking along

jp: .一つ葉の中より吹や春の風
ro: hitotsuba no naka yori fuku ya haru no kaze
en:
out of the dyer's-weed
it blows...
spring breeze

jp: .おぼろ月松出ぬけても出ぬけても
ro: oboro-zuki matsu denukete mo denukete mo
en:
hazy moon in the pine--
passing through
passing through

jp: .福狐啼たまふぞよおぼろ月
ro: fuku kitsune naki tamau zo yo oboro-zuki
en:
a lucky fox
deigns to bark...
hazy moon

jp: .ほくほくと霞んで来るはどなた哉
ro: hoku-hoku to kasunde kuru wa donata kana
en:
rap-a-tap
who's that coming
in the mist?

jp: .けふもけふもかすんで暮らす小家哉
ro: kyô mo kyô mo kasunde kurasu ko ie kana
en:
today too, today too
living in mist...
little house

jp: .かすむ日に古くもならぬ卒塔婆哉
ro: kasumu hi ni furuku mo naranu sotoba kana
en:
in the misty day
not growing older...
grave tablets

jp: .霞とや朝からさはぐ馬鹿烏
ro: kasumu to ya asa kara sawagu baka karasu
en:
in spring mist
from morning on a ruckus...
foolish crow

jp: .かすむ日や大旅籠屋のうらの松
ro: kasumu hi ya ôhatagoya no ura no matsu
en:
misty day--
behind the big inn
a pine

jp: .さらばさらばの手にかかる霞かな
ro: saraba saraba no te ni kakaru kasumu kana
en:
farewell! farewell!
hands waving
in the mist

jp: .たっぷりと霞と隠れぬ卒塔婆哉
ro: tappuri to kasumu to kakurenu sotoba kana
en:
well hidden
by the spring mist...
grave tablet

jp: .湖のとろりとかすむ夜也けり
ro: mizuumi no torori to kasumu yo nari keri
en:
the lake is slowly
lost in mist...
evening falls

jp: .陽炎や子をかくされし親の顔
ro: kagerô ya ko wo kakusareshi oya no kao
en:
heat shimmers--
missing a child
the parent's face

jp: .陽炎や犬に追るるのら鼠
ro: kagerô ya inu ni owaruru nora nezumi
en:
heat shimmers--
a field mouse chased
by the dog

jp: .陽炎や草の上行くぬれ鼠
ro: kagerô ya kusa no ue yuku nure nezumi
en:
heat shimmers--
to the top of the weed
a wet mouse

jp: .我雪も連て流れよ千曲川
ro: waga yuki mo tsurete nagare yo chikuma kawa
en:
float away
my snow too...
Chikuma River

jp: .門前や杖でつくりし雪げ川
ro: monzen ya tsue de tsukurishi yukige kawa
en:
before the gate--
my cane makes a river
of melting snow

jp: .大雪を杓子でとかす子ども哉
ro: ôyuki wo shakushi de tokasu kodomo kana
en:
melting the big snow
with a spoon...
a child

jp: .親犬が瀬踏してけり雪げ川
ro: oya inu ga sebumi shite keri yukige kawa
en:
mother dog
testing the depth...
snow-melt river

jp: .門畑や米の字なりの雪解水
ro: kado hata ya kome no ji nari no yukige mizu
en:
garden at the gate--
forming the word "rice"
the melted snow

jp: .門畠や棒でほじくる雪解川
ro: kado hata ya bô de hojikuru yukige kawa
en:
garden at the gate--
with my cane digging
a snow-melt river

jp: .我門のかざりに青む苗代田
ro: waga kado no kazari ni ao[mu] nawashiroda
en:
my gate's adornment--
the rice seedlings
turning green

jp: .御彼岸のぎりに青みしかきね哉
ro: o-higan no giri ni aomishi kakine kana
en:
in honor of the equinox
the hedge
turns green

jp: .袖あたり遊ぶ虱の彼岸哉
ro: sode atari asobu shirami no higan kana
en:
heading for my sleeve
to play...
spring equinox louse

jp: .出代や六十顔をさげながら
ro: degawari ya roku jû-zura wo sage nagara
en:
a migrating servant
laid off
at age sixty

jp: .青の葉は汐干なぐれの烏哉
ro: ao no ha wa shiohi nagure no karasu kana
en:
some stay behind
in the green leaves...
low tide crows

jp: .鶴亀の遊ぶ程ずつやくの哉
ro: tsuru kame no asobu hodo-zutsu yaku no kana
en:
the crane and the tortoise's
playground...
burnt field

jp: .風雲ややけ野の火より日の暮るる
ro: kazagumo ya yakeno no hi yori hi no kururu
en:
windblown clouds--
the fires of burning fields
bring sunset

jp: .松苗の花咲くころは誰かある
ro: matsu nae no hana saku koro wa dare ka aru
en:
when this pine sapling
grows to flower...
who'll be here?

jp: .恋猫のぬからぬ顔でもどりけり
ro: koi neko no nukaranu kao de modori keri
en:
the lover cat
his face so innocent
comes home

jp: .恋猫や口なめづりをしてもどる
ro: koi neko ya kuchi namezuri wo shite modoru
en:
the lover cat
licking his chops
comes home

jp: .髭前に飯そよぐ也猫の恋
ro: hige saki ni meshi soyogu nari neko no koi
en:
on his whisker tips
rice grains tremble...
the lover cat

jp: .ちる桜鹿はぽっきり角もげる
ro: chiru sakura shika wa pokkiri tsuno mogeru
en:
cherry blossoms scatter--
snap! the buck's antlers
come off

jp: .雀子や人が立ても口を明く
ro: suzumego ya hito ga tatte mo kuchi wo aku
en:
baby sparrow--
even when people come
opening his mouth

jp: .鳥の巣も鬼門に立つや日枝の山
ro: tori no su mo kimon ni tatsu ya hie no yama
en:
the bird's nest, too
in the unlucky direction...
Mount Hie

jp: .雀子が中で鳴く也米瓢
ro: suzumego ga naka de naku nari kome fukube
en:
the baby sparrow
chirps inside it...
rice gourd

jp: .鶯の苦にもせぬ也茶のけぶり
ro: uguisu no ku ni mo senu nari cha no keburi
en:
the nightingale
not at all concerned...
tea smoke

jp: .鶯の苦にもせぬ也辻ばくち
ro: uguisu no ku ni mo senu nari tsuji bakuchi
en:
the nightingale
not at all concerned...
gambling at the crossroads

jp: .鶯のぬからぬ顔や東山
ro: uguisu no nukaranu kao ya higashi yama
en:
the nightingale's
"I'm perfect" face...
Higashi Mountains

jp: .鶯や尿しながらもほっけ経
ro: uguisu ya shito shi nagara mo hokkekyô
en:
nightingale--
even while pooping, sings
Lotus Sutra

jp: .鶯も上鶯の垣根かな
ro: uguisu mo jô uguisu no kakine kana
en:
even among nightingales
royalty
on the fence

jp: .鶯のまてにまはるや組屋敷
ro: uguisu no mate ni mawaru ya kumiyashiki
en:
the dragnet of nightingales
closes in...
police station

jp: .鶯の幾世顔也おく信濃
ro: uguisu no ikuyo kao nari oku shinano
en:
many generations
had your face, nightingale...
deep Shinano

jp: .鶯のはねかへさるるつるべ哉
ro: uguisu no hanekaesaruru tsurube kana
en:
the nightingale
is bouncing about...
well bucket

jp: .鶯も水を浴せてみそぎ哉
ro: uguisu mo mizu wo abisete misogi kana
en:
the nightingale
splashes too...
purification font

jp: .鶯や隅からすみへ目を配り
ro: uguisu ya sumi kara sumi e me wo kubari
en:
nightingale--
from one corner to another
his searching eyes

jp: .夕雲雀どの松島が寝よいぞよ
ro: yû hibari dono matsushima ga ne yoi zo yo
en:
evening lark--
which pine island's
good for sleeping?

jp: .野大根も花となりにけり鳴雲雀
ro: no daiko mo hana to nari keri naku hibari
en:
even the field's
radishes blooming...
the lark singing!

jp: .漣や雲雀に交る釣小舟
ro: sazanami ya hibari ni majiru tsuri kobune
en:
ripples on water--
mingling with the larks
a fishing boat

jp: .湖におちぬ自慢やなくひばり
ro: mizuumi ni ochinu jiman ya naku hibari
en:
"I won't fall
in the lake!"
the lark sings

jp: .臼からも松の木からも雲雀哉
ro: usu kara mo matsu no ki kara mo hibari kana
en:
from the rice cake tub
from the pine...
skylarks

jp: .墓からも花桶からも雲雀哉
ro: haka kara mo hana oke kara mo hibari kana
en:
from the grave
and from the flowerpot...
skylarks!

jp: .おれを見るや雉伸上り伸上り
ro: ore [wo] miru ya kiji nobi-agari nobi-agari
en:
looking at me
the pheasant on tiptoe
on tiptoe

jp: .雉鳴くやころり焼野の千代の松
ro: kiji naku ya korori yakeno no chiyo no matsu
en:
a pheasant cries
in the burned field, look!
an ancient pine

jp: .草原を覗れてなく雉子哉
ro: kusabara wo nozokarete naku kigisu kana
en:
peeking into
the grassy meadow...
a pheasant cries

jp: .雨だれは月よなりけりかへる雁
ro: amadare wa tsuki yo nari keri kaeru kari
en:
the bright moon in raindrops
from the eaves...
the geese depart

jp: .連もたぬ雁もさっさと帰りけり
ro: tsure motanu kari mo sassa to kaeri keri
en:
a goose without companions
flying fast as he can
returns

jp: .けふ迄のしんぼ強さよ帰る雁
ro: kyô made no shimbo tsuyosa yo kaeru kari
en:
up to today
such perserverance and strength!
returning geese

jp: .けふ迄はよく辛抱した雁よ雁よ
ro: kyô made wa yoku shimbo shita kari yo kari yo
en:
up to today
such great perserverance...
wild geese! wild geese!

jp: .雁鳴や今日本を放るると
ro: kari naku ya ima nippon wo hanaruru to
en:
geese honking--
now they leave behind
Japan

jp: .みちのくの田植見てから帰る雁
ro: michi no ku no taue mite kara kaeru kari
en:
after seeing rice planting
in remote provinces...
the geese depart

jp: .行たいか雁伸上り伸上り
ro: yukitai ka kari nobi-agari nobi-agari
en:
thinking of taking off?
goose on tiptoe
on tiptoe

jp: .古池や先御先へととぶ蛙
ro: furu ike ya mazu o-saki e to tobu kawazu
en:
old pond--
please, you go first
frog jumping

jp: .今の間に一喧嘩して啼かはづ
ro: ima no ma ni hito kenka shite naku kawazu
en:
now they're quarreling
the croaking
frogs

jp: .薄緑やどさり居て鳴く蛙
ro: usumidori ya dosari suwatte naku kawazu
en:
pale green
sitting down with a thump...
croaking frog

jp: .大榎小楯に取って啼かはづ
ro: ôenoki kotate ni totte naku kawazu
en:
the big nettle tree
as his shield...
croaking frog

jp: .御地蔵の膝にすわってなく蛙
ro: o-jizô no hiza ni suwatte naku kawazu
en:
in holy Jizo's lap
squatting, croaking
frog

jp: .御社へじくなんで入るかはづ哉
ro: o-yashiro e jikunande iru kawazu kana
en:
taming the flesh
he enters a shrine...
frog

jp: .けふ明し窓の月よやなく蛙
ro: kyô akeshi mado no tsuki yo ya naku kawazu
en:
in the open window
a bright moon
croaking frogs

jp: .供部屋にさはぎ勝なり蛙酒
ro: tomobeya ni sawagi katsu nari kawazu sake
en:
the uproar in the servants' room
beats the frogs...
drinking party

jp: .寝た牛の頭にすはるかはずかな
ro: neta ushi no atama ni suwaru kawazu kana
en:
squatting on the head
of a sleeping cow...
a frog

jp: .花桶に蝶も聞かよ一大事
ro: hana oke ni chô mo kiku ka yo ichi daiji
en:
on the flower pot
does the butterfly, too
hear Buddha's promise?

jp: .一人茶や蝶は毎日来てくれる
ro: hitori cha ya chô wa mainichi kite kureru
en:
drinking tea alone--
every day the butterfly
stops by

jp: .蝶とぶやしんらん松も知った顔
ro: chô tobu ya shinran matsu mo shitta kao
en:
a butterfly flits--
even Shinran's pine
seems to know

jp: .木の陰やてふと宿るも他生の縁
ro: ki no kage ya chô to yadoru mo tashô no en
en:
sharing tree shade
with a butterfly...
friends in a previous life

jp: .つぐら子の口ばたなめる小てふ哉
ro: tsugura ko no kuchi-bata nameru ko chô kana
en:
baby in a basket--
licking the edge of her mouth
little butterfly

jp: .田の人の内股くぐるこてふかな
ro: ta no hito no uchimata kuguru ko chô kana
en:
creeping through
the rice farmer's legs...
little butterfly

jp: .庭のてふ子が這へばとびはへばとぶ
ro: niwa no chô ko ga haeba tobi haeba tobu
en:
garden butterfly--
the child crawls, it flies
crawls, it flies...

jp: .門の蝶子が這へばとびはへばとぶ
ro: kado no chô ko ga haeba tobi haeba tobu
en:
butterfly at the gate--
the child crawls, it flies
crawls, it flies...

jp: .はつ蝶や会釈もなしに床の間へ
ro: hatsu chô ya eshaku mo nashi ni toko-no-ma e
en:
first butterfly--
without formal greeting
entering the alcove

jp: .夕暮にがっくりしたと草のてふ
ro: yûgure ni gakkuri shita yo kusa no chô
en:
evening
is such a downer...
meadow butterfly

jp: .世の中は蝶も朝からかせぐ也
ro: yo no naka wa chô mo asa kara kasegu nari
en:
in this world
from dawn to dusk
even a butterfly must toil

jp: .内中にきげんとらるる蚕哉
ro: uchinaka ni kigen toraruru kaiko kana
en:
the whole house
pays them court...
silkworms

jp: .惣々にきげんとらるる蚕哉
ro: sô-sô ni kigen toraruru kaiko kana
en:
quickly people
pay them court...
silkworms

jp: .それ虻に世話をやかすな明り窓
ro: sore abu ni sewa wo yakasu na akarimado
en:
don't be mean
to that horsefly
skylight!

jp: .夕月や鍋の中にて鳴田にし
ro: yûzuki ya nabe no naka nite naku tanishi
en:
evening moon--
pond snails singing
in the kettle

jp: .蛤や在鎌倉の雁鴎
ro: hamaguri ya zai-kamakura no kari kamome
en:
O clams
meet the geese and gulls
of Greater Kamakura!

jp: .萩の芽や人がしらねば鹿が喰
ro: hagi no me ya hito ga shiraneba shika ga kuu
en:
bush clover sprouting--
when people aren't looking
the deer eats

jp: .人つきや野原の草も若盛り
ro: hito tsuki ya nohara no kusa mo waka-zakari
en:
pricking people--
new grasses of the plain
are precocious!

jp: .若草で足拭ふなり這入口
ro: wakakusa de ashi nuguu nari hairiguchi
en:
wiping their feet
on the baby grass...
doorway

jp: .若草や今の小町が尻の跡
ro: wakakusa ya ima no komachi ga shiri no ato
en:
baby grass--
the stylish woman leaves
her butt print

jp: .我国は草さへさきぬさくら花
ro: waga kuni wa kusa sae sakinu sakura kana
en:
in my province
grass blooms too...
cherry blossoms

jp: .なの花にだらだら下りの日暮哉
ro: na no hana ni dara-dara ori no higure kana
en:
in flowering rape
step by step sinking...
sun

jp: .菜畠の花見の客や下屋敷
ro: na-batake no hana mi no kyaku ya shimo yashiki
en:
a visitor views
the field of rape...
villa shed

jp: .菜の花や西へむかへば善光寺
ro: na no hana ya nishi e mukaeba zenkôji
en:
flowering rape--
and looking west
Zenko Temple

jp: .野大根酒呑どのに引れけり
ro: no daikon sake nomi dono ni hikere keri
en:
drunk on sake
he yanks
the radish

jp: .木々もめを開らくやみだの本願寺
ro: kigi mo me wo hiraku ya mida no honganji
en:
the tree buds, too
open up...
Amida's Hongan Temple

jp: .北浜の砂よけ椿咲にけり
ro: kita hama no suna yoke tsubaki saki ni keri
en:
North Beach's
sand-barrier camellias
in bloom

jp: .春の日の入所なり藤の花
ro: haru no hi no iri-tokoro nari fuji no hana
en:
the setting place
for the spring sun...
wisteria blossoms

jp: .梅さくや子供の声の穴かしこ
ro: ume saku ya kodomo no koe no ana kashiko
en:
blooming plum--
the voices of children
sound reverent

jp: .梅さくや犬にまたがる金太郎
ro: ume saku ya inu ni matagaru kintarô
en:
plum blossoms--
riding a dog
the Golden Boy

jp: .紅梅や縁にほしたる洗ひ猫
ro: kôbai ya heri ni hoshitaru aria neko
en:
red plum blossoms--
on the porch
the bathed cat dries

jp: .家内安全と咲けり門の梅
ro: kanai anzen to saki keri kado no ume
en:
the family's good fortune
in bloom...
plum tree at the gate

jp: .黒塗の馬もぴかぴか梅の花
ro: kuro nuri no uma mo pika-pika ume no hana
en:
even the black lacquered
horse is glittering!
plum blossoms

jp: .ちりめんの猿がいさむや梅の花
ro: chirimen no saru ga isamu ya ume no hana
en:
the cloth monkey
in high spirits...
plum blossoms

jp: .梅がかや狐の穴に赤の飯
ro: ume ga ka ya kitsune no ana ni aka no meshi
en:
plum blossom scent--
at the fox's hole
red beans and rice

jp: .梅の木や庵の鬼門に咲給ふ
ro: ume no ki ya io no kimon ni saki tamau
en:
plum tree--
on my hut's unlucky side
blooming!

jp: .梅満り酒なき家はなき世也
ro: ume miteri sake naki ie wa naki yo nari
en:
plum in full bloom--
a house without sake
can't be found

jp: .片隅の天神さまもうめの花
ro: kata sumi no tenjinsama mo ume no hana
en:
even the heavenly gods
crowd 'round...
plum blossoms

jp: .門口やつっぱり廻る梅一枝
ro: kado-guchi ya tsuppari mawaru ume hito e
en:
in my gate
thrust out, swaying
plum branch

jp: .下谷一番の顔して梅の花
ro: shitaya ichiban no kao shite ume no hana
en:
the first and best
of Shitaya Ward...
plum blossoms

jp: .捨扇梅盗人にもどしけり
ro: sute ôgi ume nusubito ni modoshi keri
en:
abandoned fan--
I return it
to the plum blossom thief

jp: .ちる梅を屁とも思はぬ御顔哉
ro: chiru ume wo he to mo omowanu o-kao kana
en:
not giving a damn
that plum blossoms fall...
his stern face

jp: .鳥の音に咲うともせず梅の花
ro: tori no ne ni sakô to mo sezu ume no hana
en:
the bird is singing
but it ain't blooming...
plum tree

jp: .薮梅の散もべんべんだらり哉
ro: yabu ume no chiru mo ben-ben darari kana
en:
in the thicket
the plum blossoms scatter
languidly

jp: .比もよし五十三次華見笠
ro: koro mo yoshi go jû san tsugi hanami-gasa
en:
good timing!
at all 53 post towns
umbrella-hatted blossom viewers

jp: .似た声の径は聞也華雲り
ro: nita koe no michi wa kiku nari hana kumori
en:
two voices that sound alike
make their way...
clouds of blossoms

jp: .正直はおれも花より団子哉
ro: shôjiki wa ore mo hana yori dango kana
en:
honestly--
even more than blossoms
I love dumplings!

jp: .花さくやとある木陰も開帳仏
ro: hana saku ya to aru kokage mo kaichôbutsu
en:
cherry blossoms--
under every tree
a Buddha on display

jp: .花の世は石の仏も親子哉
ro: hana no yo wa ishi no hotoke mo oyako kana
en:
world of blossoms--
even the stone Buddhas
parents and children

jp: .花の世は地蔵ぼさつも親子哉
ro: hana no yo wa jizô bosatsu mo oyako kana
en:
world of blossoms--
even the holy Jizos
parents and children

jp: .花さくや爺が腰の迷子札
ro: hana saku ya jiji ga koshi no maigo fuda
en:
cherry blossoms--
around grandpa's waist
a name tag

jp: .空色の傘のつづくや花盛り
ro: sora iro no kasa no tsuzuku ya hana sakari
en:
sky-blue parasols
one by one...
blossoms at their peak

jp: .御印文の頭に花のちりにけり
ro: go-inmon no atama ni hana no chiri ni keri
en:
onto the paper amulet
cherry blossoms
scatter

jp: .声々に花の木蔭のばくち哉
ro: koe-goe ni hana no kokage no bakuchi kana
en:
fussing, fussing
in the blossom shade...
gamblers

jp: .さすが花ちるにみれんはなかりけり
ro: sasuga hana chiru ni miren wa nakari keri
en:
when cherry blossoms
scatter...
no regrets

jp: .寝ころぶや御本丸御用の花の陰
ro: ne-korobu ya o-honmaru go-yô no hana no kage
en:
curled to sleep--
the important official
in cherry blossom shade

jp: .花衣よごれ去来と見ゆる也
ro: hana koromo yogore kyorai to miyuru nari
en:
my dirty blossom-viewing
robe...
I look like Kyorai

jp: .花見笠一日わらぢのぐはひ哉
ro: hanami-gasa ichi nichi waraji no guai kana
en:
my blossom-viewing umbrella-hat...
but all day
straw sandals in such a state!

jp: .蕗の葉に煮〆配りて花の陰
ro: fuki no ha ni nishime kubarite hana no kage
en:
a vegetable hodgepodge
on butterbur leaves...
cherry blossom shade

jp: .ほくほくと花見に来るはどなた哉
ro: hoku-hoku to hanami ni kuru wa donata kana
en:
rap-a-tap
who's that coming
to view the blossoms?

jp: .親負て子の手を引いてさくら哉
ro: oya oute ko no te wo hiite sakura kana
en:
carrying his mother
and leading his child by the hand...
cherry blossoms!

jp: .軍勢甲乙入べからずとさくら哉
ro: gunzei kô-otsu iri-bekarazu to sakura kana
en:
"No soldiers
allowed!"
say the cherry blossoms

jp: .花桜是にさへ人の倦日哉
ro: hana sakura kore ni sae hito no aku hi [kana]
en:
cherry trees in bloom--
yet some people
are tired of it

jp: .見かぎりし古郷の桜咲にけり
ro: mikagirishi furusato no sakura saki ni keri
en:
the home village
I abandoned...
cherry trees in bloom

jp: .ばばが餅ととが桜も咲にけり
ro: baba ga mochi toto ga sakura mo saki ni keri
en:
grandma's rice cakes
and papa's cherry tree
in bloom!

jp: .待々し桜と成れど田舎哉
ro: machi-machishi sakura to naredo inaka kana
en:
cherry blossoms
I waited and waited for...
countryside

jp: .桜花ちれちれ腹にたまる程
ro: sakura hana chire chire hara ni tamaru hodo
en:
O cherry blossoms
fall! fall!
enough to fill my belly

jp: .百尋の雨だれかぶる桜哉
ro: momohiro no amadare kaburu sakura kana
en:
a thousand gallons
shower from the eaves...
cherry blossoms

jp: .としよりも目の正月ぞさくら花
ro: toshiyori mo me no shôgatsu zo sakura hana
en:
even an old man
has New Year's eyes...
cherry blossoms

jp: .門桜ちらちら散るが仕事哉
ro: kado sakura chira-chira chiru ga shigoto kana
en:
gate's cherry tree
all this flit-flit flitting
is work!

jp: .君が代の大飯喰ふてさくら哉
ro: kimi ga yo no ômeshi kuute sakura kana
en:
a hearty meal
of Great Japan's rice...
cherry blossoms

jp: .君なくて誠に多太の桜哉
ro: kimi nakute makoto ni tadai no sakura kana
en:
without you--
how vast
the cherry blossom grove

jp: .さくらさく哉と炬燵で花見哉
ro: sakrua saku kana to kotatsu de hanami kana
en:
cherry trees in bloom--
warmed by a brazier
blossom-gazing

jp: .里の子の袂からちる桜かな
ro: sato no ko no tamoto kara chiru sakura kana
en:
trickling from
a village child's sleeve...
cherry blossoms

jp: .先生なくなりてはただの桜哉
ro: sensei nakunarite wa tada no sakura kana
en:
the master being dead
just ordinary...
cherry blossoms

jp: .散る桜心の鬼も出て遊べ
ro: chiru sakura kokoro no oni mo dete asobe
en:
cherry blossoms fall--
come out and play
devil in me!

jp: .散る桜心の鬼も角を折る
ro: chiru sakura kokoro no oni mo tsuno wo oru
en:
cherry blossoms scatter--
even the devil in me
has lost his horns

jp: .散桜称名うなる寺の犬
ro: chiru sakura shômyô unaru tera no inu
en:
in falling cherry blossoms
growling to Amida Buddha...
temple dog

jp: .隣から気の毒がるや遅ざくら
ro: tonari kara ki [no] dokugaru ya oso-zakura
en:
the neighbor expresses
his condolences...
late-blooming cherry tree

jp: .寝並んで遠見ざくらの評議哉
ro: ne narande tômi-zakura no hyôgi kana
en:
lying down in a row--
discussing the distant
cherry blossoms

jp: .畠中にのさばり立る桜哉
ro: hata naka ni nosabari tateru sakura kana
en:
lording over
the farm field...
a cherry tree in bloom

jp: .末世末代でもさくらさくら哉
ro: masse matsudai demo sakura sakura kana
en:
a corrupt world
in its latter days...
but cherry blossoms!

jp: .深山木のしなの五月も桜哉
ro: miyamagi no shinano no gogatsu mo sakura kana
en:
Shinano's deep wooded mountains
even in Fifth Month...
cherry blossoms

jp: .欲面へ浴せかけたる桜哉
ro: yoku tsura e abise-kaketaru sakura kana
en:
pouring onto
the faces of sinners...
cherry blossoms

jp: .桃咲や犬にまたがる悪太郎
ro: momo saku ya inu ni matagaru akutarô
en:
peach blossoms--
riding a dog
the naughty boy

jp: .けろりくわんとして烏と柳哉
ro: kerorikan to shite karasu to yanagi kana
en:
keeping their cool--
the crow
the willow

jp: .犬の子の踏まへて眠る柳哉
ro: inu no ko no fumaete nemuru yanagi kana
en:
the sleeping puppy
paws
at the willow

jp: .門柳しだるる世事はなかりけり
ro: kado yanagi shidaruru seji wa nakari keri
en:
the willow at my gate
droops
just because

jp: .洗たくの婆々へ柳の夕なびき
ro: sentaku no baba e yanagi no yû nabiki
en:
to the old woman
doing laundry, the evening
willow bows

jp: .眠り覚て柳の雫聞夜哉
ro: nemuri samete yagi no shizuku kiku yo kana
en:
waking from sleep--
drip-dripping willow
in the night

jp: .墓手水御門の柳浴てけり
ro: haka teuzu o-mon no yanagi abite keri
en:
cemetery font--
the willow at the gate
bathes

jp: .右は月左は水や夕柳
ro: migi wa tsuki hidari wa mizu ya yû yanagi
en:
moon to the right
water to the left...
the evening willow

jp: .水まして蝦這のぼる柳哉
ro: mizu mashite ebi hai-noburu yanagi kana
en:
water rising--
the shrimp crawls up
the willow

jp: .柳からまねまね出たり狐面
ro: yanagi kara mane-mane detari kitsune tsura
en:
peeking out
from the willow tree...
face of a fox

jp: .夏の寝覚月の堤へ出たりけり
ro: ge no nezame tsukimi ni dote e detari keri
en:
waking from summer sleep--
moon gazing
on the levee

jp: .夏の夜や河辺の月も今三日
ro: natsu no yo ya kawabe no tsuki mo ima mikka
en:
summer night--
the moon by the river
just a sliver

jp: .夏の夜や枕にしたる筑波山
ro: natsu no ya ya makura ni shitaru tsukuba yama
en:
in the summer night
it's a pillow...
Mount Tsukuba

jp: .短夜をさっさと開く桜かな
ro: mijika yo wo sassa to hiraku sakura kana
en:
popping open
in the short summer night...
cherry blossoms

jp: .暑き夜や藪にも馴てひぢ枕
ro: atsuki yo ya yabu ni mo narete hiji makura
en:
hot night in the trees--
I'm getting used to it
arm for a pillow

jp: .けふもけふも翌もあついか薮の家
ro: kyô mo kyô mo asu [mo] atsui ka yabu no ie
en:
today too, heat
and tomorrow, more heat?
house in the trees

jp: .じっとして白い飯くふ暑かな
ro: jitto shite shiroi meshi kuu atsusa kana
en:
quiet and still
I eat my white rice...
the heat

jp: .稗の葉の門より高き暑哉
ro: hie no ha no kado yori tataki atsusa kana
en:
from the barnyard grass
at the gate, rising...
the heat

jp: .萱庇やはり涼しき鳥の声
ro: kaya-bisashi yahari suzushiki tori no koe
en:
cooling under the eaves
and just as cool...
birdsong

jp: .涼風を真向に居へる湖水哉
ro: suzukaze wo mamuki ni ieru kosui kana
en:
facing the cool breeze
straight on...
a lake

jp: .涼しさは三月も過る鳥の声
ro: suzushisa wa yayoi mo sugiru tori [no] koe
en:
cool air--
"Third Month has passed!'
sings the bird

jp: .涼風も隣の竹のあまり哉
ro: suzukaze mo tonari no take no amari kana
en:
the cool breeze
through my neighbor's bamboo
just a remnant

jp: .朝涼や汁の実を釣るせどの海
ro: asasuzu ya shiru no mi wo tsuru sedo no umi
en:
morning cool--
fishing for soup stock
in his back door sea

jp: .涼しさは蚊を追ふ妹が杓子哉
ro: suzushisa wa ka wo ou imo ga shakushi kana
en:
cool air--
my wife chases a mosquito
with a spoon

jp: .涼しさや扇でまねく千両雨
ro: suzushisa ya ôgi de maneku senryô ame
en:
cool air--
he beckons with his fan
a rain of golden coins

jp: .雨三粒天から土用見舞かな
ro: ame san tsubu ten kara doyô mimai kana
en:
three raindrops
a greeting card from heaven...
midsummer heat

jp: .五月雨夜の山田の人の声
ro: satsuki ame yoru no yamada no hito no koe
en:
Fifth Month rain--
in a mountain field at night
voices

jp: .五月雨の竹にはさまる在所哉
ro: samidare no take ni hasamaru zaisho kana
en:
in Fifth Month rain
tucked among bamboo...
farmhouse

jp: .朝顔に翌なる蔓や五月雨
ro: asagao ni asu naru tsuru ya satsuki ame
en:
vines today
morning-glories tomorrow...
Fifth Month rain

jp: .ちさい子が草背負けり五月雨
ro: chisai ko ga kusa seoi keri satsuki ame
en:
a small child
a bundle of hay on his back...
Fifth Month rain

jp: .夕立や乞食どのの鉢の松
ro: yûdachi ya kojiki dono no hachi no matsu
en:
rainstorm--
a beggar with his potted
pine

jp: .夕立を見せびらかすや山の水
ro: yûdachi wo misebirakasu ya yama no mizu
en:
showing off
with a cloudburst...
mountain's water

jp: .翌ははや只の河原か夏の月
ro: asu wa haya tada no kawara ka natsu no tsuki
en:
tomorrow morning
a humdrum river beach again?
summer moon

jp: .夏の月河原の人も翌引る
ro: natsu no tsuki kawara no hito mo asu hikeru
en:
summer moon--
this river beach crowd
gone tomorrow

jp: .家陰行人の白さや夏の月
ro: ya-kage yuku hito no shirosa ya natsu no tsuki
en:
the man's whiteness
walking in the house's shadow...
summer moon

jp: .ﾂあらしかいだるげなる人の顔
ro: aoarashi kaidarugenaru hito no kao
en:
wind on the greenery--
the weary faces
of people

jp: .草刈の馬に寝て来ル青あらし
ro: kusa kari no uma ni nete kuru aoarashi
en:
to the grass-cutting
horse where he lies...
wind on the greenery

jp: .夏山ののしかかったる入江哉
ro: natsu yama no noshi-kakattaru irie kana
en:
the summer mountain
leans
on the cove

jp: .姫ゆりの心ありげの清水哉
ro: himeyuri no kokoro arige no shimizu kana
en:
touching the princess lily's
heart...
pure water

jp: .わらぢ売る木陰の爺が清水哉
ro: waraji uru kokage no jiji ga shimizu kana
en:
selling straw sandals
in the shade, an old man...
pure water

jp: .青田原箸とりながら見たりけり
ro: aodabara hashi tori nagara mitari keri
en:
green rice field--
grabbing the chopsticks
he watches

jp: .箸持ってぢっと見渡る青田哉
ro: hashi motte jitto miwataru aoda kana
en:
chopsticks in hand
his steady gaze
on the green rice field

jp: .下手植の稲もそろそろ青みけり
ro: heta ue no ine mo soro-soro aomi keri
en:
even poorly planted
rice plants
slowly, slowly...green!

jp: .かたつぶりそろそろ登れ富士の山
ro: katatsuburi soro-soro nobore fuji no yama
en:
little snail
inch by inch, climb
Mount Fuji!

jp: .大川へはらはら蚤を御祓哉
ro: ôgawa e hara-hara nomi wo misogi kana
en:
to the great river
fleas go flitting...
rite of purification

jp: .御鴉も鶯も潜る茅の輪哉
ro: o-karasu mo uguisu mo kuguru chinowa kana
en:
crow and nightingale
pass through it too...
purification hoop

jp: .それでこそ古き夕べぞ葺菖蒲
ro: sore de koso furuki yûbe zo fuki ayame
en:
the perfect thing
for an old-time evening...
thatch of irises

jp: .鳴さうな虫のあれあれ葺あやめ
ro: naki-sô na mushi no are-are fuki ayame
en:
an insect singing?
look! look!
thatch of irises

jp: .君が代は乞食の家ものぼり哉
ro: kimi ga yo wa kojiki no ie mo nobori kana
en:
Great Japan!
even a beggar's house
has a summer banner

jp: .つかれ鵜の節句やすみもなかりけり
ro: tsukare u no sekku yasumi mo nakari keri
en:
weary cormorant--
no festival holiday
for you

jp: .汗拭て墓に物がたる別哉
ro: ase fukite haka ni monogataru wakare kana
en:
mopping sweat--
at his tomb I tell my story
then go

jp: .小娘も菩薩気どりよ更衣
ro: ko musume mo bosatsu kidori yo koromogae
en:
even the little girl
poses like a saint...
new summer robe

jp: .小短き旅して見たや更衣
ro: ko mijikaki tabi shite mita ya koromogae
en:
taking a tiny trip
to see and be seen...
new summer robes

jp: .更衣松風聞に出たりけり
ro: koromogae matsu kaze kiki ni detari keri
en:
new summer robes--
listening to the pine breeze
they emerge

jp: .杉の香に鶯ききぬ衣がへ
ro: sugi no ka ni uguisu kikinu koromogae
en:
amid scented cedars
a nightingale's song...
new summer robes

jp: .朝湯から直に着ならふ袷哉
ro: asa yu kara sugu ni ki narau awase kana
en:
after morning's hot bath
trying it on...
summer kimono

jp: .白妙の帷子揃ふ川辺哉
ro: shirotae no katabira sorou kawabe kana
en:
one and all
in white summer kimonos...
riverbank

jp: .寺の児赤かたびらはいつ迄ぞ
ro: tera no chigo aka katabira wa itsu made zo
en:
temple toddler--
how long will you wear
your little red kimono?

jp: .夕ぐれの古帷子を我世かな
ro: yûgure no furu katabira wo waga yo kana
en:
evening's old
summer kimono...
my world

jp: .我門や蓙一枚のなつ座敷
ro: waga kado ya goza ichi mai no natsu zashiki
en:
at my gate--
one straw mat
my summer room

jp: .かくれ家や死ば簾の青いうち
ro: kakurega ya shinaba sudare no aoi uchi
en:
secluded house--
if I die may the bamboo blinds
still be green

jp: .むら雨やほろがやの子に風とどく
ro: murasame ya horogaya no ko ni kaze todoku
en:
a rain shower--
in her little mosquito net
touched by the breeze

jp: .翌日も翌同じ夕べや独り蚊屋
ro: asu mo asu onaji yûbe ya hitori kaya
en:
tomorrow night and the next
the same...
in my mosquito net, alone

jp: .鹿の背にくすくす鳥の昼寝哉
ro: shika no se ni kusu-kusu tori no hirune kana
en:
on the deer's back
the songbird takes
a siesta

jp: .人並に猿もごろりと昼寝哉
ro: hito nami ni saru mo gorori to hirune kana
en:
like the humans
a monkey too
curled up for siesta

jp: .松影や扇でまねく千両雨
ro: matsu kage ya ôgi de maneku senryo ame
en:
pine tree shade--
he beckons with his fan
a rain of golden coins

jp: .団扇張って先そよがする浮草哉
ro: uchiwa hatte mazu soyogasuru ukisa kana
en:
after re-papering
the first thing I fan...
duckweed

jp: .結構にかやりの上の朝日哉
ro: kekkô ni kayari no ue no asahi kana
en:
how pretty
over smudge pot smoke...
morning sun

jp: .蚊いぶしや赤く咲けるは何の花
ro: ka ibushi ya akaku sakeru wa nan no hana
en:
in smudge pot smoke
blooming red...
what flower is that?

jp: .畠々や蚊やりはそよぐ虫の鳴
ro: hata hata ya kayari wa soyogu mushi no naku
en:
garden after garden
smudge pot smoke wafts
insects sing

jp: .浦風に旅忘レけり夕涼
ro: ura kaze ni tabi wasure keri yûsuzumi
en:
in the beach breeze
my travels forgotten...
evening cool

jp: .松陰に人入替る涼み哉
ro: matsu kage ni hito irekawaru suzumi kana
en:
in pine tree shade
people take turns...
the cool air

jp: .草履ぬいで人をゆるして涼み台
ro: zôri nuide hito wo yurushite suzumi dai
en:
everyone kick off
your straw sandals!
evening cool

jp: .皆草履ぬがずに通れ夕涼
ro: mina zôri nugazu ni tôre yûsuzumi
en:
everyone keep on
your straw sandals!
evening cool

jp: .身の上の鐘ともしらで夕涼み
ro: mi no ue no kane to mo shirade yûsuzumi
en:
not knowing the bell
rings away life...
evening cool

jp: .夜涼や足でかぞへるしなの山
ro: yo suzumi ya ashi de kazoeru shinano yama
en:
evening cool--
with my feet counting
the mountains of Shinano

jp: .煤けたる家向きあふて夕涼み
ro: susuketaru ie mukiaute yûsuzumi
en:
turning to face
my soot-blackened house...
evening cool

jp: .夜に入ば下水の側も涼み哉
ro: yo ni ireba gesui no soba mo suzumi kana
en:
as night falls
even next to a sewer...
cool air

jp: .雨の日やひとりまじめに田を植る
ro: ame no hi ya hitori majime ni ta wo ueru
en:
rainy day--
alone and diligent
planting rice

jp: .道とふも遠慮がましき田植哉
ro: michi tou mo enryogamashiki taue kana
en:
even asking directions
I hesitate...
rice planters

jp: .もたいなや昼寝して聞田うへ唄
ro: motaina ya hirune shite kiku taue uta
en:
ashamed
napping, hearing
the rice-planting song

jp: .しなのぢや上の上にも田うえ唄
ro: shinano ji ya ue no ue ni mo taue uta
en:
Shinano road--
higher and higher
the rice-planting songs

jp: .鶯も笠きて出よ田植唄
ro: uguisu mo kasa kite ide yo taue uta
en:
you, too, nightingale
go with an umbrella-hat!
rice-planting song

jp: .しかの子にわるぢえ付けななく烏
ro: shika no ko ni warujie tsukena naku karasu
en:
don't teach your tricks
to the fawn!
cawing crows

jp: .萩の葉にかくれくらする鹿の子哉
ro: hagi no ha ni kakure kurasuru kanoko kana
en:
in bush clover
staying well hidden...
a fawn

jp: .こんな夜は庵にもあろか時鳥
ro: konna yo wa io ni mo aro ka hototogisu
en:
is the night this nice
back at the hut?
cuckoo

jp: .うの花も馳走にさくかほととぎす
ro: u no hana mo chisô ni saku ka hototogisu
en:
are you feasting
on tofu dregs too?
cuckoo

jp: .どこを押せばそんな音が出ル時鳥
ro: doko wo oseba son[na] ne ga deru hototogisu
en:
where were you poked
to make that sound...
cuckoo?

jp: .江戸庭へ片足入れば時鳥
ro: edo niwa e kata ashi ireba hototogisu
en:
stepping one foot
in an Edo garden
"cuckoo!"

jp: .そっと鳴け隣は武士ぞ時鳥
ro: sotto nake tonari wa bushi zo hototogisu
en:
sing soft!
a samurai lives next door
cuckoo

jp: .柳から明て鳴きけりほととぎす
ro: yanagi kara akete naki keri hototogisu
en:
after dawn hits
the willow...
a cuckoo sings

jp: .それそこの朝顔つむな閑古鳥
ro: sore soko no asagao tsumu na kankodori
en:
don't peck that
morning-glory!
mountain cuckoo

jp: .百両の鶯老を鳴にけり
ro: hyaku ryô no uguisu oi wo naki ni keri
en:
the priceless nightingale
warbles
even in summer

jp: .鶯も老をうつるな草の家
ro: uguisu mo oi wo utsuru na kusa no ie
en:
nightingale--
don't catch old age!
thatched house

jp: .鶯も老をうつるな藪の家
ro: uguisu mo oi wo utsuru na yabu no ie
en:
nightingale--
don't catch old age!
house in the trees

jp: .よい風を鼻にかけてや行々し
ro: yoi kaze wo hana ni kakete ya gyôgyôshi
en:
taking credit
for the good wind...
reed thrush

jp: .笠程な花が咲たぞとべ蛍
ro: kasa hodona hana ga saita zo tobe hotaru
en:
a flower big
as an umbrella-hat...
fly there firefly!

jp: .蚊いぶしにやがて蛍も行にけり
ro: ka ibushi ni yagate hotaru mo yuki ni keri
en:
mosquito smudge smoke--
soon the fireflies
leave too

jp: .茶の水も筧で来る也蛍来る
ro: cha no mizu mo kakehi de kuru nari hotaru kuru
en:
from the tea water's
water pipe also comes...
a firefly

jp: .一握草も売也ほたるかご
ro: hito nigiri kusa mo uru nari hotaru kago
en:
sold with a clump
of grass...
firefly cage

jp: .蛍こよ蛍こよとよひとり酒
ro: hotaru ko yo hotaru ko yo to yo hitori-zake
en:
come, firefly!
firefly, come!
drinking alone

jp: .宵越しの豆腐明りの薮蚊哉
ro: yoigoshi no tôfu akari no yabu ka kana
en:
left out all night
the tofu gleams...
mosquitoes

jp: .夕暮や蚊が鳴出してうつくしき
ro: yûgure ya ka ga nakidashite utsukushiki
en:
evening falls--
the whine of mosquitoes
pretty

jp: .昼の蚊を後ろにかくす仏かな
ro: hiru no ka wo ushiro ni kakusu hotoke kana
en:
midday's mosquitoes
hidden behind
the Buddha of stone

jp: .豊年の声を上けり門の蝿
ro: hônen no koe wo age keri kado no hae
en:
"It's a good year!"
they buzz...
flies at the gate

jp: .川中へ蚤を飛ばする旦哉
ro: kawa naka e nomi wo tobasuru ashita kana
en:
into the river
fleas are tossed...
sunrise

jp: .うら山を遊び歩行や寺の蚤
ro: ura yama wo asobi aruku ya tera no nomi
en:
on a pleasure walk
up the mountain...
temple flea

jp: .羽蟻出る迄に目出度庵哉
ro: ha-ari deru made ni medetaki iori kana
en:
until the winged ants
come out
my fortunate hut

jp: .ねがはくば念仏を鳴け夏の蝉
ro: negawakuba nembutsu wo nake natsu no semi
en:
if you're praying
pray to Amida Buddha!
summer cicadas

jp: .我宿のおくれ鰹も月よ哉
ro: waga yado wa okure katsuo mo tsuki yo kana
en:
at my house
late-summer bonito
and bright moon

jp: .昼顔にふんどし晒す小僧かな
ro: hirugao ni fundoshi sarasu kozô kana
en:
in day flowers
airing out his loincloth...
little boy

jp: .けし提て群集の中を通いけり
ro: keshi sagete gunshû no naka wo tôri keri
en:
carrying a poppy
he passes through
the crowd

jp: .善尽し美を尽してもけしの花
ro: zen tsukushi bi wo tsukushite mo keshi no hana
en:
virtue beyond virtue
beauty beyond beauty...
just a poppy!

jp: .扇にて尺をとらせるぼたん哉
ro: ôgi nite shaku wo toraseru botan kana
en:
made to measure it
with a fan...
the peony

jp: .掃人の尻で散たる牡丹かな
ro: haku hito no shiri de chiritaru botan kana
en:
petals scattered
by the sweeper's butt...
peony

jp: .蓮の香や昼寝の上を吹巡る
ro: hasu no ka ya hirune no ue wo fuki meguru
en:
midday nap--
the scent of lotuses
meanders

jp: .犬の声ぱったり止て蓮の花
ro: inu no koe pattari yamite hasu no hana
en:
suddenly
the dog stops barking...
lotus blossoms!

jp: .なでしこや地蔵菩薩の跡先に
ro: nadeshiko ya jizô bosatsu no ato saki ni
en:
blooming pinks
behind and in front
of holy Jizo

jp: .浮草や魚すくふたる小菅笠
ro: ukikusa ya uo sukuutaru ko suge-gasa
en:
duckweed--
rescuing a fish scooped up
with a little sedge hat

jp: .朝富士の天窓へ投る早苗哉
ro: asa fuji no atama e hôru sanae kana
en:
hurled at the head
of morning Fuji...
rice plants

jp: .象潟や蛍まぶれの早苗舟
ro: kisagata ya hotaru mabure no sanae fune
en:
Kisa Lagoon--
sparkling with fireflies
the rice planting boat

jp: .麦秋の小隅に咲る椿かな
ro: mugi aki no kosumi ni sakitaru tsubaki kana
en:
blooming in a nook
of ripened barley...
camellias

jp: .ことし竹真直に旭登りけり
ro: kotoshi take masugu ni asahi nobori keri
en:
newborn bamboo--
straight up the morning sun
climbing

jp: .藪竹もわかいうちとてそよぐ也
ro: yabu take mo wakai uchi tote soyogu nari
en:
the thicket's bamboo
like all young folk...
agitated

jp: .竹の子の影の川こす旭哉
ro: takenoko no kage no kawa kosu asahi kana
en:
bamboo shoot shadows
cross the river...
morning sun

jp: .一番の大竹の子を病かな
ro: ichiban no ôtakenoko wo yamai kana
en:
the tallest
of the bamboo shoots...
sickly

jp: .葉がくれの瓜を枕に子猫哉
ro: ha-gakure no uri wo makura ni ko neko kana
en:
in leafy shade
a melon for a pillow...
a kitten

jp: .草の戸や一月ばかり冷し瓜
ro: kusa no to ya hito tsuki bakari hiyashi uri
en:
my hut--
the only cooling melon
is the moon

jp: .門口にわか葉かぶさる雨日哉
ro: kado-guchi ni wakaba kabusaru ame hi kana
en:
the gateway shelters
fresh green leaves...
a rainy day

jp: .存分に藤ぶら下るわか葉哉
ro: zonbun ni fuji burasagaru wakaba kana
en:
wisteria dangles
to its heart's content...
fresh green leaves

jp: .芝でした腰掛茶屋や夏木立
ro: shiba de shita koshikake chaya ya natsu kodachi
en:
making the lawn
a sit-down teahouse...
summer trees

jp: .法談のてまねも見へて夏木立
ro: hôdan no temane mo miete natsu kodachi
en:
the preacher's
hand gestures...
the summer trees

jp: .大寺は留主の体也夏木立
ro: ôtera wa rusu no tei nari natsu kodachi
en:
the big temple
looks empty...
summer trees

jp: .門脇や栗つくだけの木下闇
ro: kado waki ya kuri tsuku dake no ko shita yami
en:
no lazing at the gate
they husk chestnuts...
deep tree shade

jp: .柿の花おちてぞ人の目に留る
ro: kaki no hana ochite zo hito no me ni tomaru
en:
persimmon blossoms
falling...
only now noticed

jp: .卯の花の垣はわらぢの名代哉
ro: u no hana no kaki wa waraji no nadai kana
en:
deutzia blossom hedge--
famous straw sandals
for sale

jp: .花うばら垣ね曲る山家哉
ro: hana ubara kakine magareru yamaga kana
en:
circled by a hedge
of wild roses...
mountain home

jp: .もまれてや江戸のきのこは赤くなる
ro: momarete ya edo no kinoko wa akaku naru
en:
handled and squeezed
Edo's mushrooms
turn red

jp: .御地蔵の玉にもち添ふ李哉
ro: o-jizô no tama ni mochi-sou sumomo kana
en:
added to
holy Jizo's jewel...
a plum

jp: .門の月暑がへれば人もへる
ro: kado no tsuki atsusa ga hereba hito mo heru
en:
moon at the gate--
as the heat dwindles
so do people

jp: .次の間の行灯で寝る夜寒哉
ro: tsugi no ma no andon de neru yozamu kana
en:
by the next room's lamplight
I sleep...
a cold night

jp: .庵の夜の遊かげんの夜寒哉
ro: io no yo no asobi kagen no yozamu kana
en:
night in the hut
feeling like carousing...
a cold night

jp: .我庵や夜寒昼寒さて是は
ro: waga io ya yozamu hiru samu sate kore wa
en:
at my hut
cold nights, cold days...
ah well

jp: .山見ても海見ても秋の夕哉
ro: yama mite mo umi mite [mo] aki no yûbe kana
en:
looking at the mountain
looking at the sea...
autumn evening

jp: .御旅宿の秋の夕を忘れたり
ro: o-ryoshuku no aki no yûbe wo wasuretari
en:
at the inn
the autumn evening
is forgotten

jp: .芦の穂を蟹がはさんで秋の夕
ro: ashi no ho wo kani ga hasande aki no yû
en:
crabs jamming themselves
in the cattails...
autumn night

jp: .島々や一こぶしづつ秋の暮
ro: shima-jima ya hito kobushi-zutsu aki no kure
en:
every little island
fist after fist...
autumn dusk

jp: .夜は長し徳利はむなし放れ家
ro: yo wa nagashi tokuri wa munashi hanare ie
en:
the night is long
my bottle, empty
my house, set apart

jp: .夕蝉の翌ない秋をひたと鳴く
ro: yû semi no yoku nai aki wo hita to naku
en:
evening cicada--
a last nearby song
to autumn

jp: .霜おくやふとんの上の天の川
ro: shimo oku ya futon no ue no ama no kawa
en:
frost has formed
on the futon...
Milky Way above

jp: .ゆかしさよ田舎の竹も天の川
ro: yukashisa yo inaka no take mo ama no kawa
en:
charming--
in rural bamboo too
the Milky Way

jp: .出る月のかたは古郷の入江哉
ro: deru tsuki no kata wa furusato no iri-e kana
en:
where the moon is rising
the home village's
cove

jp: .さぞ今よひ古郷の川も月見哉
ro: sazo koyoi kokyô no kawa mo tsukimi kana
en:
on the river back home too
no doubt...
moon gazing

jp: .月今よひ古郷に似ざる山もなし
ro: tsuki koyoi kokyô ni nizaru yama mo nashi
en:
tonight's moon--
no mountain not like
the ones back home

jp: .月今よひ古郷に似たる山はいくつ
ro: tsuki koyoi kokyô ni nitaru yama wa ikutsu
en:
tonight's moon--
how many mountains resemble
the ones back home?

jp: .月今よひ山は古郷に似たる哉
ro: tsuki koyoi yama wa kokyô ni nitaru kana
en:
tonight's moon--
mountains just like
the ones back home

jp: .月やこよひ舟連ねしを平家蟹
ro: tsuki ya koyoi fune tsuraneshi wo heike-gani
en:
harvest moon--
side by side with the boat
a Heike crab

jp: .古郷に似たる山をかぞへて月見哉
ro: kokyô ni nitaru yama wo kazoete tsukimi kana
en:
counting mountains
like the ones back home...
moon gazing

jp: .よ所からはさぞ此島を月見哉
ro: yoso kara wa sazo kono shima wo tsukimi kana
en:
elsewhere, no doubt
someone's viewing this island
this moon

jp: .数珠かけて名月拝む山家哉
ro: juzu kakete meigetsu ogamu yamaga kana
en:
prayer beads dangling
a harvest moon prayer...
mountain home

jp: .御の字の月夜也けり草の雨
ro: on no ji no tsuki yo nari keri kusa no ame
en:
it's become a top-notch night
of harvest moon!
rain-drenched grass

jp: .御の字の月夜なりけり草の花
ro: on no ji no tsuki yo nari keri kusa no hana
en:
it's become a top-notch night
of harvest moon!
wildflowers

jp: .十五夜もただの山也秋の雨
ro: jûgoya mo tada no yama nari aki no ame
en:
harvest moon night
on the mountain, like any other...
autumn rain

jp: .名月や羽織でかくす欲と尿
ro: meigetsu ya haori de kakusu yoku to shito
en:
harvest moon--
hiding with their coats
lust and piss

jp: .名月や仏のやうに膝をくみ
ro: meigetsu ya hotoke no yô ni hiza wo kumi
en:
harvest moon--
sitting cross-legged
like Buddha

jp: .住吉の灯また消ル秋の風
ro: sumiyoshi no tomoshi mata kiyuru aki no kaze
en:
Sumiyoshi's lamps
die out again...
autumn wind

jp: .秋風や藻に鳴虫のいくそばく
ro: akikaze ya mo ni naku mushi no ikusobaku
en:
autumn wind--
singing in the duckweed
how many insects?

jp: .鳥飛や人は藻に鳴秋の風
ro: tori tobu ya hito wa mo ni naku aki no kaze
en:
a bird takes flight--
a shout in the duckweed
autumn wind

jp: .芦の穂の波に屯ス野分哉
ro: ashi no ho [no] nami ni tamuro su nowaki kana
en:
a barracks amid waves
of rushes gone to seed...
autumn gale

jp: .内に居ばおどり盛りの野分哉
ro: uchi ni oreba odori sakari no nowaki kana
en:
when it comes inside
it dances full fury...
autumn gale

jp: .ざぶざぶと暖き雨ふる野分哉
ro: zabu-zabu to nukuki ame furu nowaki kana
en:
splish-splash
a warm rain falls...
autumn gale

jp: .ぬくき雨のざぶりざぶりと野分哉
ro: nukuki ame no zaburi-zaburi to nowaki kana
en:
warm rain falling
splish-splash...
autumn gale

jp: .野分して又したたかのわか葉哉
ro: nowaki shite mata shitataka no wakaba kana
en:
autumn gale--
but the new leaves
hang tough

jp: .山は虹いまだに湖水は野分哉
ro: yama wa niji imada ni mizu wa nowaki kana
en:
rainbow over the mountain
yet on the lake
an autumn gale

jp: .寝むしろや野分に吹かす足のうら
ro: nemushiro ya nowaki ni fukasu ashi no ura
en:
sleeping mat--
the autumn gale blowing
the soles of my feet

jp: .いつぞやがいとまごひ哉墓の露
ro: itsuzoya ga itoma[go]i kana haka no tsuyu
en:
just the other day
we said goodbye...
dewy grave

jp: .白露に片袖寒き朝日哉
ro: shira tsuyu ni kata sode samuki asahi kana
en:
in the silver dew
one sleeve cold...
morning sun

jp: .人問わば露と答へよ合点か
ro: hito towaba tsuyu to kota[e] yo gatten ka
en:
if someone asks
answer: it's a dewdrop
OK?

jp: .身の上の露ともしらでさはぎけり
ro: mi no ue no tsuyu to mo shirade sawagi keri
en:
unaware of life
passing like dewdrops...
they frolic

jp: .白露の身にも大玉小玉から
ro: shira tsuyu no mi ni mo ôtama ko tama kara
en:
even among silver
dewdrops...
some big, some little

jp: .稲妻やすすきがくれの五十顔
ro: inazuma ya susuki-gakure no go jû kao
en:
lightning flash--
in pampas grass ensconced
a fifty year-old's face

jp: .稲妻に泣もありけり門すずみ
ro: inazuma ni naku mo ari keri kado suzumi
en:
the lightning flash
makes someone cry...
cooling at the gate

jp: .朝霧にあはただし木の雫哉
ro: asa-giri ni awatadashi ki no shizuku kana
en:
in morning mist
a frenzy of drops
from the tree

jp: .秋霧や河原なでしこぱっと咲く
ro: aki-giri ya kawara nadeshiko patto saku
en:
autumn mist--
the river beach's pinks
have bloomed in a flash

jp: .かたみ子や母が来るとて手をたたく
ro: katamigo ya haha ga kuru tote te wo tataku
en:
the orphan child
summons his mother
clapping

jp: .末の子や御墓参りの箒持
ro: sue no ko ya o-haka mai[ri] no hôki mochi
en:
the youngest child
on the grave visit
brings the broom

jp: .かき立って履見せる灯籠哉
ro: kaki tatte hakimono miseru tôro kana
en:
stoking it
to find my shoes...
lantern for the dead

jp: .御揃ひや孫星彦星やしゃご星
ro: o-soro[i] ya mago-boshi hiko-boshi yashago-boshi
en:
a gathering of stars--
children, grandchildren
great-great-grandchildren

jp: .川上にしばし里ある花火哉
ro: kawakami ni shibashi sato aru hanabi kana
en:
upstream a village
for just a little while...
fireworks

jp: .しずかさや外山の花火水をとぶ
ro: shizukasa ya toyama no hanabi mizu wo tobu
en:
silence--
the mountain's fireworks
fly into water

jp: .しばらくは湖も一っぱいの玉火哉
ro: shibaraku [wa] umi mo ippai no tamabi kana
en:
in a flash the lake
is filled...
with fireworks!

jp: .しばらくは闇のともしを花火哉
ro: shibaraku wa yami no tomoshi wo hanabi kana
en:
for a moment
the darkness is lighted...
fireworks

jp: .縁はなや二文花火も夜の体
ro: en hana ya ni mon hanabi mo yoru no tei
en:
at verandah's edge
two-penny fireworks
in the night

jp: .負角力親も定めて見ていべき
ro: make-zumô oya mo sadamete mite ibeki
en:
defeated sumo wrestler--
his father
must be watching

jp: .楠に汝も仕へしかがし哉
ro: kusunoki ni nare mo tsukaeshi kagashi kana
en:
protecting the camphor tree
too...
scarecrow

jp: .人はいさ直な案山子もなかりけり
ro: hito wa isa suguna kagashi mo nakari keri
en:
like people
an upright scarecrow
can't be found

jp: .老の身やかがしの前も恥しき
ro: oi no mi ya kagashi no mae mo hazukashiki
en:
my old age--
even facing a scarecrow
ashamed

jp: .姨捨しあたりをとへばきぬた哉
ro: obasuteshi atari wo toeba kinuta kana
en:
when I ask the way
to Obasute...
pounding cloth

jp: .飯けむり賑ひにけり夕ぎぬた
ro: meshi kemuri nigiwai ni keri yûginuta
en:
an abundance
of cooking smoke...
evening cloth-pounding

jp: .近砧遠砧さて雨夜かな
ro: chika kinuta tô-ginuta sate ame yo kana
en:
cloth-pounding near
cloth-pounding far...
a rainy night

jp: .神前の草にこぼして新酒哉
ro: shinzen no kusa ni koboshite shinshu kana
en:
into the grass
at the shrine, pouring...
new sake

jp: .うかれ舟や山には鹿の妻をよぶ
ro: ukare fune ya yama ni wa shika no tsuma wo yobu
en:
pleasure boat--
on the mountain a deer
calls his wife

jp: .おれがふく笛と合すや鹿の声
ro: ore ga fuku fue to awasu ya shika no koe
en:
making a duet
with my flute...
cry of a deer

jp: .淋しさに鵙がそら鳴したりけり
ro: sabishisa ni mozu ga sora naki shitari keri
en:
solitude--
that song the shrike
is singing!

jp: .鵙なくやむら雨かはくうしろ道
ro: mozu naku ya murasame kawaku ushiro michi
en:
a shrike sings--
rain puddles dry
on the back road

jp: .雁おりて畠も名所のひとつ哉
ro: kari orite hata mo meisho no hitotsu kana
en:
geese landing--
the farmer's field too
a famous resort

jp: .天津雁おれが松にはおりぬ也
ro: amatsu kari ore ga matsu ni wa orinu nari
en:
celestial geese--
none of them come down
to my pine

jp: .門の雁袖引雨がけふも降
ro: kado no kari sode hiku ame ga kyô mo furu
en:
geese at my gate--
another seductive rain
falls today

jp: .雁おりよ昔の芦の名所也
ro: kari ori yo mukashi no ashi no meisho nari
en:
geese descend--
the ancient rushes
a famous resort

jp: .雁鳴やあはれ今年も片月見
ro: kari naku ya aware kotoshi mo kata tsuki mi
en:
geese honking--
this damned year, too
moon gazing interrupted

jp: .山雀も左右へ別るる八島哉
ro: yamagara mo sau e wakaruru yashima kana
en:
the titmice split
to the left and right...
Yashima Island

jp: .満汐や月頭には虫の声
ro: michi shio ya tsuki atama ni wa mushi no koe
en:
high tide--
atop the moon's head
insects singing

jp: .虫の声しばし障子を離れざる
ro: mushi no koe shibashi shôji wo hanarezaru
en:
the insect's song
on the paper door
lingers

jp: .鳴ながら虫の流るる浮木かな
ro: naki nagara mushi no nagaruru ukigi kana
en:
still singing
the insect drifts away...
floating branch

jp: .蓑虫や鳴ながら枝にぶら下る
ro: minomushi ya naki nagara ni burasagaru
en:
the bagworm
sings a song dangling
from a branch

jp: .蓑虫が餅恋しいと鳴くにけり
ro: minomushi ga mochi koishii to naki ni keri
en:
the bagworm
sings a song...
"I love rice cake!"

jp: .日ぐらしや我影法師のあみだ笠
ro: higurashi ya waga kageboshi no amida-gasa
en:
a cicada chirrs--
my shadow's umbrella-hat
makes a halo!

jp: .夕日影町いっぱいのとんぼ哉
ro: yû hikage machi ippai no tombo kana
en:
sunset--
the town is buzzing
with dragonflies

jp: .蜻蛉の百度参りやあたご山
ro: tombô no hyakudo mairi ya atago yama
en:
the dragonfly's
100 prayer pilgrimage...
Mount Atago

jp: .ぬぎ捨し笠に一ぱいいなご哉
ro: nugi-suteshi kasa ni ippai inago kana
en:
the discarded
umbrella-hat is loaded...
with locusts

jp: .ばらばらと臑に飛つくいなご哉
ro: bara-bara to sune ni tobitsuku inago kana
en:
rustle, rustle
leaping at my shins...
locusts

jp: .水鉢にちょっと泳ぎしいなご哉
ro: mizu hachi ni chotto oyogishi inago kana
en:
a quick dip
in the water bowl...
locust

jp: .きりぎりす野の牛も聞風情哉
ro: kirigirisu no no ushi mo kiku fuzei kana
en:
song of the katydid--
even the field cow
a connoisseur

jp: .小便の身ぶるひ笑へきりぎりす
ro: shôben no miburui warae kirigirisu
en:
laugh at my piss
and shudder...
katydid

jp: .我死なば墓守となれきりぎりす
ro: ware shinaba haka mori to nare kirigirisu
en:
when I die
guard my grave
katydid!

jp: .赤い花頬ばって鳴きりぎりす
ro: aka[i] hana hôbatte naku kirigirisu
en:
cheeks stuffed
with a red flower
the katydid sings

jp: .きりぎりす声をからすな翌も秋
ro: kirigirisu koe wo karasu na asu mo aki
en:
don't get hoarse
katydid! tomorrow is
autumn too

jp: .古犬や蚯蚓の唄にかんじ顔
ro: furu inu ya mimizu no uta ni kanji-gao
en:
the old dog
looks as if he's listening...
earthworms sing

jp: .片隅に日向ぼこして隠居菊
ro: kata sumi ni hinata bokoshite inkyo kiku
en:
in a little nook
basking in the sun...
hermit chrysanthemum

jp: .酒臭き黄昏ごろや菊の花
ro: sake kusaki tasogare goro ya kiku no hana
en:
the smell of sake
around about dusk...
chrysanthemum

jp: .猫の鈴夜永の菊の咲にけり
ro: neko no rin yonaga no kiku no saki ni keri
en:
cat's bell--
in the long night the chrysanthemum
has bloomed

jp: .痩菊もよろよろ花となりにけり
ro: yase kiku mo yoro-yoro hana to nari ni keri
en:
the emaciated chrysanthemum
totters
into bloom

jp: .大菊の秋もずんずとくれにけり
ro: ôgiku no aki mo zunzu to kure ni keri
en:
for the big
chrysanthemum too
autumn ends quickly

jp: .朝顔をふはりと浮す茶碗哉
ro: asagao wo fuwari to ukasu chawan kana
en:
morning-glories
softly floating...
in the teacup

jp: .鈴がらりがらり朝顔ひとつさく
ro: suzu garari-garari asagao hitotsu saku
en:
the shrine's bell
jingles, a morning-glory
blooms

jp: .夕立をくねり返すや女郎花
ro: yûdachi wo kuneri kaesu ya ominaeshi
en:
shaking her body
in the summer rain...
maiden flower

jp: .鹿垣にむすび込るる萩の花
ro: shika kaki ni musubi-komaruru hagi no hana
en:
woven into
the deer fence...
bush clover blooms

jp: .山畠やそばの白さもぞっとする
ro: yama hata ya soba no shirosa mo zotto suru
en:
mountain field--
blooming buckwheat's whiteness
makes me shiver

jp: .寒いぞよ軒の蜩唐がらし
ro: samui zo yo noki no higurashi tôgarashi
en:
it's cold!
a cicada in the eaves
with hot peppers

jp: .穂すすきや細き心のさわがしき
ro: ho susuki ya hosoki kokoro no sawagashiki
en:
plumes of pampas grass--
the thin hearts
swishing

jp: .夕紅葉谷残虹の消へかかる
ro: yûmomiji tani zankô no kie kakaru
en:
evening's fall colors--
the rainbow in the valley
fades away

jp: .涼しさのたらぬ所へ一葉哉
ro: suzushisa no taranu tokoro e hito ha kana
en:
to a place
the cool air missed...
a leaf falls

jp: .幸にやきもちくるむ一葉かな
ro: saiwai ni yakimochi kurumu hito ha kana
en:
the roasted rice cake
wrapped for luck...
paulownia leaf

jp: .あっぱれに咲揃ふ昼の槿哉
ro: appare ni saki-sorou hiru no mukuge kana
en:
splendidly blooming
en masse, midday's
roses of Sharon

jp: .あっぱれの山家と見ゆる木槿哉
ro: appare no yamaga to miyuru mukuge kana
en:
a splendid mountain home
and roses
of Sharon

jp: .朝ばかり日のとどく渓のむくげ哉
ro: asa bakari hi no todoku tani no mukuge kana
en:
the early sun
reaches the valley...
roses of Sharon

jp: .てふてふのいまだにあかぬ木槿哉
ro: chôchô no imada ni akanu mukuge kana
en:
butterflies never
tire of them...
roses of Sharon

jp: .花木槿家不相応の垣ね哉
ro: hana mukuge ie fusôô no kakine kana
en:
roses of Sharon--
the hedge too good
for the house

jp: .花木槿里留守がちに見ゆる哉
ro: hana mukuge sato rusugachi [ni] miyuru kana
en:
such roses of Sharon!
yet the village
looks empty

jp: .木槿しばし家不相応のさかり哉
ro: mukuge shibashi ie fusôsô no sakari keri
en:
roses of Sharon--
too good for the house
they bloom

jp: .影法師の畳にうごくふくべ哉
ro: kageboshi no tatami ni ugoku fukube kana
en:
its shadow moves
across the tatami mat...
the gourd

jp: .へちまづる切って支舞ば他人哉
ro: hechima-zuru kitte shimaeba tanin kana
en:
after cutting
the loofah vine...
strangers

jp: .栃の実やいく日転げて麓迄
ro: tochi no mi ya iku hi korogete fumoto made
en:
horse chestnut--
how many days till you roll
down the mountain?

jp: .団栗と転げくらする小猫哉
ro: donguri to koroge kurasuru ko neko kana
en:
having a tumble
with the acorn...
kitten

jp: .雨上り柱見事にきのこ哉
ro: ameagari hashira migoto ni kinoko kana
en:
rain is over--
on the post a splendid
mushroom

jp: .我好て我する旅の寒さ哉
ro: ware sukite ware suru tabi no samu[sa] kana
en:
though I'm loving
these travels of mine...
it's cold!

jp: .門垣にほしておく也丸氷
ro: kado kaki ni hoshite oku nari maru kôri
en:
leaving it to melt
on the wall by the gate...
round ice

jp: .さわぐ雁そこらもとしが暮るかよ
ro: sawagu kari sokora mo toshi ga kururu ka yo
en:
clamoring geese--
over there is the year
ending too?

jp: .手枕や年が暮よとくれまいと
ro: temakura ya toshi ga kure yo to kure mai to
en:
an arm for a pillow--
the year ends
or doesn't end

jp: .初時雨夕飯買に出たりけり
ro: hatsu shigure yûmeshi kau ni detari keri
en:
first winter rain--
going out to buy
dinner

jp: .洛陽やちとも曲らぬ初時雨
ro: rakuyô ya chito mo magaranu hatsu shigure
en:
Kyoto--
falling straight down
the first winter rain

jp: .山鳩が泣事をいふしぐれ哉
ro: yama-bato ga nakigoto wo iu shigure kana
en:
the mountain pigeon
grumbles...
winter rain

jp: .しぐれ捨てしぐれ捨てけり野の仏
ro: shigure sute shigure sute keri no no hotoke
en:
the winter rain
dumps and dumps...
Buddha in the field

jp: .山寺の豆入日也初時雨
ro: yamadera no mame iri hi nari hatsu shigure
en:
mountain temple--
on bean-parching day
the first winter rain

jp: .かけがねの真赤に錆びて時雨哉
ro: kake-gane no makka [ni] sabite shigure kana
en:
the door latch
rusting scarlet...
winter rain

jp: .鶏頭の立往生や村時雨
ro: keitô no tachiôjô ya mura shigure
en:
the blooming cockscomb
dies standing up...
steady winter rain

jp: .しぐるるや逃る足さへちんば鶏
ro: shigururu ya nigeru ashi sae chinba-dori
en:
winter rain--
the lame chicken
limps away

jp: .山人の火を焚立る時雨哉
ro: yamaudo no hi wo takitateru shigure kana
en:
the mountain hermit's
fire is rising...
winter rain

jp: .こがらしや壁のうしろはえちご山
ro: kogarashi ya kabe no ushiro wa echigo yama
en:
winter wind--
behind the wall
Echigo mountains

jp: .木がらしや天井張らぬ大御堂
ro: kogarashi ya tenjô haranu ômidô
en:
winter wind--
and the great temple hall
is ceiling-less

jp: .木がらしや塒に迷ふ夕烏
ro: kogarashi ya negura ni mayou yû-garasu
en:
winter wind--
he can't find his roost
the evening crow

jp: .じっとして雪をふらすや牧の駒
ro: jitto shite yuki wo furasu ya maki no koma
en:
stone still
he lets the snow fall
colt in the pasture

jp: .雪散るやきのふは見へぬ借家札
ro: yuki chiru ya kinou wa mienu shakuya fuda
en:
falling snow--
yesterday it wasn't there
"House for Rent" sign

jp: .うまさふな雪やふふはりふふはりと
ro: uma sôna yuki ya fûwari fûwari to
en:
looking delicious
the snow falling softly
softly

jp: .念仏に拍子付たる霰哉
ro: nembutsu ni hyôshi tsuketaru arare kana
en:
keeping the beat
of the prayer to Buddha...
hailstones

jp: .箕の中の箸御祓や散霰
ro: mi no naka no hashi o-harai ya chiru arare
en:
stuck in his winnow
chopsticks and a charm...
hailstones

jp: .逃水のにげかくれてもかれの哉
ro: nigemizu no nige-kakurete mo kareno kana
en:
a mirage running
and hiding...
withered fields

jp: .ばせを忌やことしもまめで旅虱
ro: bashôki ya kotoshi mo mame de tabi-jirami
en:
Basho's Death-Day--
another year in good health
my journey's lice

jp: .寒垢離や首のあたりの水の月
ro: kangori ya kubi no atari no mizu no tsuki
en:
midwinter bathing--
his head, the moon
in the water

jp: .煤掃て松も洗て三ケの月
ro: susu haite matsu mo araute mike no tsuki
en:
sweeping the soot
washing the pine...
sickle moon

jp: .おく小野や藪もせき候節季候
ro: oku ono ya yabu mo sekizoro sekkizoro
en:
remote field--
even in a thicket
Twelfth Month singers!

jp: .傾城がかはいがりけり小せき候
ro: keisei ga kawaigari keri ko sekizoro
en:
the beautiful courtesan
pets the child...
Twelfth Month singer

jp: .跡臼は烏のもちか西方寺
ro: ato usu wa karasu no mochi ka saihôji
en:
is the next batch of rice cakes
for the crow?
Saiho Temple

jp: .餅つきや大黒さまもてつくつく
ro: mochi tsuki ya daikoku sama mo te tsuku-tsuku
en:
pounding rice cakes--
even the god of wealth
watches eagerly

jp: .江戸の子の在所の親へ衣くばり
ro: edo no ko no zaisho no oya e kinu kubari
en:
from their son in Edo
a gift for country parents...
new clothes

jp: .両国や舟も一組とし忘
ro: ryôgoku ya fune mo hito-gumi toshiwasure
en:
Ryogoku Bridge--
even on a boat, people
drinking away the year

jp: .小十年跡暦や庵の壁
ro: ko jû nen ato no koyomi ya io no kabe
en:
about ten years old--
the calendar
on my hut's wall

jp: .親と子と別れ別れや追れ鳥
ro: oya to ko to wakare wakare ya oware tori
en:
mother and children
are separated...
hunted birds

jp: .逃鳥や子をふり返りふり返り
ro: nige tori ya ko wo furikaeri furikaeri
en:
the fleeing bird
turns back to her children
turns back...

jp: .芭蕉塚先拝む也はつ紙子
ro: bashô-zuka mazu ogamu nari hatsu kamiko
en:
at Basho's grave
beginning with a prayer...
first paper robe

jp: .ぶつぶつと衾のうちの小言哉
ro: butsu-butsu to fusuma no uchi no kogoto kana
en:
grumble, grumble
in the winter quilt..
nagging

jp: .鼠らよ小便無用古衾
ro: nezumi-ra yo shôben muyô furu fusuma
en:
hey mice
no pissing on my old
winter quilt!

jp: .舟が着いて候とはぐふとん哉
ro: fune ga tsuite sôrô to hagu futon kana
en:
the boat arrives--
peeling off
the quilts

jp: .橇を子等に習ってはきにけり
ro: kanjiki wo kora ni naratte haki ni keri
en:
snowshoes--
children show me how
to put them on

jp: .そり引や犬が上荷乗て行
ro: sori hiku ya inu ga uwani nosete yuku
en:
a man pulls a snow sled
a dog atop
the cargo

jp: .大犬が尻でこぢるや雪筵
ro: ôinu ga shiri de kojiru ya yuki mushiro
en:
the big dog
wriggles in butt-first...
snow shed

jp: .おとろへやほた折かねる膝頭
ro: otoroe ya hota orikaneru hizagashira
en:
weak with age--
can't even break kindling
with my knee

jp: .大名もほた火によるや大井川
ro: daimyô mo hotabi ni yoru ya ôi-gawa
en:
a war lord too
draws near our fire...
Oi River

jp: .旅人にほた火をゆづる夜明哉
ro: tabibito ni hotabi wo yuzuru yoake kana
en:
giving a traveler
my place by the fire...
dawn

jp: .わらづとの納豆煙るほた火哉
ro: warazuto no nattô keburu hotabi kana
en:
straw-wrapped natto
smolders...
little wood fire

jp: .ひとり身や両国へ出て薬喰
ro: hitori mi ya ryôgoku e dete kusuri kuu
en:
my life alone--
all the way to Ryogoku Bridge
for medicine

jp: .鰒くふてしばらく扇づかひ哉
ro: fugu kuute shibaraku ôgi zukai kana
en:
after pufferfish soup
soon fans
are flitting

jp: .鰒喰ぬ顔で子どもの指南哉
ro: fugu kuwanu kao de kodomo no shinan kana
en:
making a face
he turns down the pufferfish soup...
teaching the children

jp: .みそさざい九月三十日も合点か
ro: misosazai kugatsu misoka mo gatten ka
en:
hey wren!
do you realize it's Ninth Month
30th day?

jp: .村千鳥そっと申せばかっと立
ro: mura chidori sotto moseba katto tatsu
en:
if I just whisper
the flock of plovers
bursts into flight

jp: .寒けしや枯ても針のある草は
ro: samukeshi ya karete mo hari no aru kusa wa
en:
cold--
the withered grasses
with prickles

jp: .我門や只四五本の大根倉
ro: waga kado ya tada shi go hon no daikon-gura
en:
my gate--
just four or five radishes
in store

jp: .今見れば皆欲目也枯木立
ro: ima mireba mina yokume nari kare kodachi
en:
still I see them
how they were...
bare winter trees

jp: .楢の葉の朝からちるや豆腐桶
ro: nara no ha no asa kara chiru ya tôfu oke
en:
an oak leaf this morning
fallen
in the tofu tub

jp: .水仙の笠かりて寝る雀哉
ro: suisen no kasa karite neru suzume kana
en:
borrowing the umbrella-hat
daffodil...
sleeping sparrow

jp: .水仙や垣にゆひ込むつくば山
ro: suisen ya kaki ni yuikomu tsukuba yama
en:
daffodils wreathing
into the fence...
Mount Tsukuba

jp: .元日や上々吉の浅黄空
ro: ganjitsu ya jôjôkichi no asagi-zora
en:
on New Year's Day
lucky! lucky!
a pale blue sky

jp: .永き日や水に画を書鰻掻き
ro: nagaki hi ya mizu ni e wo kaku unagikaki
en:
a long day--
the eel catcher writes pictures
on the water

jp: .出代りや蛙も雁も鳴別れ
ro: degawari ya kawazu mo kari mo naki wakare
en:
migrating servants--
even frogs and geese
cry when they part!

jp: .舞蝶にしばしは旅も忘けり
ro: mau chô ni shibashi wa tabi mo wasure keri
en:
dancing butterflies--
my journey forgotten
for a while

jp: .淋しさはどちら向ても菫かな
ro: sabishisa wa dochira muite mo sumire kana
en:
solitude--
whichever way I turn...
violets!

jp: .色鳥や木々にも花の放生会
ro: iro tori ya kigi ni mo hana no hôjôe
en:
like colorful birds
set free in the trees...
blossoms

jp: .苔の花小疵に咲や石地蔵
ro: koke no hana ko kizu ni saku ya ishi jizô
en:
moss blossoms bloom
in a little crack...
stone Jizo

jp: .木々おのおの名乗り出たる木の芽哉
ro: kigi ono-ono nanori idetaru ko no me kana
en:
every tree
with its calling card...
spring buds

jp: .象潟もけふは恨まず花の春
ro: kisagata mo kyô wa uramazu hana no haru
en:
even Kisa Lagoon
isn't hateful today...
blossoming spring

jp: .騒がしき世をし祓って遅桜
ro: sawagashiki yo wo oshi haratte oso-zakura
en:
the cure for
this raucous world...
late cherry blossoms

jp: .酔ってから咄も八重の桜哉
ro: yotte kara hanashi mo yae no sakura kana
en:
after getting drunk
even our talk...
double cherry blossoms

jp: .象潟や朝日ながらの秋のくれ
ro: kisagata ya asahi nagara no aki no kure
en:
Kisa Lagoon--
the morning sun rising
autumn dusk

jp: .象潟や島がくれ行刈穂舟
ro: kisagata ya shima-gakure yuku kariho-bune
en:
Kisa Lagoon--
from an island's shadow
a rice barge

jp: .三文が霞見にけり遠眼鏡
ro: san mon ga kasumi mi ni keri tômegane
en:
for three pennies
nothing but mist...
telescope

jp: .最う一里翌を歩行ん夏の月
ro: mô ichi ri asu wo arikan natsu no tsuki
en:
another two miles
for tomorrow's walk...
summer moon

jp: .かんこ鳥昼丑満の山路かな
ro: kankodori hiru ushi mitsu no yamaji kana
en:
mountain cuckoo--
early afternoon
on a mountain road

jp: .今迄は踏れて居たに花野かな
ro: ima made wa fumarete ita ni hanano kana
en:
up to now
people tramped there...
field of flowers

jp: .山寺や雪の底なる鐘の声
ro: yamadera ya yuki no soko naru kane no koe
en:
mountain temple--
deep under snow
a bell

jp: .汐浜を反故にして飛ぶ千鳥かな
ro: shiohama wo hogo ni shite tobu chidori kana
en:
messing up
the smooth-raked salt...
plovers

jp: .陽炎やむつましげなるつかと塚
ro: kagerô ya mutsumashigenaru tsuka to tsuka
en:
heat shimmers--
they look like dear friends
the two graves

jp: .雉鳴て梅に乞食の世也けり
ro: kiji naite ume ni kojiki no yo nari keri
en:
pheasant crying--
it's a plum blossom-filled
beggar's world now!

jp: .青梅に手をかけて寝る蛙哉
ro: aoume ni te wo kakete neru kawazu kana
en:
resting his hands
on the green plum, asleep...
a frog

jp: .浦々の波よけ椿咲にけり
ro: ura-ura no nami yoke tsubaki saki ni keri
en:
the coastal wall--
camellias
in bloom

jp: .華の友に又逢ふ迄は幾春や
ro: hana no tomo ni mata au made wa ikuharu ya
en:
my blossom comrades
when next we meet...
how many springs from now?

jp: .華のもと是非来て除掃勤ばや
ro: hana no moto zehi kite josô tsutomebaya
en:
I will return
to sweep the blossoms
under this tree

jp: .山下て桜見る気に成にけり
ro: yama orite sakura miru ki ni nari ni keri
en:
descending the mountain
a cherry blossom-viewing mood
sets in

jp: .五月雨や雪はいづこのしなの山
ro: samidare ya yuki wa izuko no shinano yama
en:
Fifth Month rain--
where's your snow now
Shinano mountains?

jp: .門の木も先つつがなし夕涼
ro: kado no ki mo mazu tsutsuganashi yûsuzumi
en:
even the tree by the gate
safe and sound...
evening cool

jp: .時鳥我身ばかりに降雨か
ro: hototogisu waga mi bakari ni furu ame ka
en:
cuckoo--
is this rain falling
only on me?

jp: .閑古鳥必ず我にあやかるな
ro: kankodori kanarazu ware ni ayakaru na
en:
O mountain cuckoo
don't try being
like me!

jp: .蓮の花虱を捨るばかり也
ro: hasu no hana shirami wo suteru bakari nari
en:
lotus blossoms--
just the place for discarded
lice

jp: .茨の花ここをまたげと咲にけり
ro: bara no hana koko wo matage to saki ni keri
en:
thorny wild roses
"Step over us here!"
as they bloom

jp: .きさがたや浪の上ゆく虫の声
ro: kisagata ya nami no ue yuku mushi no koe
en:
Kisa Lagoon--
riding on the waves
insects singing

jp: .吹降や家陰たよりて虫の声
ro: fukiburi ya ya kage tayorite mushi no koe
en:
windy rain--
shaded by the house
insects singing

jp: .松竹の行合の間より初日哉
ro: matsu take no yukiai no ma yori hatsu hi kana
en:
from meeting rooms
of pine and bamboo...
year's first dawn

jp: .行春の町やかさ売すだれ売
ro: yuku haru no machi ya kasa uri sudare uri
en:
spring ends in the town--
umbrella-hat, bamboo blind
vendors

jp: .春風や尾上の松に音はあれど
ro: haru kaze ya onoe no matsu ni ne wa aredo
en:
spring breeze--
the pine on the ridge
whispers it

jp: .いつ逢ん身はしらぬひの遠がすみ
ro: itsu awan mi wa shiranuhi no tôgasumi
en:
when will we meet again?
I'm off to the phosphorescent fires
in the far mist

jp: .白雲のかすみ吹抜く外山哉
ro: shiro-gumo no kasumi fukinuku toyama kana
en:
white clouds of mist
blow away...
the village's mountain

jp: .しら浪に夜はもどるか遠がすみ
ro: shiranami ni yoru wa modoru ka tôgasumi
en:
turning into white waves
at night?
the far mist

jp: .畠打が焼石積る夕べかな
ro: hata uchi ga yakeishi tsumeru yûbe kana
en:
the plowman stacks
volcanic rocks...
evening

jp: .うたかたや淡の波間の平家蟹
ro: utakata ya awa no namima no heike-gani
en:
sea foam--
in the fleeting wave
a Heike crab

jp: .剃捨て花見の真似やひのき笠
ro: sori-sutete hanami no mane ya hinoki-gasa
en:
cutting off my hair
like a blossom-viewing party!
wicker umbrella-hat

jp: .父ありて母ありて花に出ぬ日哉
ro: chichi arite haha arite hana ni denu hi kana
en:
having a father and a mother
he stays home...
blossom day

jp: .もし降らば天津乙女ぞ花曇
ro: moshi furaba amatsuotome zo hana kumori
en:
have celestial maidens
descended to earth?
blossom clouds

jp: .白雲の桜をくぐる外山哉
ro: shira-gumo no sakura wo kuguru toyama kana
en:
creeping through white
cherry blossom clouds...
the mountain

jp: .日盛りや芦雀に川の音もなき
ro: hizakari ya yoshikiri ni kawa no oto mo naki
en:
high noon--
the reed thrush sings
to a silent river

jp: .夏の夜に風呂敷かぶる旅寝哉
ro: natsu no yo ni furushiki kaburu tabine kana
en:
in the summer night
I'm covered with a bath towel...
the inn

jp: .涼しさや只一夢に十三里
ro: suzushisa ya tada hito yume ni jû san ri
en:
cool air--
in just one dream
seventy miles!

jp: .涼しさや見るほどの物清見がた
ro: suzushisa ya miru hodo no mono kiyomigata
en:
coolness!
everything in sight
at Kiyomigata

jp: .しづかさや湖水の底の雲のみね
ro: shizukasa ya kosui no soko no kumo no mine
en:
stillness--
in the depths of the lake
billowing clouds

jp: .雲の峰の中にかみなり起る哉
ro: kumo no mine no naka ni kaminari okoru kana
en:
from deep in the cloud's
billows
thunder comes

jp: .寝せ付て外へは出たり夏の月
ro: nese-tsukete soto e wa detari natsu no tsuki
en:
tucking her in
out I go...
summer moon

jp: .打ち解る稀の一夜や不二の雪
ro: uchi-tokuru mare no hito yo ya fuji no yuki
en:
melting in one
amazing night...
Mount Fuji's snow

jp: .牛車の跡ゆく関の清水哉
ro: ushi-guruma no ato yuku seki no shimizu kana
en:
in the ox cart's tracks
the barrier outpost's
pure water

jp: .みやこ哉東西南北辻が花
ro: miyako kana tôzainamboku tsuji ga hana
en:
in Kyoto
east, west, south, north...
summer kimonos

jp: .川中に床机三ッ四ッ夕すずみ
ro: kawa naka ni shôgi mitsu yotsu yûsuzumi
en:
mid-river
on three or four stools...
evening cool

jp: .狐火の行方見送るすずみ哉
ro: kitsunebi no yukigata miokoru suzumi kana
en:
escorted by
phosphorescent fires...
the cool air

jp: .月影や赤坂かけて夕すずみ
ro: tsukikage ya akasaka kakete yûsuzumi
en:
moonlight--
evening's cool reaches
Akasaka

jp: .能い女郎衆岡崎女郎衆夕涼み
ro: yoi joro shu kôzaki joro shu yûsuzumi
en:
skillful geisha!
Okazaki geisha!
enjoying evening's cool

jp: .馬の屁に目覚て見れば飛ほたる
ro: uma no he ni mezamete mireba tobu hotaru
en:
the horse's fart
wakes me to see...
fireflies flitting

jp: .通し給へ蚊蠅の如き僧一人
ro: tôshi tamae ka hae no gotoki sô hitori
en:
let him pass
like a mosquito, a fly...
solitary priest

jp: .浜松や蝉によるべの浪の声
ro: hamamatsu ya semi ni yorube no nami no koe
en:
Hamamatsu beach--
helping out the cicadas
singing waves

jp: .昼顔やしほるる草を乗越々々
ro: hirugao ya shioruru kusa wo noko-noko
en:
day flowers--
over the withered grass
they creep

jp: .散ぼたん昨日の雨をこぼす哉
ro: chiru botan kinou no ame [wo] kobosu kana
en:
the peony falls
spilling out yesterday's
rain

jp: .梅の木の心しづかに青葉かな
ro: ume no ki no kokoro shizuka ni aoba kana
en:
the plum tree
with heart at peace...
leafing green

jp: .塔ばかり見へて東寺は夏木立
ro: tô bakari miete tôji wa natsu kodachi
en:
Toh Temple--
just its pagoda shows
over the summer trees

jp: .船頭よ小便無用浪の月
ro: sendô yo shôben muyô nami no tsuki
en:
hey boatman
no pissing on the moon
in the waves!

jp: .松島や三ツ四ツほめて月を又
ro: matsushima ya mitsu yotsu homete tsuki wo mata
en:
Matsushima--
clapping three or four times
then again, the moon

jp: .東西南北吹交ぜ交ぜ野分哉
ro: tôzainamboku fuki maze-maze nowaki kana
en:
blowing from the east
west south north...
autumn gale

jp: .雨を分て夕霧のぼる外山哉
ro: ame wo wakete yûgiri noboru toyama kana
en:
parting the rain
the evening mist ascends...
mountain

jp: .おり姫に推参したり夜這星
ro: orihime ni suisan shitari yobaiboshi
en:
paying a visit
to the Weaver Star...
a sneaky Romeo

jp: .負角力其子の親も見て居るか
ro: make-zumô sono ko no oya mo mite iru ka
en:
defeated sumo wrestler--
is his father
watching too?

jp: .鎌倉や今はかがしの屋敷守
ro: kamakura ya ima wa kagashi no yashiki mori
en:
Kamakura--
these days scarecrows
are the gatekeepers

jp: .人去って万灯きへて鹿の声
ro: hito satte mandô kiete shika no koe
en:
people depart
ten thousand lanterns dying...
cry of a deer

jp: .岩間やあらしの下の虫の声
ro: iwaai ya arashi no shita no mushi no koe
en:
among the crags
under the storm...
insects singing

jp: .山紅葉入日を空へ返す哉
ro: yama momiji irihi wo sora e kaesu kana
en:
mountain's red leaves
the setting sun returns
to the sky

jp: .関処より吹戻さるる寒さ哉
ro: sekisho yori fukimodosaruru samusa kana
en:
from the barrier gate
it's blown back...
cold wind

jp: .浮草と見し間に池の氷かな
ro: ukikusa to mishi ma ni ike no kôri kana
en:
while I looked at the duckweed
the pond
froze

jp: .夕風や社の氷柱灯のうつる
ro: yûkaze ya yashiro no tsurara hi no utsuru
en:
night wind--
the shrine's icicles
reflect the lights

jp: .外堀の割るる音あり冬の月
ro: sotobori no waruru oto ari fuyu no tsuki
en:
the ice of the moat
cracking...
winter moon

jp: .山寺や木がらしの上に寝るがごと
ro: yamadera ya kogarashi no ue ni neru ga goto
en:
mountain temple--
like it's lying down
on the winter wind

jp: .外は雪内は煤ふる栖かな
ro: soto wa yuki uchi wa susufuru sumika kana
en:
outside, snow
inside, soot-caked...
my home

jp: .遠乗や霰たばしるかさの上
ro: tônori ya arare ta-bashiru kasa no ue
en:
a long ride--
hailstones drumming
umbrella-hats

jp: .初霜や乞食の竈も一ながめ
ro: hatsu shimo ya kojiki no kudo mo hito nagame
en:
first frost--
the beggar stove's too
a sight for sore eyes

jp: .初霜や蕎麦悔る人めづる人
ro: hatsu shimo ya soba kuyuru hito mesuru hito
en:
first frost--
one hates buckwheat noodles
one loves 'em

jp: .翁さびうしろをあぶるほた火哉
ro: okinasabi ushiro wo aburu hotabi kana
en:
an old man's ways--
my backside warmed
by the wood fire

jp: .ほたの火や糸取窓の影ぼうし
ro: hota no hi ya ito toru mado no kagebôshi
en:
a wood fire--
her shadow in the window
pulling thread

jp: .わらつとの焼飯あたたむるほた火哉
ro: warazuto no yakimeshi atatamuru hotabi kana
en:
warming up
straw-wrapped fried rice...
my wood fire

jp: .冬枯に風除作る山家哉
ro: fuyugare ni kazayoke tsukuru yamaga kana
en:
a windbreak
in the winter withering...
mountain home

jp: .花じゃぞよ我もけさから三十九
ro: hana ja zo yo ware mo kesa kara san jû ku
en:
blossoms--
from this morning on
39 springs to go

jp: .君が世や旅にしあれど笥の雑煮
ro: kimi ga yo ya tabi ni shi aredo ke no zôni
en:
Great Japan!
even mid-journey a bowl
of zoni

jp: .嬌女を日々にかぞへる春日哉
ro: taoyame wo hi-bi ni kazoeru haru hi kana
en:
pretty girls multiply
day by day...
spring days!

jp: .陽炎に敷居を越る朝日哉
ro: kagerô ni shiki-i wo koeru asahi kana
en:
heat shimmers--
the morning sun
crosses the threshold

jp: .里の子が枝川作る雪解哉
ro: sato no ko ga edagawa tsukuru yukige kana
en:
the village child
makes a river branch...
melting snow

jp: .命也焼く野の虫を拾ふ鳥
ro: inochi nari yaku no no mushi wo hirou tori
en:
such is life--
the burning field's bugs
a feast for birds

jp: .畠打が近道教ゆ夕べ哉
ro: hata uchi ga chikamichi oshiyu yûbe kana
en:
the plowman
shows me a shortcut...
evening

jp: .鳥も巣を作るに橋の乞食哉
ro: tori mo su wo tsukuru [ni] hashi no kojiki kana
en:
even birds
make their nests...
beggars under the bridge

jp: .夕されば凧も雲雀もをりの哉
ro: yû sareba tako mo hibari mo ori no kana
en:
evening falls--
the kite and the lark
come down

jp: .雲に鳥人間海にあそぶ日ぞ
ro: kumo ni tori ningen umi ni asobu hi zo
en:
birds in the clouds
people in the sea...
a holiday

jp: .岩が根に蛙の眠る真昼哉
ro: iwa ga ne ni kawazu no nemuru mahiru kana
en:
at the rock's base
the frog's siesta...
high noon

jp: .寝転んで若草摘る日南哉
ro: ne-koronde waka-gusa tsumeru hinata kana
en:
lying down to sleep
plucking the new grass...
sunbather

jp: .花椿落来る竹のしげみ哉
ro: hana tsubaki ochi kuru take no shigemi kana
en:
camellia blossoms
come falling in...
bamboo grove

jp: .寝心に花を算へる雨夜哉
ro: ne-gokoro ni hana wo kazoeru amayo kana
en:
my sleepy mind
counting cherry blossoms...
a rainy night

jp: .吹降や花に浴びせるかねの声
ro: fukiburi ya hana ni abiseru kane no koe
en:
windy rain--
pouring over the blossoms
a temple bell

jp: .蛇出て兵者を撰る花見哉
ro: hebi idete tsuwamono wo eru hanami kana
en:
when the snake comes out
there's a brave soldier...
blossom viewers

jp: .涼しさや欠釜一ッひとりずみ
ro: suzushisa ya kakegama hitotsu hitori-zumi
en:
cool air--
with one cracked pot
my life alone

jp: .夏の月明地にさわぐ人の声
ro: natsu no tsuki akichi ni sawagu hito no koe
en:
summer moon--
in the vacant lot a ruckus
of voices

jp: .山颪家々の幟に起る也
ro: yama oroshi ya-ya no nobori ni okiru nari
en:
mountain wind--
house after house
with summer banners

jp: .更衣しばししらみを忘れたり
ro: koromogae shibashi shirami wo wasuretari
en:
a new summer robe--
for a little while
no lice

jp: .青すだれ白衣の美人通ふ見ゆ
ro: ao sudare byakue no bijin kayou miyu
en:
through green bamboo blinds
a pretty woman
in white

jp: .夜仕事や子を思ふ身は蚊屋の外
ro: yo shigoto ya ko wo omou mi wa kaya no soto
en:
night work--
outside the mosquito net
she thinks of her child

jp: .子に肩を間摩す人あり門涼み
ro: ko ni kata wo momasu hito ari kado suzumi
en:
his child massages
his shoulders...
cool air at the gate

jp: .蚊を焼くや紙燭にうつる妹が顔
ro: ka wo yaku ya shisoku ni utsuru imo ga kao
en:
burning mosquitoes--
in the paper lamp
my dear one's face

jp: .只一ッ耳際に蚊の羽かぜ哉
ro: tada hitotsu mimi-giwa ni ka no hakaze kana
en:
only one
fans my ear...
mosquito

jp: .出る枝は伐らるる垣のわか葉哉
ro: deru eda wa kiraruru kaki no wakaba kana
en:
proud branches
are trimmed...
fresh leaves of the hedge

jp: .君が世や茂りの下の那蘇仏
ro: kimi ga yo ya shigeri no shita no yaso-botoke
en:
Great Japan--
under thick summer leaves
Jesus-Buddha

jp: .菊月や山里里も供日酒
ro: kiku-zuki ya yama-zato sato mo tomo hi-zake
en:
chrysanthemum month--
for every mountain village
days of sake

jp: .酒呑まぬ吾身一ッの夜寒哉
ro: sake nomanu waga mi hitotsu no yozamu kana
en:
out of sake
such is my life...
a cold night

jp: .歯噛みする人に目覚て夜寒哉
ro: hagami suru hito ni mezamete yozamu kana
