a new year begins!
the color of barley

jp: .其後は子供の声や鬼やらひ
ro: sono ato wa kodomo no koe ya oni yarai
en:
from now on
childrens' voices...
"Demons begone!"

jp: .一声に此世の鬼が逃るげな
ro: hito-goe ni kono yo no oni ga nigeru-gena
en:
one shout
and this world's demons
should flee

jp: .我国は子供も鬼を追ひにけり
ro: waga kuni wa kodomo mo oni wo oi ni keri
en:
my country--
even the children
chase off demons

jp: .はづかしや罷出て取江戸の年
ro: hazukashi ya makari dete toru edo no toshi
en:
ashamed--
I present myself to Edo
a year older

jp: .一文で厄払けり門の月
ro: ichi mon de yaku harai keri kado no tsuki
en:
he drives out devils
for a coin...
moon at the gate

jp: .古反故を継合せつつ羽織哉
ro: furu hogo wo tsugi awase tsutsu haori kana
en:
patched
with old wastepaper
my winter coat

jp: .一番に猫が爪とぐ衾哉
ro: ichiban ni neko ga tsume togu fusuma kana
en:
the cat breaks it in
sharpening claws...
winter quilt

jp: .百敷や都は猫もふとん哉
ro: momoshiki ya miyako wa neko mo futon kana
en:
imperial palace--
in Kyoto even cats
have futons!

jp: .のふなしはつみも又なし冬ごもり
ro: nô nashi wa tsumi mo mata nashi fuyugomori
en:
no good deeds
but also no sins...
winter seclusion

jp: .冬篭り悪物喰が上りけり
ro: fuyugomori aku[mono]-gui ga agari keri
en:
winter seclusion--
getting better at eating
foul food

jp: .冬篭り悪物喰が上手なり
ro: fuyugomori aku[mono]-gui ga jyôzu nari
en:
winter seclusion--
becoming expert at eating
foul food

jp: .炭の火や旦の祝儀の咳ばらひ
ro: sumi no hi ya asa no shûgi no sekibarai
en:
charcoal fire--
morning's celebration
of coughing

jp: .子宝がきゃらきゃら笑ふほた火哉
ro: ko takara ga kyara-kyara warau hotabi kana
en:
our treasured child
shrieks with laughter...
a cozy wood fire

jp: .大名の一番立のほた火哉
ro: daimyô no ichiban-dachi no hotabi kana
en:
the war lord's wood fire
rises
first

jp: .ほたの火にせなか向けり最明寺
ro: hota no hi ni senaka muke keri saimyôji
en:
turning my back
to the wood fire...
Saimyo Temple

jp: .初鰒のけぶり立けり丘の家
ro: hatsu fugu no keburi tatsu keri oka no ie
en:
the season's first
pufferfish soup smoke...
house on the hill

jp: .こっそりとしてかせぐ也みそさざい
ro: kossori to shite kasegu nari misosazai
en:
making its living
slyly
the wren

jp: .雀等と仲間入せよみそさざい
ro: suzumera to nakama iri seyo misosazai
en:
joining the throng
of sparrows
a little wren

jp: .三絃に鳴つく許り千鳥哉
ro: samisen ni nakitsuku bakari chidori kana
en:
begging her to play
her samisen...
plovers

jp: .村千鳥そっと申せばはっと立
ro: mura chidori sotto moseba hatto tatsu
en:
if I just whisper
the flock of plovers
rises at once

jp: .忍草しのばぬ草も枯にけり
ro: shinobu-gusa shinobanu-gusa mo kare ni keri
en:
grasses that stay hidden
grasses that don't...
the same withering

jp: .六道の辻に立けりかれ尾花
ro: roku dô no tsuji ni tachi keri kare obana
en:
standing at a six-way
crossroads
in the withered grass

jp: .朝々に壱本づつや引大根
ro: asa-asa ni ippon-zutsu ya hiku daikon
en:
morning after morning
one by one...
yanking radishes

jp: .尼達や二人かかって引大根
ro: ama-dachi ya futatsu kakatte hiki daikon
en:
temple nuns--
it takes two
yanking the radish

jp: .大根引拍子にころり小僧哉
ro: daiko hiku hyôshi ni korori kozô kana
en:
yanking a radish
taking a tumble...
little boy

jp: .藪原に引捨られし大根哉
ro: yabuhara ni hiki-suterareshi daikon kana
en:
the rejects tossed
in the overgrown field...
radishes

jp: .一つかみ樽にかけたる紅葉哉
ro: hito tsukami taru ni kaketaru momiji kana
en:
a fistful
spread out for the keg...
red leaves

jp: .一つかみ塗樽拭ふ紅葉哉
ro: hito tsukami nuri taru nuguu momiji kana
en:
with a fistful
giving the keg a wipe...
red leaves

jp: .冬枯にめらめら消るわら火哉
ro: fuyugare ni mera-mera kieru wara-bi kana
en:
winter withering--
a straw fire sputters
out

jp: .霜がれやおれを見かけて鉦たたく
ro: shimogare [ya] ore wo mikakete kane tataku
en:
frost-killed grass--
catching sight of me
he hits his gong

jp: .霜がれや胡粉の剥し土団子
ro: shimogare [ya] gofun no hagashi tsuchi dango
en:
frost-killed grass--
whitewash peeling off
the mud dumpling

jp: .なまけるや翌も花あり月有と
ro: namakeru ya asu mo hana ari tsuki ari to
en:
lazy--
leaving blossoms and moon
for tomorrow

jp: .人なつき鶴よどちらに矢があたる
ro: hito natsuki tsuru yo dochira ni ya ga ataru
en:
which one of those
tame cranes
will the arrow hit?

jp: .もふ見まじ見まじとすれど我家哉
ro: mô mimaji mimaji to suredo waga ya kana
en:
don't want to see it
don't want to, still...
there's my house!

jp: .思ふまじ見まじとすれど我家哉
ro: omoumaji mimaji to suredo waga ya kana
en:
don't want to remember it
or see it, still
there's my house!

jp: .ことしから丸もふけ也娑婆の空
ro: kotoshi kara marumôke nari shaba no sora
en:
from this year on
clear profit...
this corrupt world's sky

jp: .北国や家に雪なきお正月
ro: kita-guni ya ie ni yuki naki o-shôgatsu
en:
north country--
but on my hut a snowless
First Month

jp: .初雨や北国本のお正月
ro: hatsu ame ya kita-guni hon no o-shôgatsu
en:
first rain--
a typical north country
New Year's

jp: .道ばたの土めづらしやお正月
ro: michibata no tsuchi mezurashi ya o-shôgatsu
en:
the roadside's dirt
a wonder to behold...
First Month

jp: .弥陀仏をたのみに明て今朝の春
ro: mida butsu wo tanomi ni akete kesa no haru
en:
in Amida Buddha
trusting...
spring's first dawn

jp: .鶯のくる影ぼしも窓の春
ro: uguisu no kuru kageboshi mo mado no haru
en:
the nightingale comes
with his shadow...
spring window

jp: .春たちて磯菜も千代のためし哉
ro: haru tachite isona mo chiyo no tameshi kana
en:
with the new spring
tasty sea plants on the beach...
a thousand ages

jp: .春立や二軒つなぎの片住居
ro: haru tatsu ya ni ken tsunagi no kata sumai
en:
spring begins--
two households
one house

jp: .心から大きく見ゆる初日哉
ro: kokoro kara ôkiku miyuru hatsu hi kana
en:
I swear it's
looking big!
the year's first sun

jp: .大雨や元日早々に降り給ふ
ro: ôame ya ganjitsu haya-haya ni furi tamau
en:
a big rain--
early New Year's Day
it falls

jp: .御降りの祝儀に雪もちらり哉
ro: o-sagari no shûgi ni yuki mo chirari kana
en:
sprinkled in
with the new year's rain...
flitting snow

jp: .ござってぞ正月早々春の雨
ro: gozatte zo shôgatsu haya-baya haru no ame
en:
welcome to my house!
First Month's very first
spring rain

jp: .まんべんに御降り受る小家哉
ro: manben ni o-saga[ri] ukeru ko ie kana
en:
utterly soaked
by the year's first rain...
little house

jp: .梅咲や地獄の門も休み札
ro: ume saku ya jigoku no kado mo yasumi satsu
en:
plum blooming--
even hell's gate
CLOSED

jp: .けふこそは地獄の衆もお正月
ro: kyô koso wa jigoku no shû mo o-shôgatsu
en:
today even the
hordes of hell celebrate
the new year

jp: .斎日もさばの地獄はいたりにけり
ro: sainichi mo saba no jigoku wa itari ni keri
en:
even on a fast day
this world's hell
is hell

jp: .人の引小松の千代やさみすらん
ro: hito no hiku ko matsu no chiyo ya samisuran
en:
men have plucked
little pines a thousand ages...
they must hate us!

jp: .お袋の福茶をくめる指南哉
ro: o-fukuro no fukucha wo kumeru shinan kana
en:
how to ladel Mama's
lucky tea...
a lesson

jp: .深川や川向ふにて御慶いふ
ro: fukugawa ya kawa muka[u] nite gyokei iu
en:
at Fukugawa
yelling across the river...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .美しき凧上りけり乞食小屋
ro: utsukushiki tako agari keri kojiki-goya
en:
a pretty kite soars
a beggar's shack
below

jp: .乞食子や歩ながらの凧
ro: kojiki ko ya aruki nagara no ikanobori
en:
a beggar child
walking and flying
a kite

jp: .はつ雪へさし出す獅子の天窓哉
ro: hatsu yuki e sashidasu shishi no atama kana
en:
stretching out
toward the first snow...
lion puppet's head

jp: .まかり出花の三月大根哉
ro: makari ide hana no sangatsu daiko kana
en:
taking their leave
in the flowery Third Month...
radishes

jp: .春めくや藪ありて雪ありて雪
ro: harumeku ya yabu arite yuki arite yuki
en:
spring has sprung--
but in every thicket, snow
and more snow!

jp: .長閑や鼠のなめる角田川
ro: nodokasa ya nezumi no nameru sumida-gawa
en:
spring peace--
a mouse licking up
Sumida River

jp: .大口を明て烏も日永哉
ro: ôkuchi wo aite karasu mo hi naga kana
en:
the crow, too
yawns and yawns...
a long day

jp: .闇がりの牛を引出す日永哉
ro: kuragari no ushi wo hikidasu hinaga kana
en:
leading a cow
from the dark barn...
days grow longer

jp: .永き日や牛の涎が一里程
ro: naga[ki] hi ya ushi no yodare ga ichi ri hodo
en:
long day--
the cow's slobber
about two miles long

jp: .念仏の申し賃とる日永哉
ro: nembutsu no mô[shi] chin toru hi naga kana
en:
chanting "Praise Buddha!"
for a fee...
a long day

jp: .雇れて大念仏の日永哉
ro: yatowa[re]te ônembutsu no hi naga kana
en:
"Praise Buddha!"
chanted for a fee...
a long day

jp: .起々やおがむ手に降る春の雨
ro: oki oki ya ogamu te ni furu haru no ame
en:
morning's first thing--
on praying hands
the spring rain

jp: .をく山もばくちの世也春の雨
ro: oku yama mo bakuchi no yo nari haru no ame
en:
in deep mountains too
it's a gambler's world!
spring rain

jp: .桟を唄でわたるや春の雨
ro: kakehashi wo uta de wataru ya haru no ame
en:
crossing the hanging bridge
singing a song...
spring rain

jp: .線香や平内堂の春の雨
ro: senkô ya heinai dô no haru no ame
en:
incense smoke--
Inner Peace Temple
in the spring rain

jp: .春雨や妹が袂に銭の音
ro: harusame ya imo ga tamoto ni zeni no oto
en:
spring rain--
in the wife's sleeve
coins jingle

jp: .春雨や猫におどりをおしえる子
ro: harusame ya neko ni odori [wo] oshieru ko
en:
spring rain--
a child gives a dance lesson
to the cat

jp: .春雨やむだに渡りし二文橋
ro: harusame ya muda ni watarishi ni mon-bashi
en:
spring rain--
crossing the two-penny bridge
in vain

jp: .人の世や直には降らぬ春の雨
ro: hito no yo ya sugu ni wa furanu haru no ame
en:
world of man--
it doesn't fall at once
the spring rain

jp: .狗が鼠とる也はるの風
ro: enokoro ga nezumi toru nari haru no kaze
en:
the puppy has caught
a mouse...
spring breeze

jp: .春風のそこ意地寒ししなの山
ro: haru kaze no soko iji samushi shinano yama
en:
the spring breeze
stubbornly cold...
Shinano mountain

jp: .春風や侍二人犬の供
ro: haru kaze ya samurai futari inu no tomo
en:
spring breeze--
two samurai
attend the dog

jp: .春風やとある垣根の赤草履
ro: haru kaze ya toaru kakine no aka zôri
en:
spring breeze--
on the fence a pair
of red sandals

jp: .宿引に女も出たり春の風
ro: yadohiki ni onna mo detari haru no kase
en:
one hotel runner
is a woman...
spring breeze

jp: .東風吹や堤に乗たる犬のあご
ro: kochi fuku ya dote ni nosetaru inu no ago
en:
an east wind blows--
the dog lays his chin
on the bank

jp: .後供はかすみ引けり加賀の守
ro: atodomo wa kasumi hiki keri kaga no kami
en:
his attendants behind
haul the mist...
Lord Kaga

jp: .雉の尾に引ずりて行かすみ哉
ro: kiji no o ni hikizurite yuku kasumi kana
en:
dragged in
by the pheasant's tail...
spring mist

jp: .身の上の鐘としりつつ夕がすみ
ro: mi no ue no kane to shiritsutsu yûgasumi
en:
knowing the bell
rings away life...
evening mist

jp: .陽炎の内からも立つ在郷哉
ro: kagerô no uchi kara mo ta[tsu] zaigo kana
en:
out of heat shimmers
taking shape...
my hick province

jp: .さほ姫の染損なひや斑山
ro: saohime no some sokonai madara yama
en:
the goddess of spring
missed a few spots...
mottled mountain

jp: .浅ましや一寸のがれに残る雪
ro: asamashi ya chotto nogare ni nokoru yuki
en:
what a shame--
cheating fate for the moment
leftover snow

jp: .鷺烏雀が水もぬるみけり
ro: sagi karasu suzume ga mizu mo nurumi keri
en:
herons, crows, sparrows
all enjoying
the water's warmth

jp: .代かくやふり返りつつ子もち馬
ro: shiro kaku ya furikaeri tsutsu ko mochi uma
en:
raking the rice-seedling bed
'round and around...
horse and pony

jp: .死花をぱっと咲せる仏哉
ro: shini hana wa patto sakaseru hotoke kana
en:
dead flowers suddenly
are made to bloom...
Buddha!

jp: .相伴に我らもごろり涅槃哉
ro: shôban ni warera mo gorori nehan kana
en:
joining in
we curl to sleep too...
reclining Buddha

jp: .彼岸とて袖に這する虱かな
ro: higan tote sode ni hawasuru shirami kana
en:
in honor of the equinox
crawling into my sleeve...
a louse

jp: .開帳に逢ふや雀もおや子連れ
ro: kaichô ni au ya suzume mo oyako-zure
en:
visiting the temple
for the showing of the image...
sparrow families

jp: .咲花をあてに持出す仏かな
ro: saku hana wo ate ni mochidasu hotoke kana
en:
they carry him
to the spring blossoms...
Buddha

jp: .桜木や花の小隅に隠居雛
ro: sakura ki ya hana no kosumi ni inkyo hina
en:
cherry tree--
ensconced among blossoms
the hermit doll

jp: .子ありてや蓬が門の蓬餅
ro: ko arite ya yomogi ga kado no yomogi mochi
en:
they must have kids--
herbs at the gate
for herb cakes

jp: .晴天のとっぱづれ也汐干がた
ro: seiten no toppa[zu]re nari shiohi-gata
en:
all the way
to the blue sky's edge...
low tide

jp: .人まねに鳩も雀も汐干かな
ro: hito mane ni hato mo suzume mo shiohi kana
en:
acting like people
pigeons and sparrows
at low tide

jp: .深川や御庭の中の汐干狩
ro: fukagawa ya o-niwa no naka no shiohi-gari
en:
Fukagawa--
in the shrine's garden
low tide shell-gathering

jp: .茶もつみぬ松もつくりぬ丘の家
ro: cha mo tsuminu matsu mo tsukurinu oka no ie
en:
tea leaves picked
and pines trimmed...
house on the hill

jp: .石の上に蝋燭立てつぎ穂かな
ro: ishi no ue ni rôsoku tatete tsugiho kana
en:
a candle standing
on the rock...
grafting the branch

jp: .歯ももたぬ口に加へてつぎ穂哉
ro: ha mo motanu kuchi ni kuwaete tsugiho kana
en:
his toothless mouth
holds it...
the branch for grafting

jp: .かりの世のかり家の門にさし木哉
ro: kari no yo no kari ie no kado ni sashi-gi kana
en:
in an ephemeral world
at an ephemeral house's gate...
grafting a branch

jp: .おどされて引返す也うかれ猫
ro: odosarete hikikaesu nari ukare neko
en:
frightened off
retracing his steps...
the love-crazed cat

jp: .門の山猫の通ぢ付にけり
ro: kado no yama neko no kayoiji tsuki ni keri
en:
at my gate
the wild cat's route
for prowling

jp: .こがれ猫恋気ちがいと見ゆる也
ro: kogare neko koi kichigai to miyuru nari
en:
smitten cat--
a case of love-madness
it seems

jp: .縛れて鼾かく也猫の恋
ro: shibararete ibiki kaku nari neko no koi
en:
tethered now
how he snores...
the lover cat

jp: .関守が叱り通すや猫の恋
ro: sekimori ga shikari tôsu ya neko no koi
en:
the barrier guard
scolds him in passing...
lover cat

jp: .門番が明てやりけり猫の恋
ro: monban ga akete yari keri nako no koi
en:
the gatekeeper
opens up...
for the lover cat

jp: .汚れ猫それでも妻は持ちにけり
ro: yogore neko sore demo tsuma wa mochi ni keri
en:
dirty, yes
but the cat
has a wife

jp: .大鹿のおとした角を枕哉
ro: ôshika no otoshita tsuno wo makura kana
en:
the antler
that the big buck shed...
my pillow

jp: .おとし角腹にさしけり山法師
ro: otoshi-zuno hara ni sashi keri yama-bôshi
en:
the buck shedding antlers
pokes his belly...
mountain priest

jp: .角おちて恥しげなり山の鹿
ro: tsuno ochite hazukashige nari yama no shika
en:
embarrassed
that he's shed his horns...
mountain buck

jp: .西山の月と一度やおとし角
ro: nishi yama no tsuki [to] ichi do ya otoshi-zuno
en:
moonrise over western mountains--
the buck
sheds his antlers

jp: .人鬼の見よ々鹿は角おちる
ro: hito oni no mi yo mi yo shika wa tsuno ochiru
en:
look you goblins!
the buck has shed
his horns

jp: .鳥の巣に明渡したる庵哉
ro: tori no su ni akewatashitaru iori kana
en:
surrendering it
to the nesting birds...
my hut

jp: .又むだに口明く鳥のまま子哉
ro: mata muda ni kuchi aku tori no mamako kana
en:
in vain
the baby bird begs...
a stepchild

jp: .門雀兄弟喧嘩始めけり
ro: kado suzume kyôdai kenka hajime keri
en:
sparrows at the gate--
a quarrel between brothers
breaks out

jp: .雀子や女の中の豆いりに
ro: suzumego ya onna no naka no mame iri ni
en:
"Baby sparrow's
a sissy!"
playing with the girls

jp: .鶯や弥陀の浄土の東門
ro: uguisu ya mida no jôdo no higashi kado
en:
a nightingale sings--
the east gate
of Amida's Pure Land

jp: .雉鳴や是より西は庵の領
ro: kiji naku ya kore yori nishi wa io no ryô
en:
a pheasant cries--
"From here to the west
your hut's territory!"

jp: .さをしかのせなかをかりて雉の鳴
ro: saoshika no senaka wo karite kiji no naku
en:
borrowing the buck's
back, the pheasant
cries

jp: .野仏の袖にかくれてきじの鳴
ro: no-botoke no sode ni kakurete kiji no naku
en:
hiding in the field
Buddha's sleeve
a pheasant cries

jp: .親と子の三人連や帰る雁
ro: oya to ko no sannin-zure ya kaeru kari
en:
parents and child
three in a row...
the geese depart

jp: .辛崎を三遍舞て帰る雁
ro: karasaki wo san-ben maite kaeru kari
en:
three times 'round
Karasaki...
departing geese

jp: .すっぽんも羽ほしげ也帰る雁
ro: suppon mo hane hoshige nari kae[ru] kari
en:
even the turtle
wants feathers...
the geese depart

jp: .闇の夜も道ある国や帰る雁
ro: yami no yo mo michi aru kuni ya kaeru kari
en:
in the dark night, too
finding their way...
the geese depart

jp: .産みさうな腹をかかえて鳴蛙
ro: umisôna hara wo kakaete naku kawazu
en:
like giving birth
with that belly!
croaking frog

jp: .江戸川にかわづもきくやさし出口
ro: edogawa ni kawazu mo kiku ya sashideguchi
en:
at Edo River
even among frogs...
rude talk

jp: .江戸川にさし出て鳴く蛙かな
ro: edogawa ni sashidashite naku kawazu kana
en:
at Edo River
a lot of rude talk...
croaking frogs

jp: .榎迄春めかせけりなく蛙
ro: enoki made haru mekase keri naku kawazu
en:
even the nettle tree
dressed for spring...
croaking frogs

jp: .蛙らや火縄ふる手の上を飛ぶ
ro: kawazura ya hinawa furu te no ue wo tobu
en:
frogs--
over my hand fanning a fuse
they hop

jp: .元の座について月見る蛙哉
ro: moto no za ni tsuite tsuki miru kawazu kana
en:
in his regular seat
for moon gazing...
a frog

jp: .江戸川に差出口きく蛙哉
ro: edogawa ni sashideguchi kiku kawazu kana
en:
at Edo River
a lot of rude talk...
frogs

jp: .夕暮に蛙は何を思案橋
ro: yûgure ni kawazu wa nani wo shian-bashi
en:
evening frog
what are you meditating on?
Meditation Bridge

jp: .後になり先になる蝶や一里程
ro: ato ni nari saki ni naru chô ya ichi ri hodo
en:
the butterfly I passed
two miles back
is ahead now

jp: .黄色組しろぐみてふの出立哉
ro: ki[iro]-gumi shiro-gumi chô no detachi kana
en:
the yellow gang
the white gang...
butterflies come out

jp: .黄色組白組蝶の地どりけり
ro: kiiro-gumi shiro-gumi [chô] no chidori keri
en:
yellow gang, white gang
the butterflies stake
their claims

jp: .気の毒やおれをしたふて来る小てふ
ro: kinodoku ya ore wo shitôte kuru ko chô
en:
I pity you
for following me
little butterfly

jp: .来る蝶に鼻を明するかきね哉
ro: kuru chô ni hana wo akasuru kakine kana
en:
a shock
to the arriving butterfly
a fence

jp: .白黄色蝶も組合したりけり
ro: shiro kiiro chô mo kumiai shitari keri
en:
white versus yellow--
the butterflies
wrestle too

jp: .菅筵それそれ蝶が汚んぞ
ro: sugamushiro sore sore chô ga kegaren zo
en:
sedge mat--
look! look! butterflies
you've stained it

jp: .草庵の棚捜しする小てふ哉
ro: sôan no tana sagashi suru ko chô kana
en:
foraging for food
in my thatched hut
little butterfly

jp: .はつ蝶よこんな筵に汚るるな
ro: hatsu chô yo konna mushiro ni kegaruru na
en:
first butterfly
don't get stained
on my straw mat!

jp: .引うける大盃に小てふ哉
ro: hikiukeru ôsakazuki ni ko chô kana
en:
claiming
the big sake cup...
a little butterfly

jp: .枕する腕に蝶の寝たりけり
ro: makura suru kahina ni chô no netari keri
en:
my arm
for its pillow
the butterfly sleeps

jp: .蚕医者蚕医者はやる娘かな
ro: kaiko isha kaiko isha hayaru musume kana
en:
"Silkworm doctor
silkworm doctor, hurry!"
little girl

jp: .蚕医者蚕医者する娘かな
ro: kaiko isha kaiko isha suru musume kana
en:
playing doctor
for the silkworms...
little girl

jp: .此方が庵の道とや虻がとぶ
ro: kono kata ga io no michi to ya abu ga tobu
en:
"This way to the hut!"
the horsefly
flies

jp: .道連れの虻一ッ我も一人哉
ro: michi-zure no abu hitotsu waga mo hitori kana
en:
single file on the road--
one horsefly
one me

jp: .山道の案内顔や虻がとぶ
ro: yama michi no annai-gao ya abu ga tobu
en:
acting as guide
on the mountain road...
horsefly

jp: .山道や斯う来い来いと虻が飛
ro: yama michi ya kô kii kii to abu ga tobu
en:
mountain road--
"This way, come! Come!"
the horsefly flies

jp: .熊蜂も軒端を知って帰りけり
ro: kumabachi mo nokiba wo shitte kaeri keri
en:
the hornet too
knowing the eaves
returns

jp: .我国は草も桜を咲にけり
ro: waga kuni wa kusa mo sakura wo saki ni keri
en:
my province--
even the grass blooms
cherry blossoms

jp: .臭水の井戸の際より梅の花
ro: kusa mizu no ido no kiwa yori ume no hana
en:
at the edge
of a stinking well...
plum blossoms

jp: .此壁にむだ書無用梅の花
ro: kono kabe ni muda-gaki muyô ume no hana
en:
on this wall
no vain writing allowed...
plum blossoms

jp: .ひらひらとつむりにしみる梅の花
ro: hira-hira to tsumuri ni shimiru ume no hana
en:
fluttering their way
into my head...
plum blossoms

jp: .赤髪にきせるをさして花見哉
ro: aka kami ni kiseru wo sashite hanami kana
en:
in his red hair
stowing his pipe...
blossom viewing

jp: .あれ花が花がと笑ひ仏哉
ro: are hana ga hana ga to warai-botoke kana
en:
"There's some blossoms!
and over there!"
laughing Buddha

jp: .今迄は罰もあたらず花の雨
ro: ima made wa bachi mo atarazu hana no ame
en:
no divine punishment yet--
rain
of cherry blossoms

jp: .親と子がぶんぶんに行花見哉
ro: oya to ko ga bun-bun ni yuku hanami kana
en:
father and son
go their separate ways...
blossom viewing

jp: .髪髭も白い仲間や花の陰
ro: kami hige mo shiroi nakama ya hana no kage
en:
hair and beards
of comrades all white...
blossom shade

jp: .髪結も白い仲間や花の陰
ro: kamiyui mo shiroi nakama ya hana no kage
en:
the hairdos
of companions all white...
blossom shade

jp: .小むしろや花くたびれがどたどた寝
ro: samushiro ya hana kutabire ga dota-dota ne
en:
on little straw mats
tired of the blossoms...
they snore

jp: .先繰に花咲山や一日づつ
ro: senguri ni hana saku yama ya hito hi-zutsu
en:
one after another--
days in the blossoming
mountains

jp: .草庵に来てはこそこそ花見哉
ro: sôan ni kite wa koso-koso hanami kana
en:
he sneaks up
to my thatched hut
for blossom viewing

jp: .草庵に来てはくつろぐ花見哉
ro: sôan ni kite wa kutsurogu hanami kana
en:
treating my thatched hut
like home...
blossom viewers

jp: .挑灯は花の雲間に入にけり
ro: chôchin wa hana no kumo ma ni iri ni keri
en:
with a lantern
into the gap of blossom
clouds

jp: .遠山の花に明るし東窓
ro: tôyama no hana ni akarushi higashi mado
en:
the distant mountain's
blossoms cast their light...
east window

jp: .花ちるや日傘の陰の野酒盛
ro: hana chiru ya higasa no kage no no sakamori
en:
blossoms scatter--
in the shade of parasols
drunken revelry

jp: .若い衆に先越れしよ花の陰
ro: wakai shu ni saki kosareshi yo hana no kage
en:
young folk beat us
to the spot!
blossom shade

jp: .石仏風よけにして桜哉
ro: ishi-botoke kaze yoke ni shite sakura kana
en:
the stone Buddha
serves as a windbreak...
cherry blossoms

jp: .江戸桜花も銭だけ光る哉
ro: edo sakura hana mo zeni dake hikaru kana
en:
Edo's cherry blossoms, too
shine only
for money

jp: .開帳の目当に立し桜哉
ro: kaichô no meate ni tachishi sakura kana
en:
the spot to display
Buddha's image...
blooming cherry tree

jp: .けふもまたさくらさくらの噂かな
ro: kyô mo mata sakura sakura no uwasa kana
en:
today again, "Cherry blossoms!
Cherry blossoms!"
they say

jp: .寝むしろや桜にさます足のうら
ro: ne mushiro ya sakura ni samasu ashi no ura
en:
sleeping mat--
amid cherry blossoms cooling
my heels

jp: .一雫天窓なでけり桜から
ro: hito shizuku atama nade keri sakura kaRa
en:
one raindrop
pats my head...
from the cherry blossoms

jp: .夜ざくらや美人天から下るとも
ro: yozakura ya bijin ten kara kudaru tomo
en:
night's cherry blossoms--
heavenly ladies
among us

jp: .川は又山吹咲ぬよしの山
ro: kawa wa mata yamabuki sakinu yoshino yama
en:
again the river
blooms yellow roses...
Yoshino Hill

jp: .庵の錠いらぬ事とや柳吹く
ro: io no jô iranu koto to ya yanagi fuku
en:
no need to latch
the hut's door...
willow in the wind

jp: .馬の子が柳潜りをしたりけり
ro: uma no ko ga yanagi kuguri wo shitari keri
en:
the pony
has crept
through the willow

jp: .皮剥が腰かけ柳青みけり
ro: kawahagi ga koshikake yanagi aomi keri
en:
the skinner's willow
with its lounge chair limb
so green!

jp: .蛍とぶ夕をあてやさし柳
ro: hotaru tobu yûbe wo ate ya sashi yanagi
en:
planting a willow
will become nights
of fireflies

jp: .頬杖は観音顔や柳かげ
ro: hohozue wa kannon kao ya yanagi kage
en:
chin on hands
a face like Goddess Kannon's
in willow shade

jp: .夏の夜や二軒して見る草の花
ro: natsu no yo ya ni ken shite miru kusa no hana
en:
summer evening--
they watch from two houses
wildflowers

jp: .桟を知らずに来たり涼しさに
ro: kakehashi wo shirazu ni kitari suzushisa ni
en:
unthinkingly
onto the hanging bridge...
cool air

jp: .拵へた露も涼しや門の月
ro: koshiraeta tsuyu mo suzushi ya kado no tsuki
en:
a fresh-made dewdrop
is cool too...
moon at the gate

jp: .涼風も一升入のふくべ哉
ro: suzukaze mo isshô iri no fukube kana
en:
also in the cool breeze--
a gourd that can hold
two quarts

jp: .涼しさの家や浄土の西の門
ro: suzushisa no ie ya jôdo no nishi no kado
en:
a cool house
the Pure Land's
west gate

jp: .涼しさや四門を一ッ潜っては
ro: suzushisa ya shi mon wo hitotsu kugutte wa
en:
cool air--
out of four gates
entering just one

jp: .涼しさや土橋の上のたばこ盆
ro: suzushisa ya dobashi no ue no tabako bon
en:
cool air--
on the earthen bridge
a tobacco tray

jp: .涼しさや糊のかわかぬ小行灯
ro: suzushisa ya nori no kawanu ko andon
en:
cool air--
the little lamp can't dry
the starch

jp: .正直に入梅雷の一ッかな
ro: shôjiki ni tsuyu kaminari no hitotsu kana
en:
speaking truth
the rainy season's crack
of thunder

jp: .夕立のそれから直に五月雨
ro: yûdachi no sore kara sugu ni satsukiame
en:
a cloudburst
and then, right away
Fifth Month rain

jp: .湯のたきも同おと也五月雨
ro: yu no taki mo onaji oto nari satsuki ame
en:
the same sound
as water boiling...
Fifth Month rain

jp: .向ふから別て来るや小夕立
ro: mukau kara wakarete kuru ya ko yûdachi
en:
departing the facing mountain
it comes this way...
little cloudburst

jp: .言訳に一夕立の通りけり
ro: iiwake ni hito yûdachi no tôri keri
en:
with apologies
a cloudburst passes
by

jp: .今の間に二夕立やあちら村
ro: ima no ma ni futa yûdachi ya achira mura
en:
just now
two cloudbursts in a row...
that village yonder

jp: .風計りでも夕立の夕かな
ro: kaze bakari demo yûdachi no yûbe kana
en:
just wind
yet still a cloudburst
evening

jp: .湖へずり出しけり雲の峰
ro: mizuumi e zuri-idashi keri kumo no mine
en:
slipping down
into the lake...
billowing clouds

jp: .観音の足の下より清水哉
ro: kannon no ashi no shita yori shimizu kana
en:
flowing from the feet
of Goddess Kannon...
pure water

jp: .小わらはもかぶりたがるやつくま鍋
ro: kowarawa mo kaburitagaru ya tsukuma nabe
en:
even children
want to wear 'em!
pots on heads

jp: .ちとの間の名所也けり夕祓
ro: chito no ma no nadoko nari keri yû harai
en:
for just a little while
a sight to see...
evening's shrine boats

jp: .蟾どのの這出給ふ御祓哉
ro: hiki dono no haidashi tamau misogi kana
en:
Mr. Toad deigns
to creep out...
the shrine boat

jp: .昔からこんな風かよ夕はらひ
ro: mukashi kara konna fû ka yo yû harai
en:
like this since
olden times?
evening's shrine boats

jp: .母の分ンも一ッ潜るちのわ哉
ro: haha no bun mo hitotsu kuguru chinowa kana
en:
mother's turn--
once more through
the purification hoop

jp: .江戸住や二階の窓の初のぼり
ro: edo-zumi ya ni kai no mado no hatsu nobori
en:
life in Edo--
from a second-floor window
summer's first banner

jp: .御地蔵のお首にかけるちまき哉
ro: o-jizô no o-kubi ni kakeru chimaki kana
en:
from holy Jizo's
holy neck it hangs...
rice dumpling

jp: .御袋が手本に投るちまき哉
ro: o-fukuro ga tehon ni hôru chimaki kana
en:
Mama tosses one
to teach her how...
rice dumpling

jp: .折釘に掛た所が粽哉
ro: orekugi ni kaketa tokoro ga chimaki kana
en:
the hooked nail
its hanging place...
rice dumpling

jp: .笹粽手本通りに出来ぬ也
ro: sasa chimaki tehon tôri ni dekinu nari
en:
her rice dumpling
doesn't resemble
the example

jp: .若へ衆は浴衣ぞいざやころもがへ
ro: wakae shu wa yukata zo iza ya koromogae
en:
young folk in bathrobes
well, well...
their idea of summer garb

jp: .京人や日傘の陰の野酒盛り
ro: kyôbito ya higasu no kage no no-sakamori
en:
people of Kyoto
in parasol shade
drinking sake

jp: .田の水をかすりに行も日傘哉
ro: ta no mizu wo kasuri ni yuku mo higasa kana
en:
even for stealing water
for my rice field...
I take my parasol

jp: .母親にさしかけさせる日傘哉
ro: haha oya [ni] sashikake saseru higasa kana
en:
making her mother
hold it...
the parasol

jp: .新しき蚊屋に寝る也江戸の馬
ro: atarashiki kaya ni neru nari edo no uma
en:
sleeping in new
mosquito nets...
horses of Edo

jp: .えどの水呑々馬も蚊屋に寝る
ro: edo no mizu nomi-nomi uma mo kaya ni neru
en:
even the poor
workhorses of Edo sleep...
in mosquito nets!

jp: .蚊屋つりて喰に出る也夕茶漬
ro: kaya tsurite kui ni deru nari yû chazuke
en:
dangling a mosquito net
I go out to eat...
evening's tea-and-rice

jp: .田の人よ御免候らへ昼寝蚊屋
ro: ta no hito yo gomen sôrae hirune kaya
en:
forgive me please
rice field workers!
napping under the net

jp: .鉢の蘭蚊屋の中にてよよぎけり
ro: hachi no ran kaya no naka nite yoyogi keri
en:
the potted orchid
in the mosquito net
trembles

jp: .笠をきた形でごろりと昼寝哉
ro: kasa wo kite nari de gorori to hirune kana
en:
under an umbrella-hat
curled up, asleep...
siesta

jp: .鐘の下たたきの上に昼寝哉
ro: kane no shita tataki no ue ni hirune kana
en:
under the bell
over the clapper...
a noon nap

jp: .田のくろや菰一枚の昼寝小屋
ro: ta no kuro ya komo ichi mai no hirune-goya
en:
rice field ridge--
a one-rush mat
siesta shack

jp: .一枝の榎かざして昼寝哉
ro: hito eda no enoki kazashite hirune kana
en:
one branch of the nettle tree
for shade...
siesta

jp: .人並に昼寝したふりする子哉
ro: hito nami ni hirune shita furi suru ko kana
en:
like the grownups
taking siestas...
a child pretends

jp: .ていねいに鼠の喰し扇かな
ro: teinei ni nezumi no kuishi ôgi kana
en:
top to bottom
the mouse eats
the fan

jp: .ばかにして鼠の喰ぬ扇かな
ro: baka ni shite nezumi no kuwanu ôgi kana
en:
making me a fool
the mouse won't eat...
my paper fan

jp: .えどの水呑とて左り団扇かな
ro: edo no mizu nomu tote hidari uchiwa kana
en:
living in comfort in Edo
his left hand
fanning

jp: .座頭坊の天窓に足らぬ団扇哉
ro: zatô-bô no atama ni taranu uchiwa kana
en:
for the blind priest's head
no
paper fan

jp: .ていねいに鼠の喰しうちわ哉
ro: teinei ni nezumi no kuishi uchiwa kana
en:
top to bottom
the mouse eats it...
round paper fan

jp: .ままっ子が一ッ団扇の修復哉
ro: mamakko ga hitotsu uchiwa no shufuku kana
en:
for the stepchild
only one paper fan...
mended

jp: .線香の一本ですむ蚊やり哉
ro: senkô no ippon de sumu kayari kana
en:
using up one
incense stick...
mosquito smudge pot

jp: .ぎりの有親子むつまじ夕涼
ro: giri no aru oyako mutsumaji yûsuzumi
en:
the in-law family
living in harmony...
evening cool

jp: .さすとても都の蚊也夕涼
ro: sasu totemo miyako no ka nari yûsuzumi
en:
though they bite
they're Kyoto mosquitoes...
evening cool

jp: .夜々や同じつらでも門涼
ro: yoru-yoru ya onaji tsura demo kadosuzumi
en:
night after night
the same faces...
cool air at the gate

jp: .夜々や我身となりて門涼み
ro: yoru-yoru ya waga mi to narite kado suzumi
en:
night after night
rejuvenation...
cool air at the gate

jp: .あさら井や小魚と遊ぶ心太
ro: asara-i ya ko uo to asobu tokoroten
en:
shallow well--
the little fish's playmate
sweet jelly tub

jp: .川ほりや鳥なき里の飯時分
ro: kawahori ya tori naki sato no meshi jibun
en:
in a village
without birds
bats at dinnertime

jp: .ばか鳥よ羽ぬけてから何しあん
ro: baka tori yo ha nukete kara nan shian
en:
foolish bird--
after molting
what are you thinking?

jp: .歩ながらに傘ほせばほととぎす
ro: aruki nagara ni karakasa hoseba hototogisu
en:
walking along
drying the paper umbrella...
"cuckoo!"

jp: .この闇に鼻つままれなほととぎす
ro: kono yami ni hana tsumamare na hototogisu
en:
in this darkness
don't get your nose picked!
cuckoo

jp: .其通石も鳴也ほととぎす
ro: sono tôri ishi mo naku nari hototogisu
en:
that way
the stones sing too!
cuckoo

jp: .一降や待兼山のほととぎす
ro: hito furi ya machikane yama no hototogisu
en:
rain pours down--
a cuckoo
on Mount Machikane

jp: .時鳥吉原駕のちうをとぶ
ro: hototogisu yoshiwara kago no chû wo tobu
en:
cuckoo--
in a palanquin to Yoshiwara
he flies!

jp: .閑古鳥泣き坊主に相違なく候
ro: kankodori nakibôzu ni sôi naku sôro
en:
mountain cuckoo
you're nothing
but a crybaby!

jp: .鶯も老をうつるなおれが家
ro: uguisu mo oi wo utsuru na ore ga ie
en:
nightingale--
don't catch old age!
my house

jp: .蕗の葉に引つつんでもほたるかな
ro: fuki no ha ni hittsutsunde mo hotaru kana
en:
though wrapped
in a butterbur leaf...
firefly's light

jp: .入相のかねにつき出す蛍哉
ro: iriai no kane ni tsukidasu hotaru kana
en:
evicted
from the sunset bell...
firefly

jp: .蚊いぶしの中ともしらぬ蛍哉
ro: ka ibushi no naka to mo shiranu hotaru kana
en:
stumbling into
mosquito smudge smoke...
a firefly

jp: .京を出て一息つくかはつ忖
ro: kyô wo dete hito iki tsuku ka hatsu hotaru
en:
after leaving Kyoto
catching your breath?
first firefly

jp: .初蛍なぜ引返スおれだぞよ
ro: hatsu-botaru naze hikikaesu ore da zo yo
en:
first firefly
why the cold shoulder?
it's me!

jp: .煩悩の都出よ出よはつ蛍
ro: bonnô no miyako deyo deyo hatsu-botaru
en:
get out of Sin City
get out!
first firefly

jp: .孤の我は光らぬ蛍かな
ro: minashigo no ware wa hikaranu hotaru kana
en:
being an orphan
I cast no light...
firefly

jp: .呼声をはり合に飛蛍哉
ro: yobu koe wo hariai ni tobu hotaru kana
en:
toward the calling voice
flying with gusto...
firefly

jp: .我袖を草と思ふかはふ蛍
ro: waga sode wo kusa to omou ka hau hotaru
en:
do you think my sleeve
is grass?
crawling firefly

jp: .夏の虫恋する隙はありにけり
ro: natsu no mushi koi suru hima wa ari ni keri
en:
O insects of summer
there's time yet
for lovemaking!

jp: .庵の火は虫さへとりに来ざりけり
ro: io no hi wa mushi sae tori ni kozari keri
en:
my hut's lamp--
even moths don't come
to the flame

jp: .入相のかね撞かねて火とり虫
ro: iriai no kane tsuki kanete hitorimushi
en:
don't strike
sunset's bell...
tiger moth

jp: .木がくれや火のない庵へ火とり虫
ro: kogakure ya hi no nai io e hitorimushi
en:
to a hut with no lamp
hidden in trees
a tiger moth flits

jp: .どれ程に面白いのか火とり虫
ro: dore hodo ni omoshiroi no ka hitorimushi
en:
why is playing
with fire such fun...
tiger moth?

jp: .薮蟻の地獄を逃て火とり虫
ro: yabu ari no jigoku wo nigete hitorimushi
en:
fleeing the hell
of thicket ants...
tiger moth

jp: .壁に生る一本草や蚊のこもる
ro: kabe ni haeru ippon kusa ya ka no komoru
en:
blade of grass
sprouted from a wall
mosquito's den

jp: .草の葉に蚊のそら死をしたりけり
ro: kusa no ha ni ka no sorajini [wo] shitari keri
en:
on a blade of grass
the mosquito
plays dead

jp: .御仏にかじり付たる薮蚊哉
ro: mi-botoke ni kajiritsukitaru yabu ka kana
en:
holding fast
to the stone Buddha
a mosquito

jp: .長生の蝿よ蚤蚊よ貧乏村
ro: nagaiki no hae yo nomi ka yo bimbo mura
en:
living long
the flies, fleas, mosquitoes...
a poor village

jp: .親猫が蚤をも噛んでくれにけり
ro: oya neko ga nomi wo mo kande kure ni keri
en:
the mother cat
gnawing her kitten's
fleas

jp: .寝筵や鼠の蚤の降り所
ro: nemushiro ya nezumi no nomi no furi-dokoro
en:
my sleeping mat--
where the mouse drops
her fleas

jp: .蚤かんで寝せて行也猫の親
ro: nomi kande nekasete yuku nari neko no oya
en:
having gnawed their fleas
and put them to bed, she leaves...
mother cat

jp: .えど末や一切も売はつ松魚
ro: edo sue ya hito kire mo uru hatsu-gatsuo
en:
outskirts of Edo--
tiny slices for sale
summer's first bonito

jp: .大将の前やどっさり初松魚
ro: taishô no mae ya dossari hatsu-gatsuo
en:
before the admiral
hordes of them!
summer's first bonito

jp: .初鰹只一切もうればこそ
ro: hatsu-gatsuo tada hito kire mo ureba koso
en:
summer's first bonito--
just tiny slices
for sale

jp: .雨の夜や鉢のぼたんの品定
ro: ame no yo ya hachi no botan no shinasadame
en:
a rainy night--
sizing up the potted
peony

jp: .江戸ありて花なでしこも売れけり
ro: edo arite hana nadeshiko mo urare keri
en:
in Edo
even the blooming pink
is sold

jp: .浮草の鍋の中にも咲にけり
ro: ukikusa no nabe no naka ni mo saki ni keri
en:
duckweed
inside the kettle too...
blooming

jp: .浮草や遊びがてらに花のさく
ro: ukikusa ya asobi-gatera ni hana no saku
en:
duckweed--
while it carouses
it blooms

jp: .浮草や浮世の風のいふなりに
ro: ukikusa ya ukiyo no kaze no iu nari ni
en:
floating duckweed--
appropriate
in this floating world

jp: .苔はあれ花の咲けり埋れ塚
ro: koke wa are hana no saki keri umore-zuka
en:
moss provides
the blooming flowers...
grave mound

jp: .雀らも何かよむぞよことし竹
ro: suzumera mo nanika yomu zo yo kotoshi take
en:
what are you counting
sparrows?
this year's bamboo

jp: .竹の子が世は山笹も子を育けり
ro: takenoko ga yo wa yama-zasa mo ko wo sodate keri
en:
world of bamboo shoots--
the mountain's bamboo grasses
also raise children

jp: .竹の子や女のほじる犬のまね
ro: takenoko ya onna no hojiru inu no mane
en:
bamboo shoots--
a woman digs them up
like a dog

jp: .夜談義の仕方も見へて夏木立
ro: yo dangi no shikata mo miete natsu kodachi
en:
a night sermon
with gestures...
summer trees

jp: .梨坂の神の御前や木下闇
ro: nashisaka no kami no omae ya ko shita yami
en:
facing the god
of Pear Tree Hill...
deep tree shade

jp: .役馬の立眠りする柿の花
ro: yaku uma no tachi nemuri suru kaki no hana
en:
the horse sleeps
standing up...
persimmon blooms

jp: .蟷螂のわにたつら也茨の花
ro: tôrô no wanita tsura nari hara no hana
en:
the praying mantis's
shy expression...
wild roses

jp: .痩梅のなり年さへもなかりけり
ro: yase ume no naridoshi sae mo nakari keri
en:
my scrawny plum tree
too
is fruitless

jp: .狗がこかして来たり赤李
ro: enokoro ga kokashite kitari aka sumomo
en:
the puppy comes tumbling
after the red
plum

jp: .葉がくれの赤い李をなく小犬
ro: ha-gakure no akai sumomo wo naku ko inu
en:
for the red plum
in leafy shade...
barking puppy

jp: .けさ秋としらぬ狗が仏哉
ro: kesa aki to shiranu enoko ga hotoke kana
en:
not knowing that
autumn's begun, puppy
Buddha!

jp: .けさ秋と云計りでも老にけり
ro: kesa aki to iu bakari demo oi ni keri
en:
"First autumn morning"
just saying it...
feel old

jp: .うそ寒や仏の留主の善光寺
ro: uso samu ya hotoke no rusu no zenkôji
en:
nippy weather--
the Buddha takes leave
of Zenko Temple

jp: .朝寒や垣の茶笊の影法師
ro: asa-zamu ya kaki no chazaru no kagebôshi
en:
morning cold--
on the fence the tea strainer's
shadow

jp: .朝寒や菊も少々素湯土瓶
ro: asa-zamu ya kiku mo shôshô sayu dobin
en:
morning cold--
for the chrysanthemum too
a little hot water

jp: .朝寒や隙人達のねまる程
ro: asa-zamu ya himajintachi no nemaru hodo
en:
morning cold--
men of leisure
stay put

jp: .鶏の小首を曲げる夜寒哉
ro: niwatori no kokubi wo mageru yozamu kana
en:
twisting the chicken's
neck...
a cold night

jp: .姥に似た石の寝やうや秋の夕
ro: uba ni nita ishi no ne-yô ya aki no yû
en:
a boulder that looks
like an old woman asleep...
autumn evening

jp: .おれのみは舟を出す也秋の暮
ro: ore no mi [wa] fune wo dasu nari aki no kure
en:
I'm all alone
on the ferry...
autumn dusk

jp: .隠家や呑手を雇ふ秋の暮
ro: kakurega ya nomite wo yatou aki no kure
en:
secluded house--
the drunk I hired
in the autumn dusk

jp: .桟や盲もわたる秋のくれ
ro: kakehashi ya mekura mo wataru aki no kure
en:
hanging bridge--
a blind man crosses too
in autumn dusk

jp: .それがしも宿なしに候秋の暮
ro: soregashi mo yado nashi ni soro aki no kure
en:
I too
without a home...
autumn dusk

jp: .松の木も老の仲間ぞ秋の暮
ro: matsu no ki mo oi no nakama zo aki no kure
en:
the pine tree too
in the circle of old men...
autumn dusk

jp: .三日月や江どの苫やも秋の暮
ro: mikazuki ya edo no tomaya mo aki no kure
en:
sickle moon--
in the reed huts of Edo too
autumn dusk

jp: .我松も腰がかがみぬ秋の暮
ro: waga matsu mo koshi ga kagaminu aki no kure
en:
my pine tree too
is bent with age...
autumn dusk

jp: .古郷に流入けり天の川
ro: furusato ni nagare iri keri ama no kawa
en:
into my home village
it flows...
the Milky Way

jp: .冷水にすすり込だる天の川
ro: hiya mizu ni susuri kondaru ama no kawa
en:
in cold water
sipping the stars...
Milky Way

jp: .ぼんの凹から冷しけり天の川
ro: bon no kubo kara hiyashi keri ama no kawa
en:
on the nape of my neck
a chill...
the Milky Way

jp: .三ケ月をにらみ付たる蝉の殻
ro: mikazuki wo nirami tsuketaru semi no kara
en:
scowling
at the sickle moon...
cicada husk

jp: .八月や雨待宵の信濃山
ro: hachigatsu ya ame matsuyoi no shinano yama
en:
Eighth Month--
a rainy night, pre-harvest moon
in the mountains of Shinano

jp: .名月や山の奥には山の月
ro: meigetsu ya yama no oku ni wa yama no tsuki
en:
harvest moon--
deep in the mountain
a mountain moon

jp: .金下戸や蝕名月の目利哉
ro: kanageko ya shoku meigetsu no mekiki kana
en:
one nondrinker--
harvest moon eclipse
gazers

jp: .盗めとの庇の餅や十三夜
ro: nusume to no hisashi no mochi ya jû san yo
en:
go ahead, steal
those rice cakes on the eaves!
Ninth Month moon

jp: .仏さへ御留主しにけり秋日和
ro: hotoke sae o-rusu shi ni keri akibiyori
en:
even the Buddha
ventures outside...
clear fall weather

jp: .二軒やは二軒餅つく秋の雨
ro: ni ken ya wa ni ken mochi tsuku aki no ame
en:
in two houses
preparing rice cakes...
autumn rain

jp: .秋風や如来の留主の善光寺
ro: aki kaze ya nyorai no rusu no zenkôji
en:
autumn wind--
the Buddha of Zenko Temple
is gone

jp: .乳放れの馬の顔より秋の風
ro: chibanare no uma no kao yori aki no kaze
en:
from the weaned
pony's face...
autumn wind

jp: .朝露の流れ出けり山の町
ro: asa tsuyu no nagare-ide keri yama no machi
en:
floating forth
on the morning dew
mountain town

jp: .甘からばさぞおれが露人の露
ro: amakaraba sazo oraga tsuyu hito no tsuyu
en:
if they were sweet
dewdrops, no doubt, would be
"mine" and "thine"

jp: .腕にも露がおく也御茶売
ro: kaina ni mo tsuyu ga oku nari ocha uri
en:
even on his arms
dewdrops
the tea seller

jp: .けさの露顔洗ふにはありあまる
ro: kesa no tsuyu kao ara[u] ni wa ariamaru
en:
morning dew
more than enough
for face-washing

jp: .茶土瓶やああああ一杯秋の露
ro: cha dobin ya aa aa ippai aki no tsuyu
en:
earthen teapot
ah! all full
with autumn dew

jp: .露ちるや五十以上の旅人衆
ro: tsuyu chiru ya go jû ijô no tabibito shu
en:
dewdrops scatter--
over fifty travelers
en masse

jp: .露の世の露の並ぶやばくち小屋
ro: tsuyu no yo no tsuyu no narabu ya bakuchi goya
en:
this dewdrop world's
dewdrops in a row...
little gambling shack

jp: .野の馬の天窓干也秋の露
ro: no no uma no atama hosu nari aki no tsuyu
en:
the field horse's head
is drying...
autumn dew

jp: .花うりのかざりにちるや今朝の露
ro: hana uri no kazari ni chiru ya kesa no tsuyu
en:
decorating the flower stall
trickling down...
morning dew

jp: .夕露やいつもの所に灯の見ゆる
ro: yûtsuyu ya itsumo no toko ni hi no miyuru
en:
evening dew--
the lamp is lit
in its usual place

jp: .行秋や畠の稲も秋の露
ro: yuki aki ya hatake no ine mo aki no tsuyu
en:
autumn departs
yet still on the rice field
autumn dew

jp: .稲妻に並ぶやどれも五十顔
ro: inazuma ni narabu yadore mo go jû kao
en:
in lightning's flash
faces in a row...
old men

jp: .稲妻に実を孕む也葎迄
ro: inazuma ni mi wo haramu nari mugura made
en:
lightning impregnates
seeds with life...
even for weeds

jp: .稲妻や狗ばかり無欲顔
ro: inazuma ya enokoro bakari muyoku kao
en:
lightning flash--
only the puppy's face
is innocent

jp: .豊年の大稲妻よいなづまよ
ro: hônen no ô inazuma yo inazuma yo
en:
harbinger
of a fruitful year...
huge lightning!

jp: .穂すすきにあをり出さるる踊哉
ro: ho susuki ni aori-dasaruru odori kana
en:
plumes of pampas grass
all a-flutter...
festival dancers

jp: .京入の声を上けりしなのごま
ro: kyô iri no koe wo age keri shinano-goma
en:
entering Kyoto
he lets loose a neigh...
Shinano pony

jp: .草くれてさらばさらばよ駒の主
ro: kusa kurete saraba saraba yo koma no nushi
en:
feeding him grass
farewell! farewell!
the pony's master

jp: .駒引くよそばの世並はどの位
ro: koma hiku yo soba no yonami wa donokurai
en:
led-away pony--
how has this year's
buckwheat grown?

jp: .餞別に草花添て馬むかへ
ro: senbetsu ni kusabana soute uma mukae
en:
a parting gift
of wildflowers...
seeing off the horse

jp: .一袋そばも添けり駒迎
ro: hito fukuro soba mo soe keri koma mukae
en:
a sack of buckwheat
goes with him...
seeing off the pony

jp: .八朔や犬の椀にも小豆飯
ro: hassaku ya inu no wan ni mo azukimeshi
en:
harvest gifts--
in the dog's bowl too
boiled beans and rice

jp: .八朔や盆に乗たる福俵
ro: hassaku ya bon ni nosetaru fuku tawara
en:
harvest gift--
on the tray laying
a good-luck bag

jp: .菊の日や呑手を雇ふ貰ひ酒
ro: kiku no hi ya nomite wo yatou morai sake
en:
Chrysantheum Festival--
the drunk I hired
gives me sake

jp: .かくれやや呑手を雇ふ菊の酒
ro: kakureya ya nomite wo yatou kiku no sake
en:
secluded house--
with the drunk I hired
Chrysanthemum Festival wine

jp: .若松も一ッ歌へや鳴子引
ro: waka matsu mo hitotsu utae ya naruko hiki
en:
hey, young pine
how about a song?
bird clapper

jp: .庵の夜やどちへ向いても下手砧
ro: io no yo ya dochi e muite mo heta-ginuta
en:
night in the hut--
from every direction
a cloth-pounding cacophony

jp: .子宝の多い在所や夕ぎぬた
ro: ko-dakara no ôi zaisho ya yûginuta
en:
it's a land
of treasured children!
evening cloth-pounding

jp: .子宝の寝顔見へ見へ砧哉
ro: ko-dakara no ne-gao mie mie kinuta kana
en:
watching her treasured
child's sleeping face...
pounding cloth

jp: .二番寝や心でおがむ小夜ぎぬた
ro: ni ban ne ya kokoro de ogamu sayo-ginuta
en:
going back to sleep
with praise from my heart...
night cloth-pounding

jp: .よわ声は母の砧と知れけり
ro: yowa koe wa haha no kinuta to shirare keri
en:
faintly heard--
the one pounding cloth
is Mother

jp: .有明や十ばかり対に鳴く
ro: ariake ya shika jû bakari tsui ni naku
en:
sunrise--
ten deer at least
singing in pairs

jp: .うら窓や鹿のきどりに犬の声
ro: ura mado ya shika no kidori ni inu no koe
en:
back window--
the deer strikes a pose
the dog barks

jp: .うら窓や鹿のきどりに犬の寝る
ro: ura mado ya shika no kidori inu no neru
en:
back window--
the deer strikes a pose
the dog sleeps

jp: .さをしかも親子三人ぐらし哉
ro: saoshika mo oyako sannin-gurashi kana
en:
even the deer--
parents, child
a family of three

jp: .さをしかや片膝立って山の月
ro: saoshika ya katahiza tatte yama no tsuki
en:
the young buck kneels
on one knee...
mountain moon

jp: .さをしかやすすきの陰のいく夫婦
ro: saoshika ya susuki no kage no iku meoto
en:
deer in the shadows
of pampas grass...
how many couples?

jp: .鹿鳴や犬なき里の大月夜
ro: shika naku ya inu naki sato no ôtsuki yo
en:
cries of the deer--
in a village without dogs
a moonlit night

jp: .鹿鳴や虫も寝まりはせざりけり
ro: shika naku ya mushi mo nemari wa [se]zari keri
en:
a deer cries
and the insects aren't sleeping
either

jp: .吼る鹿おれをうさんと思ふかよ
ro: hoeru shika ore wo usan [to] omou ka yo
en:
barking deer
do you think I'm
a suspicious character?

jp: .むつまじやしかの手枕足枕
ro: mutsumaji ya shika no temakura ashi makura
en:
the friendly deer--
my hands for a pillow
and my feet

jp: .薮並やとし寄鹿のぎりに鳴
ro: yabu nami ya toshiyori shika no giri ni naku
en:
in the thicket
the old deer calls
for honor's sake

jp: .夜あらしや窓に吹込鹿の声
ro: yo arashi ya mado ni fukikomu shika no koe
en:
night storm--
blowing in the window
cry of a deer

jp: .我形をうさんと見てや鹿の鳴
ro: waga nari wo usan to mite ya shika no naku
en:
glimpsing suspicious me
the deer sounds
the alarm

jp: .穀留の関所を越る鶉かな
ro: kokudome no sekisho wo koeru uzura kana
en:
passing through
the grain checking station...
a quail

jp: .あれ月が月がと雁のさわぎ哉
ro: are tsuki ga tsuki ga to kari no sawagi kana
en:
"There's the moon!
The moon!"
wild geese clamor

jp: .開帳の跡をかりてや雁の鳴
ro: kaichô no ato wo karite ya kari no naku
en:
in the wake
of the Buddhist procession...
honking geese

jp: .大蛇も首尾よく穴へ入にけり
ro: ô hebi mo shubi yoku ana e iri ni keri
en:
the long snake
head to tail, down the hole...
success!

jp: .蛇の穴阿房鼠が入にけり
ro: hebi no ana ahô nezumi ga iri ni keri
en:
into the snake's hole
O foolish
mouse

jp: .鳴虫も節を付たり世の中は
ro: naku mushi mo fushi wo tsuketari yo no naka wa
en:
singing insects, too
make music
in this world

jp: .むしどももなき事いふなこんな秋
ro: mushi-domo mo nakigoto iu na konna aki
en:
O insects
don't you complain too!
this autumn

jp: .虫どもが泣事いふが手がら哉
ro: mushi-domo ga nakigoto iu ga tegara kana
en:
for singing insects
complaining
is a feat

jp: .虫どもが泣事云ぞともすれば
ro: mushi-domo ga nakigoto iu zo tomosureba
en:
the singing insects
so prone
to complaining!

jp: .世の中や鳴虫にさえ上づ下手
ro: yo no naka ya naku mushi ni sa[e] jyôzu heta
en:
in this world
among insects too...
good singers, bad singers

jp: .わやわやと虫の上にも夜なべ哉
ro: waya-waya to mushi no ue ni mo yonabe kana
en:
what a clamor!
even for the insects
night work

jp: .おれよりははるか上手ぞ屁ひり虫
ro: ore yori wa harukajôzu zo hehirimushi
en:
better than me
at long distance!
the fart bug

jp: .御仏の鼻の先にて屁ひり虫
ro: mi-botoke no hana no saki nite hehirimushi
en:
on the tip
of Buddha's nose...
a fart bug

jp: .仰のけに落ちて鳴けり秋の蝉
ro: aonoke ni ochite naki keri aki no semi
en:
fallen face-up
but singing...
autumn cicada

jp: .朝露に食傷したう蜻蛉哉
ro: asa tsuyu ni shokushô shitaru tombo kana
en:
stuffing himself
on the morning dew
dragonfly

jp: .大組の赤蜻蛉や神ぢ山
ro: ôgumi no aka tombô kamiji yama
en:
a gang of red
dragonflies...
Mount Kamiji

jp: .けふもけふも糸引ずってとんぼ哉
ro: kyô mo kyô mo ito hikizutte tombo kana
en:
today too
dragging his tail...
dragonfly

jp: .遠山が目玉にうつるとんぼ哉
ro: tôyama ga medama ni utsuru tombo kana
en:
the distant mountain
reflected in his eyes...
dragonfly

jp: .とんぼうの上より出たる天窓哉
ro: tombô no ue yori detaru atama kana
en:
departing
from the dragonfly's top...
his head

jp: .とんぼうの滑り落たる天窓哉
ro: tombô no suberi-ochitaru atama kana
en:
slipping right off
the dragonfly...
his head

jp: .蜻蛉も人もきょろきょろきょろ目哉
ro: tombô mo hito mo kyoro-kyoro me kana
en:
dragonflies like people--
restless, restless
eyes

jp: .蜻蛉も紅葉の真ねや竜田川
ro: tombô mo momiji no mane ya tatsuta-gawa
en:
a dragonfly copies
the red leaves...
Tatsuta River

jp: .はたをへる箸と同じく蜻蛉哉
ro: hata wo heru hashi to onajiku tombo kana
en:
like the weaver's
chopstick for her loom...
a dragonfly

jp: .百尺の竿の頭にとんぼ哉
ro: hyaku shaku no sao no atama ni tombo kana
en:
atop the hundred
foot-tall pole...
a dragonfly

jp: .三ケ月をにらめつめたるとんぼ哉
ro: mikazuki wo nirame tsumetaru tombo kana
en:
scowling
at the sickle moon...
a dragonfly

jp: .こおろぎのうけ泊て鳴竈かな
ro: kôrogi no uketomete naku kamado kana
en:
deep inside
a cricket is singing...
oven

jp: .こおろぎのころころ一人笑ひ哉
ro: kôrogi no koro-koro hito[ri] warai kana
en:
the cricket
"Cricky! Cricky!" laughing
by himself

jp: .いなむしがとぶぞ世がよいよいと
ro: inamushi ga tobu zo yo ga yoi yoi to
en:
locusts flying
"The word is good!
All good!"

jp: .きりぎりす三疋よれば喧嘩哉
ro: kirigirisu san-biki yoreba kenka kana
en:
katydids--
when three of them gather
they quarrel

jp: .きりぎりす身を売れても鳴にけり
ro: kirigirisu mi wo urarete mo naki ni keri
en:
the katydid--
even while they sell him
singing

jp: .銭箱の穴より出たりきりぎりす
ro: zeni-bako no ana yori detari kirigirisu
en:
from the hole
in the money box...
a katydid

jp: .歯ぎしりの拍子とる也きりぎりす
ro: hagishiri no hyôshi toru nari kirigirisu
en:
to the beat
of grinding teeth
the katydid sings

jp: .ほっけよむ天窓の上やきりぎりす
ro: hokke yomu atama no ue ya kirigirisu
en:
atop the scripture
reader's head...
a katydid

jp: .入相の聞処なり草の華
ro: iriai no kiku tokoro nari kusa no hana
en:
at the sound of the sunset
bell...
wildflowers

jp: .人の世や先繰にちる草の花
ro: hito no yo ya senguri ni chiru kusa no hana
en:
world of man--
one by one the wildflowers
scatter

jp: .縁の猫勿体顔や菊の花
ro: en no neko mottai kao ya kiku no hana
en:
the verandah cat's
lofty expression...
chrysanthemum

jp: .大きさよ去年は勝た菊ながら
ro: ôkisa yo kyonen wa katta kiku nagara
en:
how you've grown!
last year's champion
chrysanthemum

jp: .去年勝た勝たと菊を披露哉
ro: kyonen katta katta to kiku wo hirô kana
en:
last year
"Champion of Champions"...
chrysanthemum's placard

jp: .はづかしや勝気のぬけた菊の庵
ro: hazukashi ya kachiki no nuketa kiku no io
en:
ashamed that the winning
spirit's been lost...
chrysanthemum hut

jp: .京都では菊もかむるや綿えぼし
ro: miyako [de] wa kiku mo kamuru ya wata eboshi
en:
in Kyoto
even for chrysanthmums...
cotton courtier caps

jp: .山菊の生れたままや真直に
ro: yama-giku no umare[ta] mama ya massugu ni
en:
the mountain chrysanthemum
born to its nature...
perfectly straight

jp: .山菊の直なりけらしおのづから
ro: yama-giku no sugu nari kerashi onozukara
en:
the mountain chrysanthemum
grows up straight...
naturally

jp: .山の菊曲るなんどはしらぬ也
ro: yama no kiku magaru nando wa shiranu nari
en:
mountain chrysanthemum--
growing crooked's a thing
it knows nothing about

jp: .綿きせて十程若し菊の花
ro: wata kisete jû hodo wakashi kiku no hana
en:
covering about ten
with cotton cloth...
young chrysanthemums

jp: .人里に植れば曲る野菊哉
ro: hito-zato ni uereba magaru nogiku kana
en:
in a village of people
they grow crooked...
field chrysanthemums

jp: .萩寺や鹿のきどりに犬が寝る
ro: hagi-dera ya shika no kidori ni inu ga neru
en:
bush clover temple--
the deer strikes a pose
the dog sleeps

jp: .我萩や鹿のかわりに犬が寝る
ro: waga hagi ya shika no kawari ni inu ga neru
en:
my bush clover--
instead of deer
a sleeping dog

jp: .いくばくの人の油よ稲の花
ro: ikubaku no hito no abura yo ine no hana
en:
how many people
sweated and toiled!
rice blossoms

jp: .稲の花大の男のかくれけり
ro: ine no hana ô no otoko no kakure keri
en:
rice blossoms--
a large man
lost in them

jp: .狗も腹鼓うて稲の花
ro: enokoro mo hara tsuzumi ute ine no hana
en:
even the puppy
drums his belly...
rice blossoms

jp: .常留主の堂の小溝に稲穂哉
ro: jô rusu no dô no ko mizo ni inaho kana
en:
in little ditch
by the vacant temple...
heads of rice

jp: .十筋程犬に負せる稲穂哉
ro: to suji hodo inu ni owaseru inaho kana
en:
about ten strands
loaded on the dog...
heads of rice

jp: .人は武士也小つぶでもたうがらし
ro: hito wa bushi [nari] tsubu de mo tôgarashi
en:
a man must be a samurai!
though little
you're a hot pepper

jp: .子どもらが狐のまねもすすき哉
ro: kodomora ga kitsune no mane mo susuki kana
en:
the children
pretend to be foxes...
pampas grass

jp: .故郷や近よる人を切るすすき
ro: furusato ya chikayoru hito wo kiru susuki
en:
my home village--
come close and the pampas grass
cuts you

jp: .穂すすきに下手念仏のかくれけり
ro: ho susuki ni heta nembutsu no kakure keri
en:
amid plumes of pampas grass
a poor "Praise Buddha!"
hidden

jp: .幽霊と人は見るらんすすき原
ro: yûrei to hito wa miruran susuki-bara
en:
where people
see ghosts...
field of pampas grass

jp: .渋柿をこらへてくうや京の児
ro: shibugaki wo koraete kuu ya miyako no ko
en:
enduring the astringent
persimmon...
Kyoto child

jp: .渋い所母が喰けり山の柿
ro: shibu[i] toko haha ga kui keri yama no kaki
en:
Mother eats
the astringent part...
mountain persimmon

jp: .渋柿と烏も知って通りけり
ro: shibugaki to karasu mo shitte tôri keri
en:
the persimmon's astringent--
the crow, too, knows
and passes on

jp: .京の児柿の渋さをかくしけり
ro: miyako no ko kaki no shibusa wo kakushi keri
en:
Kyoto child--
pretending the persimmon
is sweet

jp: .山柿も仏の目には甘からん
ro: yama-gaki mo hotoke no me ni wa ama karan
en:
mountain persimmons--
in Buddha's eyes
they are sweet

jp: .我味の柘榴に這す虱かな
ro: waga aji no zakuro ni hawasu shirami kana
en:
this pomegranate
tastes like me
enjoy it, little louse!

jp: .はづかしやとられぬ栗の目にかかる
ro: hazukashi ya torarenu kuri no me ni kakaru
en:
ashamed--
eyes glued to the chestnut
beyond reach

jp: .大茸馬糞も時を得たりけり
ro: ôkinoko ma-guso mo toki wo etari keri
en:
big mushroom--
even horse dung
had its day

jp: .人をとる茸はたしてうつくしき
ro: hito wo toru kinoko hatashite utsukushiki
en:
it's a man-killing
mushroom, true...
but pretty!

jp: .うしろから寒が入也壁の穴
ro: ushiro kara kan ga iru nari kabe no ana
en:
behind me
the cold sneaks in...
hole in the wall

jp: .馬人の渡り馴たる氷哉
ro: umabito no watari naretaru kôri kana
en:
getting used to
horsemen crossing it...
the ice

jp: .すいすいと渡れば渡る氷哉
ro: suisui to watare[ba] wataru kôri kana
en:
if you cross it
cross lightly!
ice

jp: .寒の月真正面也寒山寺
ro: kan no tsuki masshômen nari kan yamadera
en:
a cold moon
facing the cold
mountain temple

jp: .遠山に野火が付たぞ初時雨
ro: tôyama ni nobi ga tsuita zo hatsu shigure
en:
the fire reaches
the distant mountain...
first winter rain

jp: .裸虫さし出て時雨時雨けり
ro: hadaka mushi sashidete shigure shigure keri
en:
a wiggling worm
peeks out...winter rain!
winter rain!

jp: .身一ッに嵐こがらしすべり道
ro: mi hitotsu ni arashi kogarashi suberi michi
en:
just for me
a storm, winter wind
and slippery road

jp: .重荷負ふ牛や頭につもる雪
ro: omoni ou ushi ya atama ni tsumoru yuki
en:
it's a load
on the cow's head...
pile of snow

jp: .しなのぢや意地にかかって雪の降
ro: shinano ji ya iji ni kakatte yuki no furu
en:
Shinano road--
the snow falls
stubbornly

jp: .真直な小便穴や門の雪
ro: massuguna shôben ana ya kado no yuki
en:
what a straight
piss hole!
snow at the gate

jp: .雪ちるや御駕へはこぶ二八蕎麦
ro: yuki chiru ya o-kago e hakobu nihachi soba
en:
in falling snow
delivered to a palanquin...
buckwheat noodles

jp: .居酒屋で馬足のとまる吹雪哉
ro: izakaya de uma ashi no tomaru fubuki kana
en:
the horse stops
at the sake shop...
a blizzard

jp: .えり形に吹込雪や枕元
ro: eri nari ni fukikomu yuki ya makura moto
en:
a triangle of snow
blown on the floor...
to my pillow

jp: .窓の穴壁の割より吹雪哉
ro: mado no ana kabe no ware yori fubuki kana
en:
from the window's hole
and the wall's crack...
the blizzard

jp: .さ筵や猫がきて来た太平雪
ro: samushiro ya neko ga kite ki[ta] tabira yuki
en:
little straw mat--
the cat comes with a coat
of snowflakes

jp: .朝霜やしかも子どものお花売
ro: asa shimo ya shikamo kodomo no o-hana uri
en:
morning frost--
yet still a child sells
temple flowers

jp: .こおろぎの霜夜の声を自慢哉
ro: kôrogi no shimo yo no koe wo jiman kana
en:
cricket on a frosty
night...
bragging!

jp: .乞食子や膝の上迄けさの霜
ro: kojiki ko ya hiza no ue made kesa no shimo
en:
beggar child--
even in his lap
morning frost

jp: .五六疋馬干ておく枯野哉
ro: go roku-biki uma hoshite oku kareno kana
en:
five or six horses
cooling down...
the withered fields

jp: .我宿の貧乏神も御供せよ
ro: waga yado no bimbô kami mo o-tomo seyo
en:
the dirt-poor god
of my house, too
joins the throng

jp: .十月の御十二日ぞはつ時雨
ro: jûgatsu no o-jû ni nichi zo hatsu shigure
en:
Tenth Month's
venerable twelfth day...
first winter rain

jp: .はいかいの報恩講やはつしぐれ
ro: haikai no hôonkô ya hatsu shigure
en:
a haiku reading
in memoriam...
first winter rain

jp: .芭蕉忌やえぞにもこんな松の月
ro: bashôki ya ezo ni mo konna matsu no tsuki
en:
Basho's Death-Day--
even in Hokkaido this moon
in the pine

jp: .ほけ経と鳥もばせうの法事哉
ro: hokekyô to tori mo bashô no hôji kana
en:
Lotus Sutra--
the birds remember Basho
too

jp: .えた村の御講幟やお霜月
ro: eta mura [no] okô nobori ya o-shimtsuki
en:
in the outcasts' town
a Buddhist banner...
the frosty month

jp: .木母寺や常念仏も寒の声
ro: mokuboji ya jônembutsu mo kan no koe
en:
Mokubo Temple--
praising Buddha, too
for winter voice drills

jp: .庵の煤風が払ってくれにけり
ro: io no susu kaze ga haratte kure ni keri
en:
kindly the wind
sweeps my sooty
hut

jp: .煤竹の高砂めくや爺が舞
ro: susutake no takasago-meku ya jiji ga mau
en:
his soot broom's pile
looks like Takasago...
old man dances

jp: .煤はくもあく日なんどのむづかしや
ro: susu haku mo akubi nando no muzukashi ya
en:
even soot-sweeping
on an unlucky day...
so much harder!

jp: .山里は四五年ぶりの煤払
ro: yama-zato wa shi go nenburi no susu harai
en:
mountain village--
four or five years of soot
needs sweeping

jp: .天窓から湯けむり立って節季候
ro: atama kara yu kemuri tatte sekkizoro
en:
hot bath steam
rising from his head...
Twelfth Month singer

jp: .大藪の入もせき候せき候よ
ro: ôyabu no iri mo sekizoro sekizoro yo
en:
even well into
the First Month...
Twelfth Month singers!

jp: .せき候に負ぬや門のむら雀
ro: sekizoro ni makenu ya kado no mura suzume
en:
not to be outdone
by the Twelfth Month singers...
the gate's sparrows

jp: .せき候も三弦にのる都哉
ro: sekizoro mo samisen ni noru miyako kana
en:
a samisen joins
the Twelfth Month singers...
Kyoto

jp: .せき候やささらでなでる梅の花
ro: sekizoro ya sasara de naderu ume no hana
en:
Twelfth Month singers--
one strokes plum blossoms
with his whisk

jp: .引風のせきから直に節き候
ro: hiki kaze no seki kara sugu ni sekkizoro
en:
after a hacking cold
right away...
Twelfth Month singers

jp: .かくれ家や猫が三疋もちのばん
ro: kakurega ya neko ga sambiki mochi no ban
en:
secluded house--
three cats guard
the rice cakes

jp: .神の餅秤にかかるうき世哉
ro: kami no mochi hakari ni kakaru ukiyo kana
en:
the god's rice cakes
weighed in the scales...
floating world

jp: .のし餅の中や一すじ猫の道
ro: noshi mochi no naka ya hito suji neko no michi
en:
down the middle
of the flat rice cake...
cat's path

jp: .君が代や馬屋の馬へも衣配
ro: kimi ga yo ya umaya no uma e mo kinu kubari
en:
Great Japan!
even for the stable's horses
a gift of new clothes

jp: .烏さへ年とる森は持にけり
ro: karasu sae toshitoru mori wa mochi ni keri
en:
even the crow
has a grove
to grow old in

jp: .年とりのあてもないぞよ旅烏
ro: toshitori no ate mo nai [zo]yo tabi-garasu
en:
not aiming to grow
a year older...
traveling crow

jp: .橇をなりに習ってはきにけり
ro: kanjiki wo nari ni naratte haki ni keri
en:
practicing
with the snowshoes...
putting them on

jp: .橇や庵の前をふみ序
ro: kanjiki ya iori no mae wo fumi-tsuide
en:
snowshoes--
in front of the hut
print after print

jp: .橇や人の真似して犬およぐ
ro: kanjiki ya hito no mane shite inu oyogu
en:
snowshoes--
following behind, the dog
swims

jp: .里の子や杓子で作る雪の山
ro: sato no ko ya shakushi [de] tsukuru yuki no yama
en:
the village child
builds it with a spoon...
Snow Mountain

jp: .里の子や手でつくねたる雪の山
ro: sato no ko ya te de tsukunetaru yuki no yama
en:
the village child
builds it with her hands...
Snow Mountain

jp: .我宿は丸めた雪のうしろ哉
ro: waga yado wa marumeta yuki no ushiro kana
en:
my dwelling--
somewhere behind
the bundled snow

jp: .かりそめの雪も仏となりにけり
ro: karisome no yuki mo hotoke to nari ni keri
en:
even our fleeting snow
becomes
Buddha!

jp: .づぶ濡れの大名を見る炬燵哉
ro: zubunu[re] no daimyô wo miru kotatsu kana
en:
watching a war lord
drenched...
my cozy brazier

jp: .炭の火や齢のへるもあの通り
ro: sumi no hi ya yowai no heru mo ano tôri
en:
charcoal fire--
passing through old age
is like that

jp: .思ひ草思はぬ草も枯にけり
ro: omoi kusa omowanu kusa mo kare ni keri
en:
familiar grasses
and unfamiliar...
the same withering

jp: .作らるる菊から先へ枯れにけり
ro: tsukuraruru kiku kara saki e kare ni keri
en:
cultivated chrysanthemums
wither
first

jp: .たがたがと枯恥かくな乱れ菊
ro: taga-taga to kare haji kaku na midare-giku
en:
there's no shame
that you totter...
old chrysanthemum

jp: .我門や只六本の大根蔵
ro: waga kado ya tada roppon no daikon-gura
en:
my gate--
just six radishes
remain in supply

jp: .今打し畠のさまやちる木の葉
ro: ima uchishi hatake no sama ya chiru ko[no]ha
en:
on the fresh-plowed
field fallen leaves
scatter

jp: .猫の子のくるくる舞やちる木の葉
ro: neko no ko no kuru-kurumai ya chiru konoha
en:
the kitten dances
round and round...
falling leaves

jp: .猫の子のちょいと押へる木の葉かな
ro: neko no ko no choi to osaeru konoha kana
en:
the kitten holds it down
just a moment...
fallen leaf

jp: .冬枯や在所の雨が横に降る
ro: fuyugare ya zaisho no ame ga yoko ni furu
en:
winter withering--
at the farmhouse the rain
falls sideways

jp: .掃溜に鶴の下りけり和歌の浦
ro: hakidame ni tsuru no ori keri waka no ura
en:
cranes land
on the rubbish heap...
Waka Beach

jp: .掃溜も鶴だらけ也和歌の浦
ro: hakidame mo tsuru darake nari waka no ura
en:
the cranes swarm
the rubbish heap...
Waka Beach

jp: .巌にはとくなれさざれ石太郎
ro: iwao ni wa toku nare sazare ishitarô
en:
to a massive rock
grow quickly my pebble...
Ishitaro

jp: .元日も立のままなる屑家哉
ro: ganjitsu mo tatsu no mama naru kuzuya kana
en:
on New Year's Day, too
standing "as is"...
trashy house

jp: .元日も別条のなき屑屋哉
ro: ganjitsu mo betsujô no naki kuzuya kana
en:
New Year's Day
nothing to report...
trashy house

jp: .元日やどちらむいても花の娑婆
ro: ganjitsu ya dochira muite mo hana no shaba
en:
on New Year's Day
everywhere, a corrupt world's
blossoms

jp: .あら玉の春早々の悪日哉
ro: aratama no haru haya-baya no akubi kana
en:
a new spring starting--
early, so early
turns sour

jp: .ことしから手左り笠に小風呂敷
ro: kotoshi kara te hidari kasa [ni] ko-buroshiki
en:
from this year on
in my left hand, umbrella-hat
in the right, knapsack

jp: .ことしから丸儲ぞよ娑婆遊び
ro: kotoshi kara marumôke zo yo shaba asobi
en:
from this year on
clear profit, carousing
in this fallen world

jp: .ことしからまふけ遊びぞ花の娑婆
ro: kotoshi kara môke asobi zo hana no shaba
en:
from this year on
just carousing...
this corrupt world's blossoms

jp: .正月が二つありとや浮寝鳥
ro: shôgatsu ga futatsu ari to ya ukine tori
en:
the First Month celebration
starts up again...
waterfowl

jp: .正月の二ッもなまけ始かな
ro: shôgatsu no futatsu mo namake hajime kana
en:
First Month, second day
the laziness
begins

jp: .けさの春別な村でもなかりけり
ro: kesa no haru betsuna mura demo nakari keri
en:
spring's first dawn--
there's not a village
where it isn't

jp: .家根々の窓や一度に明の春
ro: yane-yane no mado ya ichi do ni ake no haru
en:
roof after roof
windows open all at once...
first of spring

jp: .こけるなよ土こんにゃくも玉の春
ro: kokeru na yo tsuchi konnyaku mo tama no haru
en:
don't shrivel!
even for the devil's tongue
a prosperous spring

jp: .門口や自然生なる松の春
ro: kado-guchi ya jinen bae-naru matsu no haru
en:
at my gate
wildly it grows...
spring pine

jp: .初春のけ形りは我と雀かな
ro: hatsu haru no kenari wa ware [to] suzume kana
en:
we start the spring
in our everyday clothes...
me and the sparrow

jp: .春立や庵の鬼門の一り塚
ro: haru tatsu ya io no kimon no hitori tsuka
en:
spring begins--
on the hut's unlucky side
a grave

jp: .春立や切口上の門雀
ro: haru tatsu ya kirikôjô no kado suzume
en:
spring begins--
the obligatory
sparrows at the gate

jp: .すすけても年徳神の御宿哉
ro: susukete mo toshi tokujin no o-yado kana
en:
it's sooty too--
the New Year god's
home

jp: .年神に御任せ申す五体哉
ro: toshigami ni o-makase mô[su] gotai kana
en:
entrusting all
to the New Year's god...
head to toe

jp: .とぶ工夫猫のしてけり恵方棚
ro: tobu kufû neko no shite keri ehôdana
en:
the cat considers
jumping up...
New Year's offering shelf

jp: .呑連の常恵方也上かん屋
ro: nomi-zure no jôehô nari jôkanya
en:
for drinking buddies
the usual New Year's pilgrimage...
sake shop

jp: .御忌参りするも足品手品哉
ro: go-kimairi suru mo ashijina tejina kana
en:
even on Honen's Death-Day--
shaky feet
shaky hands

jp: .斎日は踏るる臼も休み哉
ro: sainichi wa fumaruru usu mo yasumi kana
en:
on the fast day
even the foot mill
is idle

jp: .小松引人とて人のおがむ也
ro: ko matsu hiku hito tote hito no ogamu nari
en:
yanking up a little pine
he says
a prayer

jp: .主ありや野雪隠にも門の松
ro: nushi ari ya no setchin ni mo kado no matsu
en:
even for the man
pooping in the field...
New Year's pine

jp: .御年初を申し入れけり狐穴
ro: o-nensho wo môshi-ire keri kitsune ana
en:
sending a "Happy
New Year!"
down the fox's hole

jp: .御年初の返事をするや二階から
ro: o-nensho no henji wo suru ya ni kai kara
en:
my New Year's greeting
is answered...
second floor

jp: .堅人や一山越てから御慶
ro: katajin ya hito yama koshite kara gyokei
en:
a good man--
crossing a mountain to say
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .門礼や片側づつは草履道
ro: kado rei ya kata kawa-zutsu wa zôri michi
en:
New Year's gate greetings--
on each side of the road
tracks of sandals

jp: .門礼や猫にとし玉打つける
ro: kadorei ya neko ni toshidama uchi tsukeru
en:
"Happy New Year!"
at the gate, tossing the cat
a present

jp: .米値段許り見る也年初状
ro: kome nedan bakari miru nari nenshojô
en:
reading it to discover
the price of rice...
New Year's greeting letter

jp: .武士やいひわけ云てから御慶
ro: samurai ya iiwake iute kara gyokei
en:
a samurai--
after an apology
a "Happy New Year!"

jp: .年玉を貰ひに出る御慶かな
ro: toshidama wo morai ni izuru gyokei kana
en:
going out to collect
my presents...
making my New Year's rounds

jp: .年礼や下駄道あちは草履道
ro: nenrei ya geta michi achi wa zôri michi
en:
making their New Year's rounds
tracks of clogs
tracks of sandals

jp: .途中にて取替にする御慶哉
ro: tochû nite torikae ni suru gyokei kana
en:
meeting enroute
a quick exchange...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .武士村やからたち垣の年始状
ro: bushi mura ya karatachi kaki no nenshijô
en:
samurai street--
over the quince hedge
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .坊主天窓をふり立て御慶哉
ro: bôzu atama wo furitate gyokei kana
en:
the priest's shaved head
perks up...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .も一ッ狐の穴へ御慶かな
ro: mo hitotsu kitsune no ana e gyokei kana
en:
down one more
fox's hole...
"Happy New Year!"

jp: .一番のとし玉ぞ其豆な顔
ro: ichi ban no toshi-dama zo sono mamena kao
en:
the best New Year's
present!
her pink cheeks

jp: .江戸衆や庵の犬にも御年玉
ro: edo shû ya io no inu ni mo o-toshidama
en:
people of Edo
even for the hut's dog
a New Year's gift

jp: .年玉を配る世わなき庵哉
ro: toshi-dama wo kubaru sewa naki iori kana
en:
no one to give
New Year's presents to...
little hut

jp: .とし玉を二人前とる小僧哉
ro: toshidama wo futari mae toru kozô kana
en:
taking two helpings
of New Year's gifts...
little boy

jp: .とし玉に見せ申す也豆な顔
ro: toshidama ni mise mô[su} nari mamena kao
en:
now show us
your New Year's gifts...
pink cheeks

jp: .とし玉の上にも猫のぐる寝哉
ro: toshidama no ue ni mo neko no gurune kana
en:
on top
of the New Year's gifts...
cat curled asleep

jp: .とし玉や留主の窓からほふりこみ
ro: toshidama ya rusu no mado kara hôrikomi
en:
New Year's gift--
tossed in the window
while I was out

jp: .子宝が棒を引ても吉書哉
ro: ko-dakara ga bô wo hiite mo kissho kana
en:
the treasured child
writes with a cane...
year's first calligraphy

jp: .何のその上初夢もなく烏
ro: nanno sono jô hatsu yume mo naku karasu
en:
you've wrecked
my year's first dream!
cawing crow

jp: .小順礼もらひながらや凧
ro: ko junrei morai nagara ya ikanobori
en:
the little pilgrim
while receiving alms
flies a kite

jp: .万歳のかはりにしゃべる雀哉
ro: manzai no [ka]wari ni shaberu suzume kana
en:
in place
of begging actors
chattering sparrows

jp: .御座敷や菓子を見い見い猿が舞
ro: o-zashiki ya kashi wo mii-mii saru ga mau
en:
sitting room--
eyes locked on his treat
the monkey dances

jp: .親猿がをしへる舞の手品かな
ro: oya saru ga oshieru mai no tejina kana
en:
mother monkey
teaches her baby...
dance moves

jp: .舞猿や餅いただきて子にくれる
ro: mai saru ya mochi itadakite ko ni kureru
en:
dancing monkey--
he gives his rice cake
to the child

jp: .捨人もけさは四角にざうに哉
ro: sutebito mo kesa wa shikaku ni zôni kana
en:
even for the holy hermit
today, a square
of zoni!

jp: .もう一度せめて目を明け雑煮膳
ro: mô ichi do semete me wo ake zônizen
en:
if only you'd open your eyes
one more time...
zoni on the dinner tray

jp: .我庵もけさは四角な雑煮哉
ro: waga io mo kesa wa shikaku-na zôni kana
en:
in my hut
today, a square
of zoni!

jp: .かざり餅仏の膝をちょとかりる
ro: kazari mochi hotoke no hiza wo choto kariru
en:
rice cake offerings--
on Buddha's lap
for just a little while

jp: .台所の爺に歯固勝れけり
ro: daidoko no jiji ni hagatame katare keri
en:
old man in the kitchen--
his New Year's tooth-hardening
beats mine

jp: .皺面にとそぬり付るわらひ哉
ro: shiwa-zura ni toso nuritsukeru warai kana
en:
a New Year's toast
for his wrinkled face...
laughter

jp: .七草やだまって打も古実顔
ro: nanakusa ya damatte utsu mo kojitsu kao
en:
though she pounds the seven herbs
without singing...
a wise old face

jp: .大原や人留のある若菜つみ
ro: ôhara ya hito-dome no aru wakana tsumi
en:
a big field
with a "Keep Out" sign...
picking herbs

jp: .かすむ程たばこ吹つつ若菜つみ
ro: kasumu hodo tabako fukitsutsu wakana tsumi
en:
almost mist
the smoke of their pipes...
picking herbs

jp: .小坊主に行灯もたせて若なつみ
ro: ko bôzu ni andon motasete wakana tsumi
en:
letting the little boy
hold the lantern...
picking herbs

jp: .鶏に一葉ふるまふわかな哉
ro: niwatori ni hito ha furumau wakana kana
en:
the chicken is treated
to one...
New Year's herbs

jp: .一引はたばこかすみやわかなつみ
ro: hito hiki wa tabako kasumi ya wakana tsumi
en:
for each one picked
a puff on the pipe...
herbs

jp: .杜の陰しかも出がけのはつ烏
ro: mori [no] kage shikamo degake no hatsu karasu
en:
the woods are dark
but out and about...
the year's first crow

jp: .在合の鳥も初声上にけり
ro: ariai no tori mo hatsu koe age ni keri
en:
from this bird
the year's first song
rises

jp: .春めくやこがね花咲山の月
ro: harumeku ya kogane hana saku yama no tsuki
en:
it's springtime!
golden flowers
mountain moon

jp: .春めくやのらはのらとて藪虱
ro: harumeku ya nora wa nora tote yabu-jirami
en:
it's springtime!
even the thicket's lice
move into the field

jp: .永き日は只湯に入が仕事哉
ro: nagaki hi [wa] tada yu ni iru ga shigoto kana
en:
a long day--
even getting in the bath
is a chore

jp: .日永とて犬と烏の喧嘩哉
ro: hi naga tote inu to karasu no kenka kana
en:
a long day--
the dog and the crow
quarreling

jp: .狗が鼠とる也春の雨
ro: enokoro ga nezumi toru nari haru no ame
en:
the puppy has caught
a mouse...
spring rain

jp: .春風や犬にとらるる薮鼠
ro: haru kaze ya inu ni toraruru yabu nezumi
en:
spring breeze--
a thicket mouse
caught by the dog

jp: .春風や袴羽織のいせ乞食
ro: harukaze ya hakama haori no ise kojiki
en:
spring breeze--
in coat and trousers
a dandified beggar

jp: .春風や袴羽織の江戸乞食
ro: harukaze ya hakama haori no Edo kojiki
en:
spring breeze--
in coat and trousers
an Edo beggar

jp: .灸すんで馬も立也春の風
ro: kyû sunde uma mo tatsu nari haru no kaze
en:
even for the horse
a dose of burning wormwood...
spring breeze

jp: .かすむ日や宗判押しに三里程
ro: kasumu hi ya shûban [oshi] ni san ri hodo
en:
day mist--
the census taker reckons it
about seven miles

jp: .灯火やかすみながらに夜が明る
ro: tomoshibi ya kasumi nagara ni yo ga akeru
en:
lamplight
in the spring mist...
dawn

jp: .御仏と一所に霞む天窓かな
ro: mi-botoke to isshô ni kasumu atama kana
en:
me and Buddha--
our heads
in the mist

jp: .陽炎や目につきまとふ笑い顔
ro: kagerô ya me ni tsukimatô warai-gao
en:
heat shimmers--
his laughing face
lingers

jp: .本堂の上に鶏なく雪げ哉
ro: hondô no ue ni tori naku yukige kana
en:
atop the main temple
a rooster crows
"Snow's melting!"

jp: .足もとに鳥が立也はるの山
ro: ashi moto ni tori ga tatsu nari haru no yama
en:
a bird at my feet
takes off...
spring mountain

jp: .散る花に順礼帳も開帳哉
ro: chi[ru] hana ni junreichô mo kaichô kana
en:
into the scattering blooms
pilgrims
and Buddha

jp: .御影供にも御覧に入るさくら哉
ro: miekô ni mo goran ni iru sakura kana
en:
the Founder's image on display
along with...
cherry blossoms!

jp: .褒美の画先へ掴んで二日灸
ro: hôbi no e saki [e] tsukande futsukakyû
en:
gnawing the edge
of the prize painting...
burning wormwood

jp: .一鍬に雪迄返す山田哉
ro: hito kuwa ni yuki made kaesu yamada kana
en:
the same hoe
plows the snow too...
mountain rice field

jp: .松を友鶴を友なる田打哉
ro: matsu wo tomo tsuru wo tomo naru ta uchi kana
en:
friend of the pine
friend of the crane...
he plows his field

jp: .朝顔の畠起して朝茶哉
ro: asagao no hata okoshite asa cha kana
en:
tilling the morning-glory
field...
morning tea

jp: .恋猫や恐れ入たる這入口
ro: koi neko ya osore-itaru hairiguchi
en:
the lover cat
filled with remorse
at my door

jp: .のら猫の妻乞声は細々と
ro: nora neko no tsuma kou-goe wa hoso-boso to
en:
the stray cat's
yowl for love
a bit weak

jp: .のら猫の妻のござるはなかりけり
ro: nora neko [no] tsuma no gozaru wa nakari keri
en:
the stray cat's wife
fails
to make her entrance

jp: .小奇麗にしてくらす也やもめ鳥
ro: kogirei [ni] shite kurasu nari yamome tori
en:
she keeps the nest
nice and neat...
widow bird

jp: .鳶の巣も鬼門に持や日枝の山
ro: tobi no su mo kimon ni motsu ya hie [no] yama
en:
the black kite's nest, too
in the unlucky direction...
Mount Hie

jp: .鶯がふみ落しけり家の苔
ro: uguisu ga fumi-otoshi keri ie no koke
en:
nightingale stomping
knocks it down...
the house's moss

jp: .鶯も人ずれてなく上野哉
ro: uguisu mo hitozurete naku ueno kana
en:
the nightingale sings
like he's been around...
Ueno

jp: .鶯もほぼ風声ぞ梅の花
ro: uguisu mo hobo kazagoe zo ume no hana
en:
the nightingale, too
a bit hoarse from a cold...
plum blossoms

jp: .鶯やあきらめのよい籠の声
ro: uguisu ya a[ki]rame no yoi kago no koe
en:
the nightingale
resigned to his fate...
voice in a cage

jp: .日本に来て紅つけし乙鳥哉
ro: nippon ni kite beni tsukeshi tsubame kana
en:
arriving in Japan
wearing rouge...
the swallows

jp: .紅紛付てずらり並ぶや朝乙鳥
ro: beni tsukete zurari narabu ya asa tsubame
en:
wearing rouge
lined up in a row...
morning swallows

jp: .蟻程に人のつづくや夕雲雀
ro: ari hodo ni hito [no] tsuzuku ya yûhibari
en:
like marching ants
person after person...
an evening lark

jp: .関守の口真似するや雉の声
ro: sekimori no kuchi mane suru ya kiji no koe
en:
mocking the barrier
guard's voice...
pheasant

jp: .なくな雁いつも別は同じ事
ro: naku na kari itsumo wakare wa onaji koto
en:
don't cry, geese
parting is always
the same thing

jp: .山吹に差出口きく蛙哉
ro: yamabuki ni sashideguchi kiku kawazu kana
en:
in yellow roses
making rude remarks...
a frog

jp: .梅の花笠にかぶって鳴蛙
ro: ume no hana kasa ni kabutte naku kawazu
en:
with a plum blossom
umbrella-hat, croaking
frog

jp: .つめびらきする顔付の蛙哉
ro: tsumebiraki suru kao-zuku no kawazu kana
en:
his face all ready
for negotiation...
a frog

jp: .一理屈いふ気で居る蛙哉
ro: hito rikutsu iu ki de suwaru kawazu kana
en:
he prepares to state
his case...
squatting frog

jp: .浅黄てふあれば浅黄の桜哉
ro: asagi chô areba asagi no sakura kana
en:
when butterflies
are pale blue, pale blue
cherry blossoms

jp: .生れでて蝶は遊ぶを仕事哉
ro: umaredete chô wa aso[bu] wo shigoto kana
en:
from birth on
for butterflies, playing
is their job

jp: .おとなしや蝶も浅黄の出立は
ro: otonashi ya chô mo asagi no idetachi wa
en:
well behaved--
the butterfly, too
wears light blue

jp: .狂ふのも少じみ也浅黄蝶
ro: kuruu no mo sukoshi jimi nari asagi chô
en:
the crazy one
calms down a bit...
light blue butterfly

jp: .こっそりとしてあそぶ也浅黄蝶
ro: kossori to shite asobu nari asagi chô
en:
playing their games
on the sly...
pale blue butterflies

jp: .参詣のつむりかぞえる小蝶哉
ro: sankei no tsumuri kazoeru ko chô kana
en:
counting heads
of the shrine visitors...
little butterfly

jp: .蝶まふや馬の下腹ともしらで
ro: chô mau ya uma no shitahara to mo shirade
en:
butterfly dancing--
under the horse's gut
unaware

jp: .蝶見よや親子三人寝てくらす
ro: chô mi yo ya oya-go sannin nete kurasu
en:
butterfly, look!
parents and child, three
sleep together

jp: .寝仲間に我も這入るぞ野辺の蝶
ro: ne nakama ni waga mo hairu zo nobe no chô
en:
I crawl in to join
the sleepers...
meadow butterflies

jp: .寝並んで小蝶と猫と和尚哉
ro: ne narande ko chô to neko to oshô kana
en:
sleeping in a row--
little butterfly, cat
priest

jp: .野ばくちの銭の中より小蝶哉
ro: no bakuchi no zeni no naka yori ko chô kana
en:
gambling in the field--
from the pot
a little butterfly

jp: .風ろ水の小川へ出たり飛小蝶
ro: furo mizu no kogawa e detari tobu ko chô
en:
taking a dip
in the creek's bath water...
little butterfly

jp: .湯の中のつむりや蝶の一休
ro: yu no naka no tsumuri ya chô no hito yasumi
en:
in the hot tub
on someone's head...
butterfly's rest stop

jp: .世の中を浅き心や浅黄蝶
ro: yo no naka wo asaki kokoro ya asagi chô
en:
with a light heart
in this world...
light blue butterfly

jp: .草の葉に虻の空死したりけり
ro: kusa no ha ni abu no sorajini ni shitari keri
en:
on a blade of grass
the horsefly
plays dead

jp: .親蜂や蜜盗まれてひたと鳴
ro: oya hachi ya mitsu nusumarete hita to naku
en:
the parent bee
its honey being stolen
buzzes near

jp: .子もち蜂あくせく蜜をかせぐ也
ro: ko mochi hachi akuseku mitsu wo [ka]segu nari
en:
the bees with children
are work-a-holics...
making honey

jp: .蜂の巣の隣をかりる雀哉
ro: hachi no su no tonari wo kariru susume kana
en:
renting a spot
next to the beehive...
sparrows

jp: .小坊主が転げくらする菫哉
ro: ko bôzu ga koroge kurasuru sumire kana
en:
the little boy
tumbling all day...
violets

jp: .痩我慢して咲にけり門椿
ro: yase gaman shite saki ni keri kado tsubaki
en:
with a yogi's self-denial
they've bloomed...
camellias at my gate

jp: .我門に痩我慢して咲く椿
ro: waga kado ni yase gaman shite saku tsubaki
en:
at my gate
with a yogi's self-denial...
blooming camellias

jp: .若雀椿ころがして遊ぶ也
ro: waka suzume tsubaki korogashite asobu nari
en:
young sparrows
playing ring-around-the-
camellia

jp: .一本の梅でもちたる出茶屋哉
ro: ippon no ume de mochitaru de-chaya kana
en:
with one blooming
plum tree
teahouse of reeds

jp: .梅咲や信農のおくも草履道
ro: ume saku ya shinano no oku mo zôri michi
en:
plum blooming--
deep in Shinano, too
tracks of sandals

jp: .梅しんとしておのづから頭が下る
ro: ume shin to shite onozukara zu ga sagaru
en:
still plum blossoms
my head, by itself
bows

jp: .おのづから頭が下る也梅の花
ro: onozukara zu ga sagaru nari ume no hana
en:
by itself
my head bows...
plum blossoms!

jp: .片袖は月夜也けり梅の花
ro: kata sode wa tsuki yo nari keri ume no hana
en:
on one sleeve
the bright moon...
plum blossoms!

jp: .黒塗の馬もいさむや梅の花
ro: kuro nuri no uma mo isamu ya ume no hana
en:
even the black lacquered
horse flashes bright!
plum blossoms

jp: .こなたにも安置して有梅の花
ro: kona[ta] ni mo anchi shi[te] are ume no hana
en:
even here
a holy image enshrined
plum blossoms

jp: .在郷や雪隠神も梅の花
ro: zaigô ya setchin-gami mo ume no hana
en:
even for the god
of the outhouse...
plum blossoms

jp: .つんとして白梅咲の不二派寺
ro: tsunto shite shira ume saku no fujiha-dera
en:
stuck-up plum trees
blossoming white...
Fujiha Temple

jp: .亭坊が空上戸でも梅の花
ro: teibô [ga] sora jôgo de mo ume no hana
en:
the head priest
pretends to be a drinker...
plum blossoms

jp: .百程の鳥井潜れり梅の花
ro: hyaku hodo no tori i-kugureri ume no hana
en:
about a hundred birds
passing through...
plum blossoms

jp: .風の神ちくらへござれ花が咲
ro: kaze no kami chikura e gozare hana ga saku
en:
go away, divine wind
to the Northern Sea!
cherry blossoms

jp: .風はやり仕廻へば花も仕舞哉
ro: kaze hayari shimaeba hana mo shimai kana
en:
when the wind
is finally done, so are
the blossoms

jp: .さく花や祖引雨がけふも降
ro: saku hana ya sode hiku ame ga kyô mo furu
en:
cherry blossoms--
a sleeve-tugging rain
again today

jp: .三絃で親やしなふや花の陰
ro: samisen de oya yashinau ya hana no kage
en:
with a samisen
she supports her parents...
blossom shade

jp: .高井のや只一本の花の雲
ro: takai no ya tada ippon no hana no kumo
en:
Takai Field--
just one blossom cloud
on a trunk

jp: .団子など商ひながら花見哉
ro: dango nado akinai nagara hanami kana
en:
while selling his dumplings
and such...
blossom viewing

jp: .手をかざす鼬よどこだ花の雲
ro: te wo kazasu itachi yo doko da hana no kumo
en:
shading his eyes
where are you gazing, weasel?
blossom clouds

jp: .年寄の腰や花見の迷子札
ro: toshiyori no koshi ya hanami no maigo fuda
en:
around the old man's waist
blossom viewing...
a name tag

jp: .花咲や牛は牛連馬は馬
ro: hana saku ya ushi wa ushi-zure uma wa uma
en:
cherry blossoms--
cows follow cows
horses, horses

jp: .花寒し犬ものがれぬくさめ哉
ro: hana samushi inu mo nogarenu kusame kana
en:
cherry blossom cold spell--
even the dog
can't help but sneeze

jp: .花の山東西南北の人
ro: hana no yama tôzainamboku no hito
en:
blossoming mountain
from east, west, north, south
they come

jp: .花ふぶき泥わらんじで通りけり
ro: hana fubuki doro waranji de tôri keri
en:
blizzard of blossoms--
with muddy sandals
passing through

jp: .菩薩達御出現あれ花の雲
ro: bosatsu-tachi go-shutsugen are hana no kumo
en:
Buddha's saints
come out! come out!
clouds of blossoms

jp: .一尺に足らぬも花の桜哉
ro: isshaku ni taranu mo hana no sakura kana
en:
though not quite
one foot tall...
cherry blossoms

jp: .馬は馬連とて歩く桜哉
ro: uma wa uma tsure tote aruku sakura kana
en:
horses follow horses
on their way...
cherry blossoms

jp: .こっそりとあれは浅黄の桜哉
ro: kossori to are wa asagi no sakura kana
en:
stealthily
those have turned pale blue...
cherry blossoms

jp: .それそこは犬の雪隠ぞ山桜
ro: sore soko wa inu no setchin zo yama-zakura
en:
over there's
the dog's toilet...
mountain cherry blossoms

jp: .田楽のみそにくっつく桜哉
ro: dengaku no miso ni kuttsuku sakura kana
en:
sticking to
the bean curd soup...
cherry blossoms

jp: .未練なく散も桜はさくら哉
ro: miren naku chiru mo sakura wa sakura kana
en:
without regret
they fall and scatter...
cherry blossoms

jp: .山吹に手をかざしたる鼬哉
ro: yamabuki ni te wo kazashitaru itachi kana
en:
in yellow roses
shading his eyes to gaze...
a weasel

jp: .山吹や出湯のけぶりに馴れて咲
ro: yamabuki ya ideyu no keburi ni narete saku
en:
yellow roses--
used to the hot spring's steam
they bloom

jp: .短夜を橋で揃ふや京参り
ro: mijika yo wo hashi de sorou ya kyô mairi
en:
in the short night
crossing bridges en masse...
Kyoto pilgrimage

jp: .暑いぞよけふも一日遊び雲
ro: atsu[i] zo yo kyô mo ichi nichi asobi-gumo
en:
summer heat--
today, all day
the playful clouds

jp: .涼風の窓が極楽浄土哉
ro: suzukaze no mado ga gokuraku jôdo kana
en:
cool breeze--
through the window
Pure Land Paradise!

jp: .涼しさや一畳敷もおれが家
ro: suzushisa ya hito jô shiku mo ore ga ie
en:
cool air--
one tatami mat spreads
in my house

jp: .涼しさは小銭をすくふ杓子哉
ro: suzushisa wa [ko] zeni wo sukuu shakushi kana
en:
cool air--
ladling coins
with a spoon

jp: .夕涼に笠忘れけり後の宿
ro: yûsuzu ni kasa wasure keri ato no yado
en:
evening cool--
my umbrella-hat left
at the last inn

jp: .五月雨又後からも越後女盲
ro: satsuki ame mata ato kara mo echigo goze
en:
in Fifth Month rain
behind me too...
a blind woman from Echigo

jp: .五月雨に金魚銀魚のきげん哉
ro: samidare ni kingyo ginyo no kigen kana
en:
in Fifth Month rain
feeling like silver
or goldfish

jp: .五月雨や沈香も焚かず屁もひらず
ro: samidare ya jinkô mo takazu he mo hirazu
en:
in Fifth Month rain
no incense
no farts

jp: .五月雨やたばこの度に火打箱
ro: samidare ya tabako no tabi ni hiuchibako
en:
Fifth Month rain--
time for tobacco
and tinderbox

jp: .なぐさみに風呂に入也五月雨
ro: nagusami ni furo ni iru nari satsuki ame
en:
just for fun
into the hot tub I go...
Fifth Month rain

jp: .何の其蛙の面や五月雨
ro: nanno sono kawazu no tsura ya satsuki ame
en:
what a face
this frog is making!
Fifth Month rain

jp: .豆煎を鳩にも分て五月雨
ro: mame iri wo hato ni mo wakete satsuki ame
en:
sharing my parched beans
with a pigeon...
Fifth Month rain

jp: .今の間にいく夕立ぞ跡の山
ro: ima no ma ni kiku yûdachi zo ato no yama
en:
just now
how many cloudbursts?
the mountain in back

jp: .葎にも夕立配り給ふ哉
ro: mugura ni mo yûdachi kubari tamau kana
en:
even the weeds
get a cloudburst
just for them

jp: .夕立を見せびらかすや山の神
ro: yûdachi wo misebirakasu ya yama no kami
en:
showing off
with a cloudburst...
god of the mountain

jp: .夕立に迄にくまれし門田哉
ro: yûdachi ni made nikumareshi kado ta kana
en:
even the cloudbursts
hate it...
rice field by my gate

jp: .夕立のうらに鳴なり家根の鶏
ro: yûdachi no ura ni naku nari yane no tori
en:
at the tail end
of the cloudburst crowing...
rooftop rooster

jp: .夕立の取って返すやひいき村
ro: yûdachi no totte kaesu ya hiiki mura
en:
the cloudburst
retraces its steps...
favoring the village

jp: .夕立のひいきめさるる外山かな
ro: yûdachi no hiiki me saruru toyama kana
en:
the cloudburst showing
favoritism...
mountain by the village

jp: .夕立の真中に立座頭かな
ro: yûdachi no mannaka ni tatsu zatô kana
en:
standing dead center
in the downpour...
a blind man

jp: .夕立や赤い寝蓙に赤い花
ro: yûdachi ya akai negoza ni akai hana
en:
rainstorm--
on a red sleeping mat
a red flower

jp: .夕立や髪結所の鉢の松
ro: yûdachi ya kamiyui-doko no hachi no matsu
en:
rainstorm--
