ro: mine wo nasu funbetsu mo nashi hashiri kumo
en:
lacking the good sense
to form billows...
rushing clouds

jp: .さらしいや石の上なる神酒徳り
ro: sarashi i ya ishi no ue naru migi-dokuri
en:
cleaning the well--
on a stone a bottle
of sacred sake

jp: .涼にもはりあひのなし門の月
ro: suzumu ni mo hariai no nashi kado no tsuki
en:
even cool air basking
not worth the bother...
moon at the gate

jp: .つつがなく湯治しにけり腕の蚤
ro: tsutsuganaku tôji shi ni keri ude no nomi
en:
safe and sound
in the healing hot spring
my arm's flea

jp: .立給へ秋の夕をいざさらば
ro: tachi tamae aki no yûbe wo iza saraba
en:
let's go then
into the autumn evening
for our farewells

jp: .盃に呑んで仕廻ふや天の川
ro: sakazuki ni nonde shimau ya ama no kawa
en:
in my sake cup
down the hatch!
the Milky Way

jp: .古壁やどの穴からも秋の月
ro: furu kabe ya dono ana kara mo aki no tsuki
en:
old wall--
from whichever hole
autumn moon

jp: .子ども衆は餅待宵の月見哉
ro: kodomo shû wa mochi matsuyoi no tsukimi kana
en:
for the children
rice cakes while they gaze...
almost harvest moon

jp: .隠れ家は気のむいた夜が月見哉
ro: kakurega wa ki no muita yo ga tsukimi kana
en:
secluded house--
in the mood tonight
to moon-gaze

jp: .名月や蟹も平を名乗り出る
ro: meigetsu ya kani mo taira wo nanori deru
en:
harvest moon--
even crabs claim
the name "Taira!"

jp: .名月やなどとは上べ稲見かな
ro: meigetsu ya nado to wa uwabe ine mi kana
en:
pretending to watch
the harvest moon...
rice field-gazing

jp: .世直しの大十五夜の月見かな
ro: yo naoshi no ôjûgoya no tsukimi kana
en:
a world-healing
night of the 15th...
moon gazing

jp: .門川やすみ捨てある後の月
ro: kado kawa ya sumi sutete aru nochi no tsuki
en:
river by the gate--
thrown in a corner
the Ninth month moon

jp: .置露や我は草木にいつならん
ro: oku tsuyu ya ware wa kusaki ni itsu naran
en:
dewdrops forming--
when might I become
grass...or a tree?

jp: .灯篭の火で飯をくふ裸かな
ro: tôrô no hi de meshi wo kuu hadaka kana
en:
by Bon lantern light
eating my rice...
naked

jp: .七夕やよい子持てる乞食村
ro: tanabata ya yoi ko motteru kojiki machi
en:
Tanabata Night--
the well-behaved children
of beggar-town

jp: .星の歌よむつらつきの蛙かな
ro: hoshi no uta yomu tsura tsuki no kawazu kana
en:
looks like he's composing
a "Star Poem"...
the frog

jp: .薮村や灯ろうの中にきりぎりす
ro: yabu mura ya torô no naka ni kirigirisu
en:
remote village--
among the grave lanterns
a katydid

jp: .狗がかぶって歩く一葉かな
ro: enokoro ga kabutte aruku hito ha kana
en:
the puppy walks by
with a hat...
fallen leaf

jp: .雪ちるやおどけも云へぬ信濃山
ro: yuki chiru ya odoke mo ienu shinano yama
en:
snow flitting down--
the mountains of Shinano
aren't joking

jp: .近付のさくらも炭に焼れけり
ro: chikazuki no sakura mo sumi ni yakare keri
en:
my beloved cherry tree
cooked too...
making charcoal

jp: .元日や我らぐるめに花の娑婆
ro: ganjitsu ya warera gurume ni hana no shaba
en:
New Year's Day--
all of us in a corrupt world's
blossoms

jp: .馬士も烏帽子着にけり梅の花
ro: umakata mo eboshi ki ni keri ume no hana
en:
even the cart man
wears a courtier's hat...
plum blossoms

jp: .心の字に水も流れて梅の花
ro: shin no ji ni mizu mo nagarete ume no hana
en:
flowing water spells
the character "heart"...
plum blossoms

jp: .夕飯の膳の際より青田哉
ro: yûmeshi no zen no kiwa yori aoda kana
en:
at the dinner
tray's edge...
a green rice field

jp: .田廻りの尻に敷たる団扇哉
ro: ta meguri no shiri ni shikitaru uchiwa kana
en:
he circles his rice field
an open fan tucked
behind

jp: .古き日を吃とやれやれ時鳥
ro: furuki hi wo kitsu to yare-yare hototogisu
en:
stuttering about
the olden days...
a cuckoo

jp: .朝顔のうしろは蚤の地獄かな
ro: asagao no ushiro wa nomi no jigoku kana
en:
behind the morning-glories
a hell
of fleas

jp: .かまふなよやれかまふなよ子もち蚤
ro: kamau na yo yare kamau na yo ko mochi nomi
en:
let it be
let it be! the flea
has children

jp: .大道に蚤はき捨る月夜かな
ro: daidô ni nomi hakisuteru tsuki yo kana
en:
sweeping fleas
onto the highway...
moonlit night

jp: .人の世や小石原より蚤うつる
ro: hito no yo ya ko ishiwara yori nomi utsuru
en:
world of man--
in a little stone field
catching fleas

jp: .人の世や砂歩行ても蚤うつる
ro: hito no yo ya suna aruite mo nomi utsuru
en:
world of man--
even walking on sand
picking up fleas

jp: .やけ土のほかりほかりや蚤さわぐ
ro: yake tsuchi no hokari-hokari ya nomi sawagu
en:
on burnt ground
the fleas throw a wild
party

jp: .焼跡やほかりほかりと蚤さわぐ
ro: yake ato ya hokari-hokari to nomi sawagu
en:
after the fire--
the fleas throw a wild
party

jp: .有明や晦日に近き軒行灯
ro: ariake ya misoka ni chikaki noki andon
en:
moon in the autumn dawn--
nearing month's end
lantern in the eaves

jp: .古郷は雲の先也秋の暮
ro: furusato wa kumo no saki nari aki no kure
en:
my home village
at the end of that cloud...
autumn dusk

jp: .神前に子供角力や秋の風
ro: shinzen ni kodomo sumô ya aki no kaze
en:
at the shrine
children sumo wrestlers...
autumn wind

jp: .吹たばこたばこの味へ秋の風
ro: fuku tabako tabako no aji e aki no kaze
en:
pipe smoke blowing
it tastes like tobacco...
autumn wind

jp: .青菰の上に並ぶや盆仏
ro: ao-gomo no ue ni narabu ya bon hotoke
en:
on green reeds
in a row...
Bon Festival Buddhas

jp: .送り火や今に我等もあの通り
ro: okuribi ya ima ni warera mo ano tôri
en:
bonfires for the dead--
soon they'll burn
for us

jp: .有明や晦日に近き軒灯籠
ro: ariake ya misoka ni chikaki noki tôro
en:
dawn of the month's
last day...
for Bon lanterns in the eaves

jp: .一つきへ二つきへつつ灯籠哉
ro: hitotsu kie futatsu kie tsutsu tôro [kana]
en:
one dies out
two die out...
lanterns for the dead

jp: .七夕や涼しく上に湯につかる
ro: tanabata ya suzushiku ue ni yu ni tsukaru
en:
Tanabata Night
is cool, and to top it off
soaking in a hot tub

jp: .馬の子の踏潰しけり野良の栗
ro: uma no ko no fumi-tsubushi keri nora no kuri
en:
the pony stepping
and crunching...
chestnuts in the field

jp: .せま庭の横打栗やどろぼ猫
ro: sema niwa no yoko utsu kuri ya dorobo neko
en:
knocking chestnuts
out of the little garden...
thief cat!

jp: .降る雪を払ふ気もなきかがし哉
ro: furu yuki wo harau ki mo naki kagashi kana
en:
he's also in no mood
to sweep the snow...
scarecrow

jp: .犬が来てもどなたぞと申す襖哉
ro: inu ga kite mo donata zo to mô[su] fusuma kana
en:
even to the approaching dog
"Who's there?"
winter quilt
